key.name: I honestly didn't believe I would live to see my granddaughter again. Thank heavens this world still has heroes.
But... I fear that $npc:11000188[gender:1]$ isn't getting any better... Such a delicate girl. She was frozen in ice too long. Sigh.
Something must be done to release her from the clutches of that blasted frost. I hate to impose, but could I ask you a favor?
Sure.

I'd like you to go to $map:02000059$ and find $npcName:11000190[gender:0]$, a well-respected herbalist. He happens to be the son of an old friend. Surely he has something that will help my granddaughter!

I'd like you to go to $map:02000059$ and find $npcName:11000190[gender:0]$, a well-respected herbalist. He happens to be the son of an old friend. Surely he has something that will help my granddaughter!
Oh, hello. Is there something I can help you with?
I'm looking for $npcName:11000190[gender:0]$.
Sigh... $npcName:11000190[gender:0]$'s lives here, but it's been more than three days since I last saw my husband.
What has my life become? More than half my day is spent cleaning the house, my kids keep getting into fights, and I haven't heard from my husband since he went out to gather herbs DAYS ago!
I'm positively fed up! But I can't just leave my kids alone to go looking for the inconsiderate oaf.

Well, if you DO find that man of mine, please tell him to come home. It's been three whole days without a peep. You might have a word with $npcName:11000192[gender:0]$ just down the hill. That's who my hubby was headed to see before his vanishing act.

You might have a word with $npcName:11000192[gender:0]$ just down the hill. That's who my hubby was headed to see before his vanishing act. And if you do find my husband, please tell him to come home.
Hello. What brings you here?
I'm looking for $npcName:11000190[gender:0]$.
Oh...? He did stop by, but that was days ago.
Do you know where he went?
He told me he was off to the $map:02000082$ to investigate the sighting of a precious $item:30000233$. He really ought to have been back by now.
If you're heading to the $map:02000082$ to find him, would you mind bringing him this bag? He scrambled off in such a hurry that he forgot it. The entrance to the $map:02000082$ is right below us.
Back so soon?
I, uhh... misplaced the $item:30000026$.
Nope! I just got turned around.
You really should take better care of other people's belongings. Lucky for you, that wasn't the first bag $npcName:11000190$ has left here. Try not to lose this one, all right?
You mean that conspicuously bag-shaped object sticking out of your pockets? Perhaps you should check again.
Really now, I don't see anywhere in that bag of yours to put it. Why don't you come back after you've parted with some of that junk you're lugging around?
Hmph. You seem pretty bad with directions for an adventurer. The entrance to the $map:02000082$ is right below us. If you can't find it, you're not looking.
Hmm? Do you need something?
(Hand the bag to $npcName:11000190[gender:0]$.)
Huh, this bag looks just like one of mine. Even has my name on it. Oh! I must have left it at $npcName:11000192[gender:0]$'s house. Thanks. Uh... was there something else?
Your wife wants you to come home.

Ugh, family. Kids running around yelling all day, wife always nagging. "Don't leave your shoes on the table, dear. Will you be wearing pants to dinner? Honey, you can't feed the boys dog food." Go back home? No thank you.
I'd much rather stay here where it's quiet, picking mushrooms.
Huh? Do you need something?
$npc:11000187[gender:1]$ said you could help me find an herb.
An herb? For $npc:11000187[gender:1]$? Is everything all right? I can't remember the last time I saw the old broad.
(Tell him about $npc:11000187[gender:1]$'s granddaughter $npc:11000188[gender:1]$.)
Really? Her granddaughter's not an ice cube anymore? That's great to hear. Come to think of it, I remember her hiring me to find her a $item:50200451$ Seed a few years back...
She was pretty torn up about losing her son, daughter-in-law, and granddaughter... At least with the kid back, maybe she can find a little peace. But wait, what do you need the herb for?
(Tell him about $npc:11000188[gender:1]$'s illness.)

Hmm... What you need is something to kickstart her metabolism and get her body's temperature regulation back under control. There's a medicinal fruit that would help, super common too. I'm just can't for the life of me recall the name.
I wrote it down in my herb guide... Should be somewhere in my house. I gotta warn you though, my handwriting is not super great.
Head over to my house and look for my herb guide. My penmanship isn't great, but you should be able to read it.
Hm? Who are you?
Your dad sent me to look for his herb guide.
Really? You should look on top of the wardrobe. Dad likes to hide stuff where $npcName:11000200[gender:0]$ and I can't reach. Hey... Is my mom still outside?
Yes.
Sigh... Guess I'm not getting off easy. How much longer do I have to sit like this? $npc:11000200[gender:0]$'s gonna get what's coming to him!
<font color="#909090">(The recipe book was on top of the wardrobe, just like $npc:11000202[gender:0]$ said. You start leafing through the pages.)</font>

Pg. 15 | Mushmint Especially effective for boosting energy and overcoming fatigue. It usually takes root near sources of fresh water, such as riversides or near waterfalls. To Prepare: Sun-dry and submerge in 1 cup $item:30000230$. Bring to boil, stirring until homogeneous.

Pg. 40 | $item:30000232$ Tasty, but no real medicinal value. Grind fruit to extract juice, or boil as tea. Often takes root between rocks within warm mountainous regions. Fruit best collected in spring.

Pg. 89 | $item:20000044$ Remarkable fruit, boosts metabolism and warms the body. Especially good for replenishing energy. Can be eaten whole, juiced, or blended. Its extract is used in numerous commercial medicines. It is often found in $map:02000059$ and $map:02000054$.
<font color="#909090">($item:20000044$, eh? If this book is right, the fruit could be the key to $npc:11000188$'s recovery. You should go to $map:02000059$ or $map:02000054$ and collect some.)</font>
<font color="#909090">($item:20000044$, eh? If this book is right, the fruit could be the key to $npc:11000188$'s recovery. You should go to $map:02000059$ or $map:02000054$ and collect some.)</font>
$MyPCName$, you're back. What's that you've got there in your hand? Did $npc:11000190[gender:0]$ help you find an herb that could help my dear granddaughter?
An... apple? Well, whatever works! Thank you very much. So, how is $npcName:11000190[gender:0]$ these days?
Uhh... Doesn't $npc:11000188[gender:1]$ need that medicine-fruit?
He seems generally miserable about life.
Oh, I'd hate to disturb the poor dear while she's resting. She's lasted this long, after all.
Oh no, what a shame. Is there a problem with his home life?
He and his wife are pretty much fed up with each other.
Oh my... It's easy to forget how precious family is. When someone is such a regular part of your life, sometimes you take them for granted.
Families should sacrifice for each other, and embrace one another no matter their flaws. After all I've lost, I would never neglect someone who meant so much to me.
Ugh! Those blasted monsters!
What's the problem?
I chop firewood 'til I'm stiff and sweaty, only to have it snatched up by the monsters living in the $map:02000082$ while my back is turned.
What do monsters need with firewood?

Why are you asking me? All I know is holes leading into the $map:02000082$ keep cropping up. $npcName:11000192[gender:0]$ found one south of here, and now parts of the road to $map:02000054$ have started caving in.
I went to investigate the crater, and what should I find but those blasted monsters digging their way to the surface.
First they cut down all the saplings in the area, and then they started stealing our lumber. This is the last time I let those monsters get their hands on my wood!
No firewood to sell, means no food in our bellies. Won't you please liberate my wood? You can just set it down wherever.
No firewood to sell, means no food in our bellies. Won't you please liberate my wood? You can just set it down wherever.
I'm in your debt, friend. Thanks!
Are you leaving now?
Yep!
Mind doing me a favor? I've put some mushrooms in this bag. Take them to my wife and tell her to sell them, okay?

And tell her not to sell 'em too cheap! These are RARE medicinal mushrooms that pretty much only grow in bat poop. Well... She'll probably figure it out. Her shrewd business sense and effective-but-yappy negotiating skills are why I fell in love with her.
Oh and on your way out would you mind re-lighting any burned out candles you come across? The bats hate the light, and I really enjoy not getting gnawed to death by rats with wings. Thanks buddy!
Back so soon?
I, uhh... misplaced the $item:30000031$.
Nope! I just got turned around.
Oh. Well, it is pretty dark in this cave. I just want to stress how RARE these mushrooms are, and how much work it was to gather them. Here's another bag.
What? It's sitting right there in the top of your bag!
Yeesh. There's nowhere to put it! How do you walk with a bag that full? Come back to me when you've dumped some of that junk.
Oh, yeah. It 's pretty dark in here. Be careful on your way out.
Have you found my husband?
(Deliver the mushrooms and $npc:11000190[gender:0]$'s message.)
Oh my... If he'd collected this many, he should have just come home! Sigh... Well, thank you for going to the trouble of bringing these.
喂，干嘛站在那里发呆？ 快把<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000120$</font>扔进<font color="#ffd200">熔炉</font>里。 像你那样站着不干活，什么时候才能把<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000121$</font>做出来！ 快干活！
喂，干嘛站在那里发呆？ 快把<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000120$</font>扔进<font color="#ffd200">熔炉</font>里。
呵呵，沸腾的铁水是不是看上去就像有生命一样？ 别人当作垃圾扔掉的废铁，现在又获得了新生。 你是新来的杂役，一定是头一次看到这种景象吧？
说我不是杂役。
是的。
嗯？你不是来干活的杂役吗？ 那你干嘛帮我干活？
说既然让我做，就做呗。
说想操作熔炉试试。
哈……真是个悠闲的朋友。你走吧～ 新来的杂役到底在哪儿呢……
在别人看来，$map:02000084$是堆满了垃圾的地方， 但是我不这么认为。 因为觐见仪式取消而堆积在仓库里的<font color="#ffd200">近卫队的武器 也是在熔炉里化为了铁水，重新变成了铁矿石</font>。
虽然我只是旧货商的杂役，但每次看到这些的时候， 我就觉得自己的工作很有价值，呵呵呵。
啊……真让人为难。 那样又不能解决问题……
问是什么事。
市政府前面<font color="#ffd200">有一群人正在闹哄哄地进行示威</font>。 据说是<font color="#ffd200">吃了格尔多斯制药公司生产的药之后产生副作用的人的家属</font>。
他们在格尔多斯制药公司前面示威了几天，但是没有得到任何回应。 所以想让我来帮着进行仲裁。 我让他们给我一点时间，寻找解决方案，他们却不听我的， 一直在那里示威。
我也正在努力解决问题，但他们那个样子，让市民看到的话可能不太好…… 让我的面子往哪儿放啊……真是…… 你能去转告我的意思，劝说他们停止示威吗？
我也正在努力解决问题，但他们那个样子，让市民看到的话可能不太好…… 让我的面子往哪儿放啊……真是…… 你能去转告我的意思，劝说他们停止示威吗？
你好像是从市政府里出来的……是市长派来的吗？
转达$npc:11000065[gender:0]$的意思。
再给他一点时间？ 哼！我之前去恳求过$npcTitle:11000065[gender:0]$，但已经过去好几个月了。 这段时间$npcName:11000065[gender:0]$$npcTitle:11000065[gender:0]$根本没去调查，只是在拖延时间。
不光是我，在格尔多斯总公司前面示威的其他受害者， 也早就不再相信他了。
很多人吃了格尔多斯制药公司的药物之后，病情反而恶化了。 但是格尔多斯方面却拼命搪塞，说没有证据可以证明病情是 吃了他们的药之后才恶化的。
要是能找到相关资料，查明到底是不是因为药物而引起的， 就不会这么郁闷了。 但是与药物有关的资料全都掌握在格尔多斯制药公司手上……
要是在格尔多斯制药公司工作的研究员或药剂师中 有人能帮帮我们就好了…… 你能<font color="#ffd200">到格尔多斯制药厂那边去，看看有没有人能帮助我们</font>吗？
要是在格尔多斯制药公司工作的研究员或药剂师中 有人能帮帮我们就好了…… 你能<font color="#ffd200">到格尔多斯制药厂那边去，看看有没有人能帮助我们</font>吗？
人……正常的人…… 啊……得救了…… 我还以为会死在这里呢……
等验证了新药样品的安全性之后，我会亲自到受害者那里去 向他们赔罪，并竭尽所能为他们治疗。 在这之前，请你把<font color="#ffd200">药物副作用证据资料</font> 送到受害者那里去。
在工厂地下，有个配制药物原料的配药室。 请你在那里的<font color="#ffd200">成分分析装置</font>上打印出<font color="#ffd200">药物成分分析表</font>， 然后在<font color="#ffd200">药物原料罐</font>中提取一些<font color="#ffd200">原料样本</font>。
在工厂地下，有个配制药物原料的配药室。 请你在那里的<font color="#ffd200">成分分析装置</font>上打印出<font color="#ffd200">药物成分分析表</font>， 然后在<font color="#ffd200">药物原料罐</font>中提取一些<font color="#ffd200">原料样本</font>。
$MyPCName$！ 怎么样了？
拿出在制药厂中找到的证据。
谢谢！真的非常感谢！ 你真是帮了我的大忙。
转达$npc:11000124[gender:0]$的话。
真的吗？ 竟然把没有经过验证的药物拿出来销售…… 那些坏蛋……！
虽然那个博士也很可恨……但既然他说要帮助我们， 只能先等他过来了。总之谢谢你。
不知道怎么回事……怪物们突然成群结队地闯进 了工厂，占领了这里…… 因为事发突然，整个工厂乱作一团，职员们 全都在匆忙逃命。
因为必须找回一样重要的东西，所以我又回到了这里。 结果你也看到了……我被他们抓住了…… 喂，我想求你帮个忙。
那些<font color="#ffd200">怪物把我用毕生精力开发出来的 新药样品抢走了。</font> 请你帮我找到那个东西。求你了。
那些<font color="#ffd200">怪物把我用毕生精力开发出来的 新药样品抢走了。</font> 请你帮我找到那个东西。求你了。
啊……真不知道该怎么感谢你…… 作为药物学研究员，这是恢复自信和名誉的 唯一希望。
曾经因为我的判断失误…… 在上司的逼迫下，制作出了<font color="#ffd200">未经验证的药物</font>。 这种新药可以<font color="#ffd200">解决那种药物导致的问题</font>。
现在只要用新药样品完成安全性实验，就能大量生产， 然后分发给人们了……
转达示威队汉弗莱的话。
药物的副作用已经出现了吗……都是我的错…… 我一直待在这里，对外面的情况一无所知。
Oh man, oh jeez. What should I do?
What is it?
I am so fired... I was taking $npc:11000049$ for a walk, and before I knew what was happening, she had scampered down into a crevice in the side of the cliff!
Who is $npc:11000049$?
Oh. $npc:11000049$ is my boss's cat. I can't go back without her, and there's no way I can climb down there. Please, save the cat and save my job!
Please climb down the cliff side and rescue $npc:11000049$ before my boss comes back.
I can't believe you risked your life climbing down to rescue $npc:11000049$... You've really saved my bacon! Thanks.
Ugh...
What happened here?
The monsters came out of nowhere... They trashed the lab, and attacked our researchers. Worst of all, they made off with the $itemPlural:20000049$ that were the foundation of our research!

The $itemPlural:20000049$ are experimental prototypes that were never meant to leave the lab. If they are introduced into the ecosystem, they could wreak untold havoc! Please, you must recover the samples before it's too late...

The $itemPlural:20000049$ are experimental prototypes that were never meant to leave the lab. If they are introduced into the ecosystem, they could wreak untold havoc! Please, you must recover the samples before it's too late...
Thank heavens... You recovered the $itemPlural:20000049$ before the monsters escaped the lab with them. I'm... Urgh... In your debt.
Sigh... Now what do I do?
What's wrong?
My girlfriend and I have been together a while, so I thought it was time we went on a trip. And when we get here, she suddenly gets upset and takes off on a cable car.
Why is your girlfriend upset?
I don't know why! She asked if I thought the cable car girl was pretty, and I told her she was prettier. And then she got mad and threw her $item:30000046$ down there in that field!
Anyways... I don't know what I did wrong, but I have to find the $item:30000046$ before I can go and patch things up with my girlfriend. The problem is, the place is surrounded with monsters.
I'm no warrior, and I've never been in a fight. Would you please recover the $item:30000046$?
I'm no warrior, and I've never been in a fight. Would you please recover the $item:30000046$?
Did you find the $item:30000046$?
(Hand over the $item:30000046$.)
You're a life-saver! This ring was custom-made, I would never have been able to replace it.
Sigh... But returning the promise ring isn't going to solve whatever made her angry in the first place.
I just know she's going to ask if I know what I did wrong. What am I supposed to say to that?
Listen, I'm really sorry to ask for another favor, but could you deliver this $item:30000046$ to my girlfriend $npc:11000224[gender:1]$? Maybe you could even figure out why she's angry for me...
What's wrong? Did I ask too much?
Hypothetically, what would you say if I lost the $item:30000046$?
Nope! I just got turned around.
Huh? Isn't that it on the floor right there? Please be more careful, it's the only one of its kind.
I saw you put it in your bag... is it not in there? Why don't you look again?
Your bag looks really full. Why don't you clean it up first?
Ah... Well, this place is pretty big.
Hmph! A $item:30000046$?! I don't need any more broken promises!
Why are you upset?
$npc:11000223[gender:0]$ is a two-bit cheat! He said I was PRETTIER than her! PRETTI-ER! That means he thinks she's pretty!
I thought we had a future together. But then some random girl smiles at him, and HE SMILES BACK?! He might as well have stuck a dagger in my heart!
But you said she smiled first...

And that boyfriend-thieving hussy should pay for what she did! But he shouldn't have smiled back. If he really loved me, the sheer radiance of my beauty should render all other women hideous in his eyes!
Is it possible you're overreacting just a tiny bit?
OVERREACTING?! He smiled at her! And I bet they're back there now making kissy-faces and planning about babies and stuff! I'm not even halfway through high school, and my life is over!
The only thing I want is a man who loves me unconditionally, and never so much as glances in the general direction of another woman. Is that really so much to ask for?
Wah! My shoes!
What's wrong?

Those monsters over there appeared out of nowhere while I was on my way to $map:02000023$. They stole my shoe pouch. All the pretty shoes I was going to gift my friends in $map:02000023$ were in there!
They took the shoes out of my pouch and scattered them everywhere. If I don't get them back, I won't have any gifts for my wonderful friends. Would you please help me find all of my shoes?
Please help me get all of my shoes back from the monsters. Please.
Thank you so much!
嗯，$MyPCName$？ 我能再请你帮个忙吗？
问是什么事。
我现在没办法离开这里。 你能帮我把这本<font color="#ffd200">不动产信息指南手册</font>， 送到<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000002$</font>的<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000246[gender:0]$</font>那里去吗？
怎么又回来了？
说走错路了。
哎呀……怎么这么不小心？ 给你。这次别再忘了。
刚才你好像放进背包了……没有吗？ 请你再找找看。
呼……不嫌重吗？背包里装了这么多东西…… 请整理一下吧。
呵呵呵呵呵～你到底在想什么，怎么会又回到这里了呢？ 是在想心上人吗？
你想找谁呢？
拿出不动产信息指南手册，说是$npc:11000185[gender:1]$送来的。
啊～！是我跟她要的。 在这里住得很腻了，我想<font color="#ffd200">搬到高级别墅</font>去。
让我来看看…… 嗯……
嗯～有些房子还挺不错的。 我要直接去看看，如果不错的话，就马上解除这座房子的合同， 搬到新家去住。
啊……一下子忙起来了。 要去看房子，还得收拾搬家行李…… $npc:11000401[gender:0]$那家伙一个人收拾行李应该会很累吧……
$MyPCName$！我会付钱给你。 在我去看房子的时候，你能<font color="#ffd200">在我家帮着收拾搬家行李吗？</font>
$MyPCName$！我会付钱给你。 在我去看房子的时候，你能<font color="#ffd200">在我家帮着收拾搬家行李吗？</font>
咦？你是谁？
$npc:11000246[gender:0]$派我来帮你收拾搬家行李。
啊……原来是这样…… 我正忙着收拾漫画书，都不知道有人来了……
呃……我什么时候收拾出了这么多东西……？ 既然你说要来帮忙，能帮我把这些东西搬到院子里去吗？
你能帮我把这些行李搬到院子里去吗？
你刚出来啊！ 行李打包好了吗？
说看得见的东西差不多都打包好了。
我去看了新公寓，签了一套新房子。 你帮我干活，我却连碗炸酱面都没请你吃。不过放心，我是不会亏待你的。
通缉对象：$npc:22000002[gender:0]$ 罪名：欺负无辜居民的流氓 抓住通缉犯者可获得巨额赏金
通缉对象：$npc:22000002[gender:0]$ 罪名：欺负无辜居民的流氓 抓住通缉犯者可获得巨额赏金
你抓到了$npc:22000002[gender:0]$？ 我们正在因为那个家伙而头疼呢。真是太好了！
Sigh...
What's wrong?
I finally found a way to win her over... With $item:30000065$! But $npc:22000002[gender:0]$ stole it, and now my dream is forever lost.
What's $item:30000065$?

There is a place called $map:02000089$ which was formed from tears shed over a missing lover. It is the only known source of $item:30000065$, a potion said to have the power to make those who consume it fall deeply in love. I went there and fulfilled $npc:11000285[gender:0]$ request in exchange for the potion, but I never got to use it...
But I can't give up on her... Even if one swing of $npc:22000002[gender:0]$'s hammer will undoubtedly be my doom.
Hmm... But you, you could defeat $npc:22000002[gender:0]$! Please, won't you recover the $item:30000065$?
Please recover the $item:30000065$ from $npc:22000002[gender:0]$. It's the only chance I have left.
You retrieved the $item:30000065$! Thank you so much. Now she'll have no choice but to love me!
You there! Want your fortune read?
You won't find a fortune teller with my skills anywhere else. And, because I'm in a good mood, I'll even read your fortune for free!
You won't find a fortune teller with my skills anywhere else. And, because I'm in a good mood, I'll even read your fortune for free!
Yes, yes. Very good. You have all the qualities one looks for in a great hero. Except... That's a shame.
What's a shame?
Oh, it's nothing. Nothing at all. Just focus on the positive. No point in struggling against fate...
Typical. I give you a nice fortune, but are you happy? No. You just have to find out about the bad things, too...

$MyPCName$! When your time comes, it will come quickly and with a bang. You can slap mushrooms to pieces all day long, but one day you'll run across a big monster like $npcName:23000020[gender:1]$, and then it will be curtains for you.
That is your fate. No matter how much you struggle, you will never overcome it.
Oh, I'll overcome the heck out of it!
Hey, we've all gotta go someday, right?
With those skills of yours? Never in a million years. In fact, I'm so sure you can't do it, I'll give you my whole fortune if you defeat $npcName:23000020[gender:1]$ and return with $item:30000068$.
Big words for a—Wait, what? You're giving up already?
That's... that's sad. Listen, maybe you can get some friends together and have a go at $npcName:23000020[gender:1]$. So chin up, okay?
In fact, if you bring me $item:30000068$, I'll give you a reward. You like rewards, right? Think of it as a celebration for overcoming fate.
If you bring me $item:30000068$, I'll give you a reward. You like rewards, right? Think of it as a celebration for overcoming fate.
Well, well, well. $item:30000068$. I didn't see that coming.
It's a rare soul who can change their own destiny. Keep it up.
Sniff...
Why are you crying?
My glass slippers... Sniff... They were stolen by the monsters of the forest. I never even got a chance to wear them! They were so pretty and I didn't want to scuff them up...

Some nice adventurers offered to find them, and searched a bunch of monsters nearby, but in the end they all gave up the search. <font color="#909090">(She wipes tears from the corners of her eyes.)</font>
Please find my glass slippers. I know the monsters have them! I don't blame them for wanting to feel pretty, but they're my slippers! Will you help me?
Please find my glass slippers. I know the monsters have them! I don't blame them for wanting to feel pretty, but they're my slippers! Will you help me?
Oh! That glimmering sheen! Did you really find them?
(You hand Arwen the slippers.)
I thought I'd never see them again! Thank you so much. <font color="#909090">(She hugs the slippers.)</font>
As a show of gratitude, I'll give you a special gift! I hope it will be of some help to you...
$MyPCName$…… 你也有心爱的人吗？
说有。
没有。
那你一定可以理解我的心。 我曾经有个心爱的恋人。那是比生命还要宝贵的爱。 但是……
<font color="#ffd200">阴影之门打开的那一天</font>…… 我和她沉睡的湖底深处出现了像兴起大风大浪的海面一般 汹涌的漩涡，<font color="#ffd200"> 她被卷了进去，停止了呼吸</font>。
我把她背在背上无助地哭了很久，等我醒来的时候， 发现<font color="#ffd200">我的眼泪汇聚成了这汪泉水</font>。 后来，<font color="#ffd200">我的背上开出了 一朵花</font>，就像是她在拥抱着我。
每当我背上的花朵<font color="#ffd200"> 落下种子的时候，我都会一边想念她， 一边把种子种在地上</font>。之后那里就会开出美丽的花。 但是……怪物把那些花全都踩死了。
$MyPCName$…… 你能帮我<font color="#ffd200">救活那些奄奄一息的花</font>吗？
那样的话，你可能很难完全理解我的心…… 我曾经有个心爱的恋人。那是比生命还要宝贵的爱。 但是……
<font color="#ffd200">阴影世界的门打开的那一天</font>…… 我和她沉睡的湖底深处出现了像大海一样 汹涌的漩涡，<font color="#ffd200"> 她被卷了进去，停止了呼吸</font>。
我把她背在背上无助地哭了很久，等我醒来的时候， 发现<font color="#ffd200">我的眼泪汇聚成了这汪泉水</font>。 后来，<font color="#ffd200">我的背上开出了 一朵花</font>，就像是她在拥抱着我。
每当我背上的花朵<font color="#ffd200"> 落下种子的时候，我都会一边想念她， 一边把种子种在地上</font>。之后那里就会开出美丽的花。 但是……怪物把那些花全都踩死了。
$MyPCName$…… 你能帮我<font color="#ffd200">救活那些奄奄一息的花</font>吗？
$MyPCName$…… 你能帮我<font color="#ffd200">救活那些奄奄一息的花</font>吗？
谢谢你，$MyPCName$……！ 希望你能和心爱的人在一起，永远过着幸福的生活……
我……再也受不了了。 我在宾迪树上幽静的家竟然被弄成了这样……
问是什么事。
那个叫<font color="#ffd200">黑暗之地</font>还是影子世界的地方重新开启的时候， 发生了强烈的地震，我的<font color="#ffd200">宾迪树因此倒掉了</font>，四分五裂…… 从那时开始，<font color="#ffd200">怪物就闯进了森林，啃食宾迪树的树皮，层层深入</font>。 最后，如你所见，这里已经被它们占领了。
所以我打算离开……但是因为觉得放在木桶里的 <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000052$</font>丢在这里很可惜，所以一直没走。 我想把它带走……用<font color="#ffd200">粘稠的蛛网</font>粘在我的毛上的话……呃……
$item:20000052$是我最喜欢吃的东西…… 你能帮我<font color="#ffd200">把木桶里的 $item:20000052$拿一些过来吗？</font> 不过也许已经被蜘蛛全部吃掉了……
$item:20000052$是我最喜欢吃的东西…… 你能帮我<font color="#ffd200">把木桶里的 $item:20000052$拿一些过来吗？</font> 不过也许已经被蜘蛛全部吃掉了……
唉！$MyPCName$！！ 谢谢你。总有一天，我一定会报答你的！！
Ribbit. Ribbit ribbit. R-r-r-ribbit...
Are you... crying?
Indeed I am, young one. Those horrible 'gogs have captured my children!
Please rescue my poor babies and release them in the water, where they belong. I beg of you!
Please rescue my poor babies and release them in the water, where they belong. I beg of you!
Thank you! Thank you! Ribbit! One day, my children and I will repay you for this.
Trouble... Big trouble!
What's wrong?
Something is transforming the forest into toy blocks! The trees, grass, and flowers are all hardening.
There are butterflies trapped inside those toy trees... But butterflies are meant to fly! Please go break the tree and release the butterflies!
There are butterflies trapped inside those toy trees... But butterflies are meant to fly! Please go break the tree and release the butterflies!
Yay! You're a good person. I bet the butterflies are grateful.
I'm really worried. We're experiencing a water shortage like I've never seen before, even in times of drought. And now the bedrock of the basin is exposed.
What happened?
There's a big waterfall a short ways south of here, but recently the water in the basin below has started slowly receding and transforming into ludibrium.
I don't know how many days it has been since I last watered my crops. I'm not sure how much longer they'll last.

The terrain around the waterfall is too treacherous to navigate, but perhaps there's still some water left in the basin? It would be amazing if you could have a look, and bring some back if you find any.

The terrain around the waterfall is too treacherous to navigate, but perhaps there's still some water left in the basin? It would be amazing if you could have a look, and bring some back if you find any.
So there was some water left after all. Thanks a bunch!
I've got a lot of thirsty plants, and even more ground to cover. Would you mind helping me a little longer?
I'll water the strawberries over here. Would you mind watering the carrot sprouts around my farm?
I'll water the strawberries over here. Would you mind watering the carrot sprouts around my farm?
Wow, all you did was spritz them with some water and the carrots popped right out of the ground. They must really have been thirsty. Thanks for the assistance!

My crops won't die for lack of water in the near future, but they're still in danger. There's a lot of hungry monsters out there eager to dig them up and eat them, or careless ones liable to trample right over them.
I'm sorry to impose, but could you do me one last favor? If you could thin the herd of aggressive monsters around here, it would really give me some peace of mind about my crop.
I'm sorry to impose, but could you do me one last favor? If you could thin the herd of aggressive monsters around here, it would really give me some peace of mind about my crop.
Thanks a ton! I hope one day I'll be able to farm in peace again.
<font color="#ffd200">$item:20000054$</font>很适合在猎鹰的时候用作诱饵！ 所以只要一上货，很快就会卖光。
昨天刚收到了一批新货，今天就全卖光了！ 你能再帮我去搜集一些<font color="#ffd200">$item:20000054$</font>吗？ 我会给你一大笔辛苦费！
昨天刚收到了一批新货，今天就全卖光了！ 你能再帮我去搜集一些<font color="#ffd200">$item:20000054$</font>吗？ 我会给你一大笔辛苦费！
哦！真是谢谢你！ 搜集到了这么多！你可真厉害～
Hey, maybe you can help me out. I hired $npcName:11000300[gender:0]$ to collect a $item:20000075$ for me, but I haven't heard a peep from him in ages!
He sent me a letter when he arrived at $map:02000039$ ages ago, and then... nothing! Can you go find out what happened to $npcName:11000300[gender:0]$?
He sent me a letter when he arrived at $map:02000039$ ages ago, and then... nothing! Can you go find out what happened to $npcName:11000300[gender:0]$?
$npcName:11000268[gender:1]$ sent you, didn't she?
She probably just wants to know what's taking so long. She doesn't care what happens to me at all!

There's a rumor going around town that $item:20000075$ can be used to cure all kinds of things—back pain, gout, mascot's itch, all that. That's why $npcName:11000268[gender:1]$'s so eager to get the stuff in stock.

I thought I could take care of this, but—Gosh, I hate to admit this. See, I've got this fear of falling down a hole and dying. And it turns out that the $npcName:22000005$ lives in a deep, dark hole...
I've got an idea! Why don't you jump into this hole here, beat the $npcName:22000005$, and deliver its tail to $npcName:11000268[gender:1]$ for me?
I'll leave the delivery to you. Who'd've thunk the $npcName:22000005$ would live in such a scary place?
I see you've returned with the $item:20000075$. Well, if you're going to do $npcName:11000300[gender:0]$'s job, it's only fair that you get his pay, too. Thanks.
What're you doing out here in the middle of nowhere?
I could ask you the same.
Chief $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$ hired me and my crew to set up an outpost here. Seems the monsters in the area have been getting out of hand, see.
I've seen it with my own two eyes. Bunch of beasties rampaged through my site and stole my $itemPlural:30000077$.
Maybe you could do me a solid and track down my stolen $itemPlural:30000077$. I'll make it worth your time.
The monsters who took the $itemPlural:30000077$ should still be around here somewhere.
Hey, that was pretty quick. I could use some workers with your drive!
Well, I got my $itemPlural:30000077$, so I guess this break is over. I don't suppose you're headed to $map:02000051$ next...
My bud $npcName:11000271[gender:0]$ is in $map:02000051$. He's the best building supplies dealer anywhere. And he's handsome, too. A real charmer!
He asked me to fetch some $itemPlural:30000015$ from the site. They're not too hard to find. Just dig up some rocks and you'll find them.
I don't have time to dig through the muck, even for a handsome fella like him. Can't say I'm too pleased to let him down, though. Mind digging up some $itemPlural:30000015$ and bringing them to him?
I don't have time to dig through the muck, even for a handsome fella like him. Can't say I'm too pleased to let him down, though. Mind digging up some $itemPlural:30000015$ and bringing them to him?
Ah, I smell $itemPlural:30000015$! $npcName:11000301[gender:0]$ must have sent you.
Why do you want this, anyway?
I use them to make $itemPlural:50100076$, of course. Just harden the muck and smooth it out. Rustic types go wild for it!
To thank you, I'd like to give you this $item:50100076$ on the house. I'm sure it'll look great in your home.
$npc:11000303[gender:0]$的诅咒祈祷好像又开始了。 熔岩开始沸腾起来了……
$npc:11000303[gender:0]$是谁？
啊，你想知道$npc:11000303[gender:0]$是谁吗？ 他原来和我一样，是实习祭司长。 他曾经是我们的同伴，比任何人都要聪明…… 自从他爱上了<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000039[gender:1]$</font>，那便是一切悲剧的开始。
$npc:11000039[gender:1]$拒绝了他的爱。$npc:11000303[gender:0]$因此对 $npc:11000039[gender:1]$怀恨在心，他戴上了带有邪恶诅咒的<font color="#ffd200">吞巴族的面具</font>， 来到了沙漏顶部的祭坛，开始对$npc:11000039[gender:1]$进行诅咒。
已经过去好几年了…… 也许是因为这个，$npc:11000039[gender:1]$的健康大不如前了。 我们必须阻止诅咒！

请你用祭坛边缘的<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000079$</font>点燃祭坛周围的<font color="#ffd200">4个火把</font>。 那样的话，<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000303[gender:0]$</font>就会出现。 请你除掉他，然后把带有诅咒的<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000080$</font>交给我。

请你用祭坛边缘的<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000079$</font>点燃祭坛周围的<font color="#ffd200">4个火把</font>。 那样的话，<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000303[gender:0]$</font>就会出现。 请你除掉他，然后把带有诅咒的<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000080$</font>交给我。
$npc:11000303[gender:0]$是个很难对付的对手，你竟然打败了他。 真了不起！
现在我必须回到$npc:11000039[gender:1]$那里去。 这个面具上的诅咒……只有$npc:11000039[gender:1]$的祈祷才能解开。
嗯……怎么还不来……
问在等谁。
我在等$npc:11000302[gender:1]$。 她说要到$map:02000046$去为$npc:11000039[gender:1]$祈祷。 但是去了很久都没有回来……
她让我去搜集神殿中祈祷时需要使用的物品，我已经全部准备好了…… 我担心会不会发生了什么事。你能去$map:02000046$ 寻找$npc:11000302[gender:1]$吗？
她让我去搜集神殿中祈祷时需要使用的物品，我已经全部准备好了…… 我担心会不会发生了什么事。你能去$map:02000046$ 寻找$npc:11000302[gender:1]$吗？
$npc:11000272[gender:1]$正在找我？ 啊……但是现在我还不能回去。
Ah, $MyPCName$? Would you do me a favor if you're heading out?
What do you need?
I found the title that $npcName:11000327[gender:1]$ has been searching all over for, $item:30000087$. I left it on top of that book cart over there. Would you mind delivering it to her for me?
I found the title that $npcName:11000327[gender:1]$ has been searching all over for, $item:30000087$. I left it on top of that book cart over there. Would you mind delivering it to her for me?
Hmm? $npcName:11000005[gender:1]$ found the book? May I see it please?
(Hand over $item:30000087$.)
Oh my, there is a record of it!
A record of what?

Here, look at this excerpt from Perion's history... "In the end, the shaman $npc:21000425[gender:0]$'s plan to conquer the land using dark magic was foiled, and he was sealed forever in the depths of the $map:02000047$ by a priestess of the order."

Several days ago, on an expedition to the ruins of the $map:02000047$, I discovered an altar that seems to have once belonged to an ancient shaman. I've gone through all sorts of documents pertaining to the temple, but I've found next to nothing about it.
Wait, this is all they have on $npc:21000425[gender:0]$? This is hardly a footnote... There's got to be more!
There's an antiques collector named $npcName:11000328[gender:0]$ who might know something more about the legend of $npc:21000425[gender:0]$.
$MyPCName$! How would you like to go on a trip to $map:02000076$? All you have to do is ask $npcName:11000328[gender:0]$ if he knows anything about $npc:21000425[gender:0]$'s story.
$MyPCName$! How would you like to go on a trip to $map:02000076$? All you have to do is ask $npcName:11000328[gender:0]$ if he knows anything about $npc:21000425[gender:0]$'s story.
$npc:21000425[gender:0]$? Hmm... I feel like I've heard that name before.
Oh that's right! When I visited Perion, I spoke with the sage $npc:11000039[gender:1]$ about the exploits of her predecessor, who is said to have been the one to do in $npc:21000425[gender:0]$.

$npc:21000425[gender:0]$ was a shaman who was exiled from Perion after committing a grave mistake. Rather than spending his days atoning for his errors, he attempted to use dark magic to summon a demon sealed away long ago, with the intent of destroying Perion.

Fortunately, the sage happened upon the ancient temple where $npc:21000425[gender:0]$ was hiding, and discovered his machinations. She cleaved off his head with a ceremonial sword, and hid it away. His dark magic kept him alive, but he wanders about searching for his lost head to this day.

I'm not quite sure where the ancient temple is. But according to myth, if you hang a $item:30000088$ on the altar where $npc:21000425[gender:0]$ practiced his wicked sorcery, he will come to claim it, in hopes of finding his lost head.
$item:30000087$ tells a slightly different story....
Well, legends and truth rarely see eye to eye. Can I see that book? Oh! So all this transpired in the $map:02000047$. Now all you need is a $item:30000088$ to discover if the legend is true.
Where would I get a $item:30000088$?

I can see you're serious about this! Well, you'll have to do a lot of searching, but you should be able to find a $item:30000088$ on the $npcPlural:21000225$ of $map:02000056$. Believe it or not, a whole heap of them knocked over a tourist shop a while back and made off with a handful of masks.
I suppose they took issue with their deceased siblings being used to earn a quick meso. Can't say I blame them.

Well, you'll have to do a lot of searching, but you should be able to find a $item:30000088$ on the $npcPlural:21000225$ of $map:02000056$. Believe it or not, a whole heap of them knocked over a tourist shop a while back and made off with a handful of masks.
You found a $item:30000088$? Hehe. You're a tenacious one.
Now all that remains is to take this $item:30000088$ to the $map:02000047$ and find out if the legend is true or not.
Where is the $map:02000047$?
Do you know of the $map:02000060$? It forms a border between the regions of Ellinia and Perion. Somewhere in its western hills, you'll find the $map:02000047$.
If you actually encounter $npc:21000425[gender:0]$ there, you must defeat him. He is a danger to the world.
If you actually encounter $npc:21000425[gender:0]$ in the $map:02000047$, you must defeat him. He is a danger to the world.
You're finally back? I asked you to take a trip to $map:02000076$, not a vacation. What took so long? Anyways, did you learn anything about $npc:21000425[gender:0]$?
(Tell her about your journey to the $map:02000047$.)
Y-you... You really defeated $npc:21000425[gender:0]$?
Yep!
No! You should have taken me with you! You could have damaged irreplaceable historical artifacts! I've got to arrange an expedition to $map:02000047$ and thoroughly document the place!
I, uhh, wouldn't recommend that.
Oh yeah, you should go right now.
I may not look very tough, but I'm a seasoned archaeologist! I've lived through more snake pits and poison darts and ancient curses than you can imagine.
In any case, thank you for your concern, and the information. I'm just disappointed that I never got to see $npc:21000425[gender:0]$ in person...
I will! This is an archaeologist's dream. A once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to elevate legend to historical fact!
In any case, thank you for your research. I'm just disappointed that I never got to see $npc:21000425[gender:0]$ in person...
Who are you, anyway? What are you doing here?
$npc:11000244[gender:1]$ sent me to retrieve the $item:30000084$ she ordered.
Good luck with that. To unlock the storage device containing the $item:30000084$, you'd have to first get the master key card from $npc:11000335[gender:0]$...
Which he'll probably give you right away... if you free him. He's, uh, kind of in a tough spot right now.
The robots are holding $npc:11000335[gender:0]$ hostage in the lower part of the lab, toward the west. Please... we can't lose his genius. You have to save him!
The robots are holding $npc:11000335[gender:0]$ hostage in the lower part of the lab, toward the west. Please... we can't lose his genius. You have to save him!
I suppose $npc:11000335[gender:0]$ isn't a swindler after all. But why couldn't he meet me personally, as agreed?
Malfunctioning robots were holding him hostage in an electric field.
I see. You don't suppose this $item:30000084$ will malfunction, too, do you?
Oh, never mind. I've paid you, now run along.
How much longer do I need to wait? Have I been swindled?
Who are you waiting for?

$npc:11000335[gender:0]$. He said he'd make me a maid robot, the very latest model. I even placed a hefty deposit on it, the cost of half a dozen apartment buildings in Tria. But it's been several days, and I haven't heard a peep.

Why is it so hard to find good help these day? The train to $map:02000100$ departs soon, so I suppose you'll have to do. Run along to the $map:02000163$ and retrieve my $item:30000084$. Don't fret, I'll reward you handsomely.

Why is it so hard to find good help these day? The train to $map:02000100$ departs soon, so I suppose you'll have to do. Run along to the $map:02000163$ and retrieve my $item:30000084$. Don't fret, I'll reward you handsomely.
Ugh...
What's wrong?
I... I don't know! The robots from the lab just suddenly started attacking! I think they must be malfunctioning or something.
Hey! Adventurer! Over here! Do you know how to get to the hotel at the top of this cliff?
I sure do! Need help with something?
No way! I know what you have in mind.
Yes! I was making a delivery to $map:02000178$ when my cart overturned.
I thought of carrying my bread boxes one by one, but those stairs go up a looong way. How about you help me out?
Come on, I know it's a lot of work, but this bread isn't going to deliver itself. And with my cart overturned, I don't have a lot of options here.
I thought of carrying my bread boxes one by one, but those stairs go up a looong way. How about you help me out?
I thought of carrying my bread boxes one by one, but those stairs go up a looong way. How about you help me out?
Ah, ah, ah! The heavenly scent of bread from the Mendel Confectionery! How long has it been since this divine aroma has wafted through my nostrils?
I sampled these lovely baked goods every day when the hotel was located in $map:02000087$, but I haven't had them once since it was moved here to $map:02000171$.
Moved? You mean, since you built a new hotel?
No, I mean MOVED! One day, we're in $map:02000087$, and the next day I step outside and we're here in $map:02000171$, two sneezes from toppling off this wretched cliff!
We were all stunned. Frightened, even. Not just the guests, but the hotel employees as well.
The only one who took it in stride was $npc:11000341[gender:1]$, who was calm as you please. But now, you see, this hotel has become a landmark of $map:02000171$.
And here we are today, getting bread delivered from the Mendel Confectionery! Life is full of surprises, isn't it?
What am I just standing around for? The hotelier said to get a sample of the bread to him the moment it's delivered!
Would you mind bringing this $item:30000091$ to $npcName:11000340[gender:0]$? He's too courteous to yell at a guest.
Yes? What brings you back here?
I, uhh... misplaced the $item:30000091$.
Where's the hotel again?
Ah, that's because I still have it, you see? I must have forgotten to give it to you. Now, off you go!
No, you didn't. It's right here in your bag. Really, there's no reason to be nervous. You won't get yelled at.
Your bag looks really full. I would hate for the sample to get crushed...
It would be my pleasure to direct you to the entrance of the hotel. Take two steps to your left, and you'll see the grand doorway.
Wait a moment, that scent is...
Of course! It's the bread from the Mendel Confectionery! Tsk, $npcName:11000339[gender:0]$ was supposed to deliver this. To force his duties upon a guest...

Allow me to apologize on this behalf. We at the $map:02000178$ pride ourselves on our service. The fact that we're perilously perched upon the edge of a cliff does not change that, not so long as $npc:11000341[gender:1]$ and I are around!
That is why I asked for a sample of the bread. I must taste it first, to ensure it is of the same quality as it was back at $map:02000087$. Only then can I serve it to our guests!
Ah, it is as I expected. One nibble, and I am transported to heaven! Little by little, we are restoring the hotel to its former glory!
欢迎光临！$MyPCName$！我们旅馆还在$map:02000087$的时候，你曾经来过吗？
没有。
真遗憾…… 在<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000087$</font>的时候，我们<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000178$</font> 一直人来人往，熙熙攘攘。
我们安德雷亚家族没落之后，留下的财产只有家族的庄园， 当时的我决定放弃<font color="#ffd200">大富豪安德雷亚家族的女继承人</font>称号。 之后我改造了庄园，开办了$map:02000178$， 自此人们开始称呼我<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000341[gender:1]$</font>。
$npc:11000340[gender:0]$一直以来都是安德雷亚家族的管家。 家族没落之后，所有人都离开了，只有他一直陪在我的身边守护。 现在他成了我们旅馆的经理……我非常感激他。
<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000178$</font>就像是另一个我。 这就是虽然我们来到了这个悬崖上，但却<font color="#ffd200">仍然不放弃$map:02000178$的理由</font>。
我相信我们旅馆一定可以恢复原来的样子。 大厅里人来人往，到处都充满了活力。 为此，我和$npc:11000340[gender:0]$一直在努力，并取得了一些成果。
但是……还有一件事还没有完美解决。 那就是还没能赢得原本生活在$map:02000171$的原住民 <font color="#ffd200">克洛普部落</font>的心。 他们至今还把我们旅馆视作是异邦人。
必须赢得他们的心，我们$map:02000178$才能在这里站稳脚跟， 才能完全恢复原来的样子。 所以……你能去$map:02000171$消灭掉那些骚扰原住民的怪物吗？
如果感觉到我们旅馆和我的存在会给自己的生活带来帮助， <font color="#ffd200">克洛普部落</font>一定会向我们敞开心扉。
你能去$map:02000171$消灭掉那些骚扰原住民的怪物吗？
啊，真是……谢谢你。 请拭目以待吧，$map:02000178$的未来！
啊……怎么会这样…… 都是我的错……
问是什么事。
<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000053$</font>原来是我们<font color="#ffd200">白色独角兽的领地</font>。 这里充满了魔法密林中最干净的<font color="#ffd200">净化气息</font>…… 但是由于我的失误，我的朋友们全部被灵魂附了身。
有个长得和<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000032[gender:0]$</font>很像的<font color="#ffd200">小孩子</font>，说有个恶灵正在 吞噬自己的灵魂，让我<font color="#ffd200">帮帮他</font>…… 为了净化那个孩子的灵魂，我把他带到了这里。 但是，就在那一刻……！！
邪恶的黑暗从<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000172$</font>中涌了出来，包围了那个孩子，把她带走了。 之后……<font color="#ffd200">邪恶的黑暗开始蚕食朋友们的灵魂</font>。
那件事之后……$map:02000053$失去了所有的净化气息， 变成了堕落的独角兽的森林。 我听到了朋友们在黑暗中痛苦挣扎的哭声。
勇敢的人…… 你能<font color="#ffd200">驱散支配他们灵魂的黑暗气息，让他们的灵魂恢复自由</font>吗？
勇敢的人…… 你能<font color="#ffd200">驱散支配他们灵魂的黑暗气息，让他们的灵魂恢复自由</font>吗？
谢谢你……虽然我的朋友们失去了生命，但他们找回了纯洁的灵魂。 我代替他们，向你表示感谢。 虽然我永远都无法还清对他们犯下的罪行……
但是就算时光倒转……看到那个被黑暗气息带走的孩子 那恳切的眼神，我真的可以视而不见吗……？
Hmm...
What's on your mind?
An axe-wielding zombie, if you can believe it. We've had reports of an undead menace based out of the $map:02000082$ in $map:02000059$ plaguing those who dwell nearby.
Naturally, I took a group of Green Hoods to investigate, but the fiend proved elusive, despite his great size.

Whoever he was in life, he is nothing more than a $npc:22000011[gender:0]$ now. For many years, the $map:02000082$ where he resides was sealed away. But somehow it seems that old tomb has been reopened, unleashing the horrors that dwell within.

The people are growing restless, spreading ridiculous rumors. They say that even a graze from his mighty axe will turn one into a zombie. Even if such claims are devoid of truth, it falls on us to protect the people.
The fiend must be defeated, and his axe reclaimed for disposal.
$MyPCName$, should you come across this $npc:22000011[gender:0]$, you must be certain to relieve him of both his axe and his afterlife. The peoples' safety depends on it.
$MyPCName$, should you come across this $npc:22000011[gender:0]$, you must be certain to relieve him of both his axe and his afterlife. The peoples' safety depends on it.
Well done, $MyPCName$! You've done a noble deed by dispatching the $npc:22000011[gender:0]$.
啊……这可真是……
问发生了什么事。
我的斧头经常不见。 一定是被$npc:21000041$偷走了。 几个月前也发生过同样的事。
问$npc:21000041$为什么要偷走斧头。
我也想知道。 更奇怪的是，那些家伙偷走樵夫的斧头之后， 会插在自己身上。 这种事情已经不是一次两次了……
人们开始把<font color="#ffd200">身上插着斧头的木妖，称为$npc:21000045$</font>。 丢失斧头的樵夫齐心协力，成功地把它们赶到了北边。 之后的很长一段时间里，再也没发生过斧头消失的事件……
这次又发生了同样的事。 听说最近<font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000045$</font>经常在<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000058$</font> 出没……你能去把被它们<font color="#ffd200">偷走的斧头</font>给找回来吗？
<font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000045$</font>经常在<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000058$</font> 出没……你能去把被它们<font color="#ffd200">偷走的斧头</font>给找回来吗？
让我看看……没错，没错。斧头柄上刻着我的名字。 辛苦你了。真的非常感谢。
但是这些家伙……又把我的斧头偷走干什么……唉…… 得弄明白这些家伙为什么要做出这种事才行。
<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000328[gender:0]$</font>对世上的事情无所不知， 也许他会知道些什么。 你能去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000076$</font>，帮我问问他吗？
<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000328[gender:0]$</font>对世上的事情无所不知， 也许他会知道些什么。 你能去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000076$</font>，帮我问问他吗？
你有问题想问我？ 什么问题？
问$npc:21000045$为什么要把斧头插在身上。
嗯……老实说，我从来没有想过。 树被斧头砍，又不是什么新闻。 嗯……啊！！对了……以前我好像<font color="#ffd200">从$npc:11000001[gender:0]$那里 听到过一个奇怪的故事</font>。
$map:02000051$的大族长$npc:11000134[gender:0]$在很久以前偶然遇到了 一群$npc:21000041$，他本想多砍些木柴。 但是有个少女跑过来，哭闹着阻止了他。
一般来说，小孩子见到$npc:21000041$之后，都会因为害怕而逃跑才对。 那个女孩是不是很奇怪？ 嗯，虽然好像和你的问题没什么关系，不过因为感觉很神奇，所以就想起来了。
而且当时好像还没有$npc:21000045$……
从<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000134[gender:0]$</font>手中救下<font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000041$的那个少女</font>…… 会不会知道一些关于$npc:21000045$的事情呢？
你到$npc:11000001[gender:0]$那里去，问问$npc:11000134[gender:0]$有没有提到过 那个少女是谁吧。
你到$npc:11000001[gender:0]$那里去，问问$npc:11000134[gender:0]$有没有提到过 那个少女是谁吧。
看你的眼神，好像有什么话要问我。到底有什么事？
那个从$npc:11000134[gender:0]$手上救了木妖的少女是谁啊？
啊！你是说我的老朋友$npc:11000134[gender:0]$遇到的奇怪事件吧？ 以前$npc:11000134[gender:0]$偶然遇到了一群$npc:21000041$， 想要把它们砍了，但是有个少女跑过来阻止了他。 大大的眼睛泪眼汪汪的。
看到女孩的眼泪之后，他一时心软便放过了$npc:21000041$。 之后，他问那个女孩。 你为什么不害怕$npc:21000041$，而要保护它们呢…… 那个女孩回答道……
有一天，<font color="#ffd200">她遇到一个被樵夫砍伤的木妖，头上还插着樵夫的斧头。 于是她拔掉了斧头，帮它精心治疗</font>。 从那以后，她就和$npc:21000041$们成了特殊的朋友……
那个女孩……好像是叫<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000188[gender:1]$</font>……她这人还是挺神奇的。 真是她用一颗温暖的心，跟孤僻古怪的$npc:21000041$变成了朋友。
但是过了几年之后，$npc:11000134$又遇到了一件非常<font color="#ffd200">奇怪的事</font>。 有一天他正在努力修炼，等睁开眼睛的时候，发现远处有一个木妖 呆呆地站在那里…… 刚开始他没有在意，但是过了好几天，那个家伙却还是站在那里。
他以为它已经死了，不过仔细一看，那家伙正呆呆地望着山下， <font color="#ffd200">好像在等什么人</font>。 后来，它突然把斧头顶在头上，向$npc:11000134[gender:0]$走了过来。 然后它把斧头拿下来，把头伸到他的跟前。
虽然语言不通，但$npc:11000134$似乎能明白它的意思…… 不知道为什么，他拿起斧头，插在了那个家伙的头上。 那样做一定非常疼，但那个家伙<font color="#ffd200">却带着斧头回到了老地方， 继续在那里呆呆地望着远方</font>。
现在回想起来，也许那个家伙是在<font color="#ffd200">等待$npc:11000188[gender:1]$</font>……
如果我记得没错， <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000188[gender:1]$好像住在$map:02000085$</font>…… 你去找找看吧。
如果我记得没错， <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000188[gender:1]$好像住在$map:02000085$</font>…… 你去找找看吧。
$MyPCName$……咳咳咳咳……
问身体怎么样了。
因为奶奶的精心照料，正在慢慢好起来。 你来这里有什么事吗……？
讲述关于$npc:21000045$的故事。
啊……那件事…… 没错……在我被冻住之前，曾经照顾过那些$npc:21000041$。 后来变成了冰块，就没办法再去了……$npc:21000041$们为了等我， 竟然那样伤害自己……
一想到$npc:21000045$往自己身上插斧头…… 我的心很痛……
希望不要再有$npc:21000045$往自己身上插斧头了…… 那该有多疼啊……
$MyPCName$，现在我还不能动，请你去帮我 转告那些樵夫大叔。 让他们不要觉得$npc:21000045$很讨厌，咳咳咳咳。
$MyPCName$，现在我还不能动，请你去帮我 转告那些樵夫大叔。 让他们不要觉得$npc:21000045$很讨厌，咳咳咳咳。
啊，你来啦。 你一直没有回来，我还以为是把我的委托给忘了呢。 怎么样了？
讲述有关$npc:21000045$的故事。
啊……原来是这样…… 知道了$npc:21000045$的故事之后，感觉它们也挺可怜的……
啊……这可真是……
问是什么事。
巨大的玩具城陨石落在了后山的森林里。 好在那里人迹罕至，没有人受伤…… 但是那个陨石……
我突然想到，那个东西好好加工一下的话， 也许可以做成很漂亮的装修材料。 啊，但是又不能丢下生意跑到那里去……
你能去$map:02000014$，帮我捡一些陨石碎片回来吗？ 我会好好酬谢你的。
你能去$map:02000014$，帮我捡一些陨石碎片回来吗？ 我会好好酬谢你的。
啊哈，材质非常独特。 辛苦你了。
Mm! Such a sweet smell! And the consistency turned out just right. $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ would have loved it if he was here. Would you mind doing me a favor dear?
Sure.

Just outside of $map:02000001$ is a place called the $map:02000017$. $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ told me he was building a house there. I'd love it if you'd take him this fresh pudding as a housewarming gift. I just know he'd love it.
Back already?
I lost the pudding.
I just wanted to chat.
Oh, what a shame to lose such a delicious treat. But it's easy to lose your footing out there in the woods. Not to worry, there's plenty more where that came from! I'll wrap some up for you, dear.
Now, now, don't be greedy dear. I can see it right there in your bag.
Your bag looks really heavy. Why don't you clear it out?
I wish that homes in $map:02000001$ were a little cheaper. I would have loved to have $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ as a neighbor. Such a nice man!
Oh! That heavenly smell! It must be $item:30000122$! Right?
(Hand over the $item:30000122$.)
Mm, yes! My nose was right! If I had enough money, I could live next door to $npc:11000002[gender:1]$ and eat tasty things every day... What a pity.
But what can I do? Houses are so expensive in $map:02000001$, I couldn't dream of buying one. That's why I decided to build a house here.
This place is beautiful and affordable, since it hasn't been developed as a residential area. And I'm almost done with preparations to build my house...

If you follow the path west of here, you'll reach a place called $map:02000041$. It used to be part of Ellinia forest, until humans ruined it by cutting down the trees, and trampling all over the grass to see the lake.

I want the $map:02000017$ and $map:02000041$ to return the way they were before humans came and wrecked them. That's why I planted trees all over the place... but they're dying because the tree bugs keep gnawing their tops off.
$npcPlural:29000022$ love hiding under the rocks around the trees in $map:02000041$. Please get rid of those wriggling menaces as soon as you can.
$npcPlural:29000022$ love hiding under the rocks around the trees in $map:02000041$. Please get rid of those wriggling menaces as soon as you can.
Thank you very much. One day, this whole region will be a forest again.
You seem weak. You really shouldn't be playing here.
Who're you calling weak?
You.

If you'd like to keep your insides on the inside and your outsides on the outside, then you'd be wise not to wander around here like a tourist. Bump into $npc:22300105[gender:0]$, and it might just be the last thing you ever do.
How strong is this $npcName:22300105[gender:0]$ guy?
Super. Super, super strong. A pipsqueak like you couldn't take him. But if you really want to try, be my guest.

If you'd like to keep your insides on the inside and your outsides on the outside, then you'd be wise not to wander around here like a tourist. Bump into $npc:22300105[gender:0]$, and it might just be the last thing you ever do.
You defeated $npcName:22300105[gender:0]$...? Impressive. I wonder if his serum wore off.
His what? What are you talking about?

Well, all I know about $npcName:22300105[gender:0]$'s life before $npc:11000173[gender:0]$ hired him is some rumors I heard. Some say he was born with that monstrous strength. Descended from some legendary race of giants.
But the rumor I find most believable is that he was just some weak kid who got bullied a lot growing up. So he took some kind of special pill that transformed him into what he is now.
What kind of pill?
If I knew that, I'd have used it myself by now!
They say Goldus Pharmaceutical created it for testing, but honestly, it sounds pretty sketchy to me.
Just you watch! I'll have my vengeance!
You mad, bro?
That terrible beast has gone too far! Papa and I were weapon merchants here at this castle before the Blue Lapenta shattered and $npc:23000024[gender:1]$ awoke.

Everyone in the castle fled, but papa and I stayed up too late the night before making yellow snow cones as free gifts to go with every purchase, so $npc:23000024[gender:1]$ took us by surprise. Papa died defending me... but I will have my revenge!
I just... can't do it alone. $npc:23000024[gender:1]$ is really strong. You seem awfully hero-like. Do you want to help me?
Sure!
That'd be a hard pass.
Yes! I believe in you! Even though we've just met.
But what if... I gave you a gift? C'mon, you can't refuse, right?
Defeat $npc:23000024[gender:1]$ for me, and I'll give you a gift!
You did it! You avenged papa's death! Thank you, $MyPCName$! But... what do I do with my life now?

My mom worries about me so much since I've moved away. I spoke with a girl named $npc:11000420[gender:1]$ from $map:02000111$, which is just a little way down the road, and she says it's a wonderful place to live.

I'd like to investigate moving there, but I've got too much to do right now. Would you mind scoping it out? If it really is a nice place, maybe I'll move my mom out there too, so she can stop worrying about me.

I'd like to investigate moving to $map:02000111$, but I've got too much to do right now. Would you mind scoping it out? If it really is a nice place, maybe I'll move my mom out there too, so she can stop worrying about me.
Hm? $npc:11000360[gender:0]$ asked you to look into his moving here?
Yep!
He told me he had too much work to do in $map:02000086$. Maybe he's changed his mind. Do you really think he'd want to move here?
He's certainly thinking about it.
What's taking him so long to decide? I guess it doesn't matter anyway. This place really used to be a good place live, until recently...
What do you mean?
So many things have gone wrong! A huge, scary turtle appeared out of nowhere, my mom's fish store isn't doing nearly as well as before, crime's gone up. Maybe I'll tell him not to come here...
Sigh... I wonder where that turtle came from...
What's wrong?
Do you see the island across the water? Lots of tourist liked to go there and enjoy the view, which in turn allowed me to make a good living off my business.

But after that behemoth turtle showed up and started harassing people, all my business dried up. If I had to guess I'd say it came up here to exact revenge for people polluting its ocean home. But if this goes on I won't be able to feed my family.

If enough people got together, they could chase that mean old turtle away. I know it's not the right solution, but I can't live like this. Next time that turtle shows up, won't you please round up some friends to chase him away?

If enough people got together, they could chase that mean old turtle away. I know it's not the right solution, but I can't live like this. Next time that turtle shows up, won't you please round up some friends to chase him away?
Thank you so much! Now the tourists should finally come back, and with them, my business. I like to think that turtle went back to where it used to live.
Hm... That $npc:11000055[gender:0]$! The book he borrowed is long overdue, but I haven't heard a peep out of him! What if he lost it?
If you happen to bump into $npc:11000055[gender:0]$ would you mind telling him to return it? I'll give him until tomorrow.
If you happen to bump into $npc:11000055[gender:0]$ would you mind telling him to return it? I'll give him until tomorrow.
Oh, right! I forgot again! I'll return it right away!
Take a look at the passage in this book here! Did you know that?
This book, Forest Legends and Folktales, has a story about $npc:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npc:22000004[gender:1]$. They're really evil!

It says here that $npc:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npc:22000004[gender:1]$ were lake elves who fell deeply in love with a human named Alberto. They were so jealous of his fiance, Roanna, that they killed her and stole her jewel box containing the beautiful ruby necklace Alberto had gifted her.
$npc:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npc:22000004[gender:1]$ were supposedly banished to the cold snowy region in the north for what they did. But do you know what the scariest part is?
I heard from $npcName:11000327[gender:1]$ that $npc:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npc:22000004[gender:1]$ have reappeared!
They did? Where?!
Uh, she told me, but... I forgot. Would you go ask $npcName:11000327[gender:1]$ where it was? I really want to know, so I can make sure I never go there.
$npcName:11000327[gender:1]$ said that $npc:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npc:22000004[gender:1]$ reappeared, but I cant remember where. You should ask her if you're curious.
$npc:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npc:22000004[gender:1]$?
I didn't see them myself. I heard it from an explorer I happened to meet. $npc:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npc:22000004[gender:1]$ were sighted somewhere in $map:02000041$.

You won't find this in any book, but there are rumors that $npc:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npc:22000004[gender:1]$ fled from the snowfields of the north and returned to $map:02000041$. If that explorer really saw them, that's a huge find.

If they really have the necklace and jewel box that Alberto supposedly gifted Roanna as a token of love, that proves there is truth to the legend. Heck, it could validate the entirety of Forest Legends and Folktales!

We have the opportunity to make history and to confirm the myth...! Isn't that exciting? Will you go and see if $npc:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npc:22000004[gender:1]$ are in possession of those historical artifacts? If they do, they deserve everything that's coming!
Will you go and see if $npc:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npc:22000004[gender:1]$ are in possession of those historical artifacts? If they do, they deserve everything that's coming!
These are... the ruby necklace and jewel box that Alberto gifted Roanna as tokens of his love... They match their descriptions exactly!
But that means that the tragedy of Alberto and Roanna is true... How sad.
I did some research while you were out and learned that Roanna's grave is located somewhere atop the big tree in the northwest $map:02000017$.
I've heard that there's a grave marker for an unknown individual beside Roanna's... Perhaps Alberto wasted away mourning his love, and was buried by a kind soul passing through.
In any case, it's time to return these trinkets to their rightful owner. Would you be so kind as to go to and place them in front of Roanna's grave?
Back already?
I misplaced the $item:30000133$.
Nope! I just got turned around.
Oh! You left it right here, silly. Take better care of it this time, okay?
Didn't you put it in your bag? Maybe check again.
Your bag looks really full... Why don't you clear some space?
Still not used to $map:02000001$'s layout yet?

<font color="#909090">(Deep within the forest and off the beaten path, you discover an old headstone and a nameless grave marker standing sentinel alongside it. There is an inscription on the headstone.)</font>
Here lies Roanna Levematri. She leaves behind her lover Alberto, whose heart will never heal.
<font color="#909090">(You should pull up the weeds in front of the headstone and leave the jewel box there.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(It's $npcName:11000422$.)</font>
(Look around for $item:30000133$.)
(Read the headstone's inscription.)
<font color="#909090">(You place $item:30000133$ in your bag.)</font>
<font color="#909090">($item:30000133$ is already in your bag.)</font>
<font color="#909090">($item:30000133$ is sitting beside the headstone, but there's nowhere in your bag to put it.)</font>
Here lies Roanna Levematri. She leaves behind her lover Alberto, whose heart will never heal.
Thank you for going to all this trouble. While all this started as a curiosity, I find myself moved by the story of Alberto and Roanna. I hope that they have found peace together in the afterlife.
It makes me happy that we were able to return the tokens of their love and find justice for Roanna's untimely demise.
I bet that Alberto and Roanna are grateful too, wherever they may be now.
This seems like a terrible idea...
What's on your mind?

Err... I'm considering grabbing onto one of those vultures and letting it carry me over to $npc:11000427[gender:0]$... Between the snowstorms and the murderous shadow monsters, it's too dangerous to go on foot.

Sigh... But holding on to the wild vultures is dangerous too, even when their flight patterns are bizarrely regular. I could fall to my death, or get carried somewhere else entirely. But I have to get this $item:30000141$ to $npc:11000427[gender:0]$...
Hey... You don't look like you're afraid of traveling by vulture. Do you think you could help me out?
Why did you come back?
Did I leave the $item:30000141$ here?
Nope! I just got turned around.
Oh yeah, it's right here. Here you go.
I saw you put it in your bag. Maybe have another look?
How do you travel with such a heavy bag? You should get rid of some of that junk...
Oh. All you have to do is wait for a vulture, grab it by the talons, and hold on for dear life while it flies you to the other side.
Don't tell me you've never flown by vulture before, that was marvelous technique. Say, what brings you here?
$npc:11000425[gender:0]$ asked me to bring you this book.
Ah, kids today. So afraid of a little danger. Danger is the spice of life! Anyway, thanks for this.
Now, let's have a look at that $item:30000141$. Where's that page on vultures? Hmm...
Why are you looking up vultures?
There's a place on the highland plains across the way where the vultures like to nest because it's closer to the sun. It's just about time for those eggs to start hatching.
When the eggs hatch, I intend to raise the hatchlings and train them to ferry the area's residents around. However, there's one hitch in my plan.
What's that?

$npc:23000019[gender:0]$, the notorious beast hailing from Perion's mountain, often comes to prey on the hatchlings. Furthermore, one flap of those mighty wings is enough to send those eggs sailing through the air.
What I need is a coalition of heroes to defeat $npc:23000019[gender:0]$ the next time he appears. It's a dangerous task, but surely you must have some capable friends. Can I count on your help?
What I need is a coalition of heroes to defeat $npc:23000019[gender:0]$ the next time he appears. It's a dangerous task, but surely you must have some capable friends. Can I count on your help?
Thanks to your aid, the vulture hatchlings have survived. This time I'll be able to train them to aid the local populace.
Now what could the hold up be? I really should've heard something by now!
What's going on?

My brother was swept away by a typhoon on his way here to $map:02000062$ from across the sea. It's all my fault. I told him to come visit. He wasn't gonna at first, but changed his mind to make me happy, y'know?
The Adventurer's Guild said they were gonna do everything they could to find him, but I've waited and waited. You don't think they've forgotten, do you?
They found the wreckage from my brother's boat all the way out at $map:02000183$, but that was weeks ago, and since then, not a peep. You look pretty sturdy. Maybe you could go check it out?
Hmm. What's your brother's name?
Aw, gee, ma'am, that's really far away.
You're really going to help me? I knew you looked like a nice $male:lady,female:guy$! My brother's name is $npcName:11000021[gender:0]$.
It takes a long time to get to $map:02000183$ by land. Why don't you try talking to $npcName:11000994[gender:0]$ over by the quay? He might know of a boat headed to $map:02000183$.
Sure it is, if you go by land. But if you go by sea... Why don't you try talking to $npcName:11000994[gender:0]$ over by the quay? He might know of a boat headed to $map:02000183$.
Won't you please help me? My brother... $npcName:11000021[gender:0]$... I just need to know that he's all right.
Why don't you try talking to $npcName:11000994[gender:0]$ over by the quay? He might know of a boat headed to $map:02000183$.
Ho there, youngster. What brings you to these frosty lands?
I'm searching for someone.
I don't know who you're looking for, but beware the $map:02000067$! Beware! Beware! Bewaaaare!
I've seen cannibal mushrooms devour their own young. I've been chased by waterfowl covered in murderous feces. But I've never been more shaken than by what I saw at the $map:02000067$!
Holy moly. What did you see?!
A ship! A ship full of undead pirates! Those monsters have infected the land, up and down the coast from $map:02000063$ to the $map:02000067$!
I barely made it. I was paralyzed with fear, literally quaking in my boots, but this old man swooped in to save me right before a pirate took a bite out of my juicy belly.
That's who I'm looking for! Maybe. What was his name?
Uh... what was it that he shouted when he barreled through the undead? "$npcName:11000021[gender:0]$ the great has come to save the daaaaaay!"
Great! Where is he now?
We dodged the pirates and made it all the way here, where we ran into an Adventurer's Guild investigations team. He left me to guide them back to where we last saw the ship.
Guess that's where I've got to go then.
You've got guts, kid. That $npcName:11000021[gender:0]$ guy probably led them back to the $map:02000067$.
If you're sure you want to do it, head to $map:02000067$ to find the $npcName:11000021[gender:0]$. You won't catch me anywhere near there, though.
Ahoy, there. Nice to see a friendly face! Err... You know who I am, don'tcha?
Of course I do.
Uh... should I?
Ha! I could tell from the start you were a right sharp $male:lad,female:lass$! But what brings ya to a dangerous place like this?
$npcName:11000025[gender:1]$ sent me.
$npcName:11000025[gender:1]$? I almost forgot all about her. I've been right busy saving the day, and all.
Hmm... I see the stories of my heroism haven't traveled as far as I thought. Anyway, what brings ya to a dangerous place like this?
$npcName:11000025[gender:1]$ sent me.
So you want to hear my tale, do ya? The day dawned bright and sunny when we cast off. Almost brought my grandson with me. Mighty lucky he had a spelling bee that day.

$map:02000062$ was just a stone's throw away, when suddenly, the sky darkened. Waves taller than any building back home came crashing down upon us before any of us could react. I was tossed overboard...
Sometime later, I opened my eyes to find myself on a ship teeming with undead pirates! Aye, I was aboard the fabled phantom ship!

I gathered my wits and flung myself at their feet, proclaiming how useful a living servant would be for them. One of the other prisoners was smart enough to do the same. We waited and waited, and when the pirates let down their guard, we made our grand escape!

We're the only ones in all history who've ever escaped the phantom ship alive! Least, I like to tell myself that. We found traces of previous prisoners aboard. From the shreds of fabric still sticking to their bones, I could tell they were sailors from the Victoria.

You know of the Victoria, right? Largest vessel to ever sail the seas, 'til it disappeared without a trace. Now I'm thinking, the undead pirates must have something to do with that. It'll all come to light when the Adventurer's Guild finishes their investigation.
As for me, I'm headed to $map:02000062$ so dear ol' $npc:11000025[gender:1]$ can stop frettin' over me. Talk to the Adventurer's Guild investigations team if you're interested in helping them out.
Talk to the Adventurer's Guild investigations team if you're interested in helping them find the truth about the missing Victoria.
Hey! Get outta here! Don't you know this area is dangerous?
I'm here to help with your investigation.
Are ya, now? Well, we're still doing our preliminary fieldwork. Don't wanna be rash, you know. But thanks for asking.
Ugh, I'm so sick of all of this... Maybe I should just walk out and join the strike.
What's wrong?
Eep! You didn't hear that, did you? Please don't tell $npc:11000252[gender:0]$.

Sigh.... Ever since our Goldus Express drivers went on strike for better working conditions, it's been up to me to deliver the formal interview schedules for all of our unpaid replaceme—err, I mean prospective new interns.
We're about to start the interviews, but I have one last schedule to deliver, and I've worn my feet raw. Do you think... Do you think that maybe you could deliver it for me?
I'd be happy to help.
Really? You're my hero, thank you! The last candidate is $npcName:11001054[gender:0]$ from $map:02000166$. Please hurry and deliver the news, our first interview will begin shortly.
The last candidate is $npcName:11001054[gender:0]$ from $map:02000166$. Please hurry and deliver the news, our first interview will begin shortly.
Huh? What?
(Hand over the internship interview schedule.)
I scored an interview? Awesome!
You should go. The interviews are starting soon.
Oh man, I'd better hurry... I can't believe they read my application. This could be my big break!
Oh... But what am I going to do?
What's wrong?
I'm working part time delivering pizzas right now... I had a job over at $map:52000004$, but I had to come back to get my parkour shoes, because that place is a death trap. But...

I don't have time to deliver the pizzas before they get cold AND make it to my interview! Listen, do you think you could do me a solid and deliver the pizzas I left outside $map:52000004$ to a guy named $npc:11001055[gender:0]$? He's working on the roof of the construction site, but he should hear you coming up.

I don't have time to deliver the pizzas before they get cold AND make it to my interview! Listen, do you think you could do me a solid and deliver the pizzas I left outside $map:52000004$ to a guy named $npc:11001055[gender:0]$? He's working on the roof of the construction site, but he should hear you coming up.
Are you new? I gotta say, you guys were pretty slow today. Don't be late next time, all right? I hate cold pizza.
Oh, $MyPCName$! You're a life-saver! I passed my first interview, and it's all thanks to you.
Congratulations!

Thanks, but it's too early to celebrate... There's only one more interview, and all I have to do is memorize some stupid song to sing in front $npc:11000252[gender:0]$... But I can't think straight with undelivered pizzas on my mind...

$MyPCName$, I'll treat you to a free pizza if I get the job. Would you help me out one last time? $npc:11001055[gender:0]$ over at $map:52000004$ has ordered another stack of pizzas. Do you mind delivering them while I memorize this "$npc:11000477$" thingy?

I'll go ahead and leave the pizzas at the first floor of $map:52000004$ for you. Just take them to $npc:11001055[gender:0]$ on the top floor. I don't know what the guy does with all those pizzas, but he tips well, so I don't ask questions.
Hm? It's you again. And hey, the pizza's hot this time. Not bad kid! Now get out of here so I can ravage this pizza.
到底是怎么回事…… 是谁干的……
问发生了什么事。
在我不在的时候，有人偷偷溜了进来，把<font color="#ffd200">混沌时间的钥匙</font> 全部偷走了。 啊……要是胡乱使用的话……时间秩序就会完全崩溃……
问<font color="#ffd200">混沌时间钥匙</font>是什么。
那个嘛……我想从科学的角度……揭开维持时间秩序的<font color="#ffd200">红色魔方</font>的原理。 因此我开始对时间体系进行研究……获得的成果就是<font color="#ffd200">混沌时间钥匙</font>。
虽然还没经过验证…… 但是使用那个东西，可以创造出多种时间共存的<font color="#ffd200">混合时空</font>。 因此，如果<font color="#ffd200">红色魔方</font>发生什么事的话……哈……
问为什么要进行那种危险的研究。
那……那个……哈…… 总之，只要偷走<font color="#ffd200">混沌时间钥匙</font>的那个家伙对它有一点点了解， 一定会到$map:02000259$的<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000298$</font>去。 因为唯一可以用<font color="#ffd200">混沌时间钥匙</font>控制时间的装置，就在那里……
$MyPCName$！ 请你到<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000259$</font>去，确认一下<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000298$</font> 有没有发生什么情况。
啊，那个问题不用担心！ 用我身后的<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001056$</font>，马上就能到达那里。 现在还在试运行阶段……刚好测试目的地设置成了<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000259$</font>。
虽然可能会发生错误……但现在时间紧迫…… 希望你能帮帮我。拜托你了。
用我身后的<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001056$</font>， 马上就能到达<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000259$</font>。
这是……怎么回事…… 啊……这件事怎么……现在没法收拾了！！！
问在<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000298$</font>发生了什么事。
嗯？那个嘛……确实出事了…… 但你又是谁？？
是$npc:11001028[gender:0]$派我来的。
什么？ <font color="#ffd200">混沌时间钥匙</font>不见了？啊……那这都是……唉……
强大的黑客军团入侵了$map:02000298$。 他们成群结队地涌向这里，瞬间就占领了$map:02000298$。 我好不容易逃了出来……
如果……黑客军团带着<font color="#ffd200">混沌时间钥匙</font>去了<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000299$</font>的话…… 情况就严重了。 喂！请你到$map:02000298$去消灭黑客，确认一下$map:02000299$的情况 拜托你了！
喂！请你到$map:02000298$去消灭黑客，确认一下$map:02000299$的情况 拜托你了！
说明情况。
$map:02000304$是混合了多种时间的高次元世界…… 可以说是宇宙时间的中枢！ 迄今为止……没有任何人发现或到过那个地方。 那是……超越了红色魔方力量维护的时间秩序的地方。
但是……我们正在$map:02000298$研究的时光机…… 虽然状态还不稳定，但在实验中成功地移动到了设定的时空。 如果……用<font color="#ffd200">混沌时间钥匙</font>控制时光机，成功地进入了 可以更改时间中枢的空间……
如果拿着<font color="#ffd200">混沌时间钥匙</font>的人进入$map:02000304$， 控制了所有时间的话……不知道会发生什么事！！ 靠<font color="#ffd200">红色魔方</font>的力量维持着的<font color="#ffd200">时间结界</font>也许会全部崩溃， 所有的时空都陷入大混乱。
喂，$MyPCName$！ 你必须再到$map:02000299$去一趟，找到那个带着<font color="#ffd200">混沌时间钥匙</font>的家伙。 他一定正在为了寻找$map:02000304$而进行时间旅行。
过去……未来……或者其他任何地方…… 虽然不知道他在哪里……但无论如何都必须找到他！！
你必须再到$map:02000299$去一趟，找到那个带着<font color="#ffd200">混沌时间钥匙</font>的家伙。 他一定正在为了寻找$map:02000304$而进行时间旅行。 过去……未来……或者其他任何地方…… 虽然不知道他在哪里……但无论如何都必须找到他！！
唉……要不是有你在的话……真不知道会发生什么可怕的事。
问为什么会在$map:02000304$中。
让你去确认$map:02000298$的情况之后…… 没过多久，<font color="#ffd200">时空传送机</font>就突然发生了异常反应…… 我看见一道闪光，然后就失去了意识。
等我睁开眼睛的时候，发现自己在$map:02000304$中……这一切全都是$npc:24000615$的阴谋。 他这里偷走<font color="#ffd200">混沌时间钥匙</font>，率领黑客军团入侵$map:02000298$…… 他的目的，是想支配这个世界的时间。 占领$map:02000194$应该只是开始……
他在$map:02000304$用<font color="#ffd200">混沌时间钥匙</font>启动<font color="#ffd200">时间平台</font>的时候， 时间发生了逆行和混乱，<font color="#ffd200">时空传送机</font>也受到了影响， 因此把我传送到了$map:02000304$。
问今后会怎样。
暂时关闭了<font color="#ffd200">时间平台</font>，姑且不会再出现 时间混杂在一起的现象了。 但是……要想让纠缠在一起的时间重新恢复原状，可能需要一些时间。
在时间完全恢复之前，$map:02000304$会一直停在<font color="#ffd200">时间平台</font> 停止的那个时空中。 ……太深奥了吗……？简单地说就是……在时间恢复原来的秩序之前， 一部分空间……会以过去和现在共存的状态存在。
就现在而言…… 我们只能相信<font color="#ffd200">红色魔方</font>的自我净化能力了……
Will I never meet him again...?
Who are you waiting for?

I was on a delivery outside the city when I found him lying on the road. He wore the strangest bamboo hat and black robe. I was sure he would die if I left him there, so I brought him home and nursed him back to health...
But as soon as he could sit up under his own power, he left. I found his bed, neatly made, with a beautiful paper flower on top. He never said goodbye, but I could feel his gratitude in the flower...
I heard from one of my associates in $map:02000076$ that a swordsman with a bamboo hat was making a fuss near the Ant Tunnel. Do you think it could be him?
I must see him again! Would you please go to the Ant Tunnel and look for the man in the brown bamboo hat?
I must see him again! Would you please go to the Ant Tunnel and look for the man in the brown bamboo hat?
Ugh, my head. Nothing's going my way!
What happened to you?
I'm... not sure? I was looking for a monster called $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$ in the Ant Tunnel. Seemed that it was after the Red Lap... something bad.
I was ambushed by a huge mushroom with a charm on its head. I believe you call them $npcNamePlural:22000322[gender:0]$?
Anyway, I thought it was all over for me, but someone pushed me out of the way. Off the ledge overhead, but out of the way. I can't remember much after that...
What did this person look like?
I couldn't see his face. It was hidden by his bamboo hat...
Do you think he defeated the $npcName:22000322[gender:1]$ on his own? She was a pretty fearsome fungus...
But what if he wasn't strong enough? What if the $npcName:22000322[gender:1]$ waddled off with his $item:11300119$? In the end, she may hold the answer to his fate...
Ugh, my head... It hurts to think. Besides, this is all distracting me from my real mission.
Do you think this bamboo man defeated the $npc:22000322[gender:0]$? You should look into it for yourself.
This... this is the same kind of flower that he left behind... Where did you find this?
I found it on a $npcName:22000322[gender:1]$.
On a $npcName:22000322[gender:1]$...? Then... then he's...
It doesn't look good. I'm sorry...
Then I'll never see him again... I never even learned his name, you know? I even made new clothes to give him on our next meeting. It was all for nothing...
I can't stand to keep these. Please, I want you to have them.
没有办法可以承受吗…… 怎么才能把那个弄到手呢……
问是什么事。
$item:30000186$！！ 我需要那个，必须要得到才行。
问为什么需要。
这次我在学习一种新魔法……本来应该是可以自由地操纵风的…… 但是要想学会却没那么容易！ 如果能得到<font color="#ffd200">$npc:22000007$</font>拥有的<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000186$</font>…… 应该很容易就能学会了……
有来才有往……怎么样？ 如果你能帮我弄到$item:30000186$……我就送你一份礼物。 $npc:22000007$经常在$map:02000180$出没～
如果你能帮我弄到$item:30000186$……我就送你一份礼物。 $npc:22000007$经常在$map:02000180$出没～
哦……这是$item:30000186$……！！ 太好了……太好了……这下全部准备好了。一定可以做到……
奇怪……时间明明已经到了……
问在等谁。
啊……嗯，我只是……没什么。 啊……实在是没时间……唉……这下可糟了……
问是什么事。
现在没时间细说…… 看你好像很老到的样子……能帮帮我吗？
说说看。
不是什么难事，也不是什么坏事，所以别担心！ 只要帮我传句话就行。 我必须在这里见一个人……但那个人却一直没来。
如果你在$map:03000143$避难所或那周围遇到一个名叫<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000841[gender:1]$</font>的人， 请帮我转告她……就说<font color="#ffd200">没时间了，必须尽快按计划进行</font>，可以吗？
如果你在$map:03000143$避难所或那周围遇到一个名叫<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000841[gender:1]$</font>的人， 请帮我转告她……就说<font color="#ffd200">没时间了，必须尽快按计划进行</font>，可以吗？
你是$npcName:11000841[gender:1]$吗？
呃……你怎么知道我……的名字？
$npcName:11000842[gender:1]$让我告诉你，没时间了，必须尽快按计划进行。
呃……我也知道没时间了……呃……
呃……但我实在是站不起来……
问怎么受的伤。
在这里受伤还要有理由吗？呃…… 这叫做遇人不淑……那个江湖郎中帮我治疗之后…… 现在更疼了！呃……
啊……不行……$MyPCName$。 既然你来了，就帮帮我们吧……有件事，比对付外面的怪物 更重要……
问是什么事。
你听说过<font color="#ffd200">鲁米纳军人</font>吗……？ 啊……无论你了不了解我们，那都不重要……呃…… 总之，为了救出被关在被称为<font color="#ffd200">奴隶之塔</font>的<font color="#ffd200">卡特拉姆斯</font>中的人…… 我们正在黑暗之地进行准备……
我的任务……是清除设置在<font color="#ffd200">卡特拉姆斯</font>周边的剧毒陷阱，消灭警卫兵…… 不过你也看到了，以我现在的情况……呃…… 你能到$map:03000057$的<font color="#ffd200">卡特拉姆斯</font>去……帮我完成任务吗？
$npcName:11000842[gender:1]$正等着呢，她该怎么办呢？

这段时间我一直在监视<font color="#ffd200">卡特拉姆斯</font>。 以我们的人手，要想从大规模的影子军团手上救出被奴役的居民， 最好的方法是潜入与左下方的地下矿山相连的小路。
我刚才悄悄进去看了一下……路又窄又阴森，无法很多人同时进去。 但好处是那里不容易被敌人发现。
说去那里看过了。
地下矿山入口……之后就没办法进去了。 看到眼前的景象之后，你不知道我有多震惊……
问看到了什么。
大人……小孩……在凶恶的矿工中间徒手翻开粗糙的岩石， 寻找里面的矿石。 他们那脏兮兮的脸上写满了疲惫……看了就让人心痛。
鲁米纳军人正式开始行动恐怕还需要一段时间…… 在这期间，那些无辜的人还得继续在这种可怕的地方受苦。 要是能找几个实力强一点的同伴，我一定会想办法把 $map:02000292$的居民们救出来……
$MyPCName$，你能先去把$map:02000292$中的人救出来吗？
$MyPCName$，你能先去把$map:02000292$中的人救出来吗？ 只要跟实力和你一样出众的同伴一起去，这件事应该并不难……
