Once I leave this place, that's it! No more crime. But there's one thing that still bothers me.
What's that?
Those $npcPlural:21000281$ over there recently showed up. They're more dangerous than a hooligan like me. We may swing clubs and throw our weight around, but they're something else.

They run around that construction site throwing dangerous bombs without any regard for safety! I know, as a hooligan, I'm not really one to talk, but still! The number of villains and brigands in this place has gotten out of control.

But you already know I swore to leave the hooligan life behind. I can't go around beating people up even if they are throwing bombs around. Could you please teach those $npcPlural:21000281$ a lesson for the safety of everyone here?

You already know I swore to leave the hooligan life behind. I can't go around beating people up even if they are throwing bombs around. Could you please teach those $npcPlural:21000281$ a lesson for the safety of everyone here?
Wow! Is there nothing you can't do? I'm so glad I met you. It really helps having a friend I can depend on now that I've turned over a new leaf.
He's been in there a while now, yet time's still frozen...
What's going on?

My colleagues and I are from the Chaos Tempus Center. We're investigating the stoppage of time in this area. At first, we thought it was due to the expansion of the temporal crevice at the nearby $map:02000008$...
But the Clock Tower seems to be the true culprit. Time stopped when the clock stopped. We sent a member of our team into the $map:02000161$ to investigate.
But it's been a while, and we haven't heard from him. Perhaps, if you have a moment, you could venture into the $map:02000161$ and check on my colleague?
Perhaps, if you have a moment, you could venture into the $map:02000161$ and check on my colleague?
I simply cannot comprehend it!
Comprehend what?
I simply cannot comprehend... how I haven't solved this mystery yet!
To solve the mystery of the stopped clock, I must first study the $item:39000026$.
So study it...
It's not that simple! A rabbit riding around on a clock, of all things, rolled by and stole it right out of my hands, then fled into the deepest part of the tower!
There are dozens of monsters between me and that blueprint. I'm a researcher not a fighter... but you look strong. Will you help me get that $item:39000026$ back?
A rabbit riding around on a clock, of all things, rolled by and stole the $item:39000026$ right out of my hands, then fled into the deepest part of the tower! Will you help me get it back?
You did it! Thank you so much!
How peculiar...
What now?
According to this blueprint, the control center of the clock isn't even in this tower... It's in the basement!
I'm in the wrong place! But how do I get to the basement? I don't recall seeing a— Let's see here, it says... Oh. Ah, I see. Hmm...
It looks like the basement to the Clock Tower can be reached from the highest point of the Clock Tower! All right, then! I'll just have to go down, er... up, er... down-up to the basement!
Do me a favor and let $npcName:11000870[gender:0]$ know I'll be back soon. I'll have this clock fixed in no time!
Do me a favor and let $npcName:11000870[gender:0]$ know I'll be back soon. I'll have this clock fixed in no time!
Wait, wait, wait. You're telling me the controls to the clock are in the basement... which you get to by climbing to the top of the Clock Tower?
And $npcName:11000871[gender:0]$ is heading down... up there alone? But he has no idea what he'll find!
Couldn't you have talked some sense into him? Or at least accompanied him? Whatever. Thanks for the "help," pal.
嗯哼……这到底是什么声音呢……
问是什么事。
从不久前开始，从粉红樱花森林那边传来了隐约的哭声。 一开始我以为是森林里野兽的叫声…… 但是听的时间长了，感觉很像是人的声音……也好像是灵魂的声音……
据说樱花森林深处经常会有灵魂出现…… 你能去确认一下到底是怎么回事吗？ 我……很胆小……
从不久前开始，从粉红樱花森林那边传来了隐约的哭声。 你能去确认一下到底是怎么回事吗？ 我……很胆小……

具体的事情等朋友们从樱花森林里安全出来之后再说吧。 现在……没时间了…… 这样下去的话，他们都要死了……那样的话，我……
需要做什么。

Hm... The mayor of $map:02000100$ is asking for Dark Wind's help.
What's going on?

Giant robot attacks in $map:02000100$. These things happen, of course, but something about this robot has got the mayor extra worried. He wants us to get its programming chip so we can figure out who made it.
I wouldn't mind smashing some robot skull.
I knew I could count on you. The robot's been spotted at the $map:02000145$. Dismantle it, get the $item:30000280$, then give it to $npc:11000065[gender:0]$. Good luck against $npcName:23000054$.
I knew I could count on you. The robot's been spotted at the $map:02000145$. Dismantle it, get the $item:30000280$, then give it to $npc:11000065[gender:0]$. Good luck against $npcName:23000054$.
It's about time Dark Wind sent someone with the chip! Hand it over.
(Hand over the $item:30000280$.)
Hmm. I see. From looking at this chip, I can tell that... I need to send it to the lab for the eggheads to analyze.
Listen, it'll take some time to analyze the $item:30000280$. Why don't I give you something else to do in the meantime?
What might that be?

Another robot is on a rampage on $map:02000314$, near $map:02000164$. That's an important voter district for me! What's worse, if this $npc:23100055$ damages the power links on the tower, all of $map:02000100$ will lose electricity!
You've tangled with these bots before. Can you go to $map:02000314$, defeat $npc:23100055$, and reconnect the power links?
You've tangled with these bots before. Can you go to $map:02000314$, defeat $npc:23100055$, and reconnect the power links?
Well, the lights are still on. Were you successful?
The $map:02000314$ is secure.
That is a relief. I wouldn't want to keep my citizens in the dark, if you know what I mean.
Hm... I expected to receive the analysis of the $item:30000280$ by now. I have a hunch that those scoundrels in $map:02000270$ are behind these attacks...
Why would $map:02000270$ do that?
Politics can be... messy. $map:02000270$ was founded by a group of scientists who were exiled from $map:02000100$.
Our top science advisors assured me and my fellow politicians that these particular scientists were no good, so we evicted them from their labs to house more upstanding ventures.
However, even if $map:02000270$ is outside of the city limits, it's still under $map:02000100$'s jurisdiction.

And $map:02000100$ is growing more and more every day. I'm working on some legislation to expand our borders to include $map:02000270$, but the residents of that slum don't like the idea. Seems they want to run their own government.
That's a load of nonsense, of course. And I wouldn't put it past those no-good rabble-rousers to attack us with killer robots.
Anyway, I can't do anything with more proof. For now, tell Dark Wind to double its patrols. I won't have any more robot attacks in my city.
I can't do anything with more proof. For now, tell Dark Wind to double its patrols. I won't have any more robot attacks in my city.
I hear you cleaned things up at $map:02000099$. How'd it go?
Well, the robots are all gone now.
And did anything come of the $item:30000280$?
They're still analyzing it.
Hm... I hope the mayor's suspicions aren't true. If it comes to fighting between us and $map:02000270$... That won't be good for anyone.
We need to be focusing our attention on the forces of darkness. Victory here will be meaningless if we're at each other's throats when this is all over.
No matter what, we can't let that happen. Our enemy isn't just the Land of Darkness... it's mistrust and hatred itself.
班达亚布！
问是什么意思。
这是$npc:11000039[gender:1]$打招呼的方法。 听说为了解开石巨人山脉的怨恨和诅咒，她正在为祭祀做准备。
问石巨人山脉的怨恨和诅咒是怎么回事。
那是很有名的故事……不知道你有没有听过。 原来石巨人山脉是充满了神圣气息的地方。除了古代种族之外， 他们崇拜的神兽都住在那里。
但是……由于未知的原因，古代种族突然消失了。守护那里的神兽 对人类的愚蠢和欲望感到愤怒，在各地以疯狂的面目出现， 成为了对世界构成威胁的敌人。
$npc:11000039[gender:1]$为了让石巨人山脉原本的神圣气息恢复、 安慰神兽愤怒的心，每年都会举行祭祀。 也许是她的真情还没有感动上天……暂时还没有大的变化…… 不过$npc:11000039[gender:1]$说她绝不会放弃，会一直祈祷下去。
一直以来，姆尔部族都会帮助$npc:11000039[gender:1]$准备 祭祀所需的祭品，现在也差不多该开始准备了…… $MyPCName$，这次你能帮帮我们吗？
说愿意帮忙。
太好了，这次就麻烦你了。 请你去搜集石巨人山脉苏醒的神兽之一——<font color="#ffd200">狮鹫的羽毛</font>。 可以从<font color="#ffd200">$npc:23000019[gender:0]$</font>或<font color="#ffd200">$npc:23000020[gender:1]$</font>身上搜集到。
请你去搜集在石巨人山脉醒来的神兽<font color="#ffd200">狮鹫的羽毛</font>。 可以从<font color="#ffd200">$npc:23000019[gender:0]$</font>或<font color="#ffd200">$npc:23000020[gender:1]$</font>身上搜集到。

$npc:11000039[gender:1]$说，将其中蕴含着的神圣气息一点一滴汇集起来，举行祭祀， 石巨人山脉就会恢复之前的力量，狂暴的神兽们也会重新沉睡。

说知道。

$MyPCName$，别在这里晃悠了，请你去$map:2000334$帮助$npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ 守卫城墙吧。 特别是带领猪群的那个头目！！一定要赶走那个家伙！
$MyPCName$别在这里晃悠了，请你去$map:2000334$帮助$npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ 守卫城墙吧。 特别是带领猪群的那个头目！！一定要赶走那个家伙！
啊！守护军后勤兵还没到……你就已经出来了…… 怎么样？你把那些家伙都消灭了？
说是。
咻……真是太好了。又不是魔王的手下……只是些野猪，万一被它们占领了监视塔， 那就太丢脸了……谢谢你帮了我们！
喂~喂！ 你刚才似乎是从$map:2000334$出来的……出了什么事了？
说消灭了猪群。
呵呵……我的预感果然没错……那些家伙居然已经入侵了这里…… 带领那些猪的家伙叫做<font color="#ffd200">塔波</font>…… 它本来是我在养猪场里养的猪！ 几年前，<font color="#ffd200">巴拉哈</font>那家伙把我的养猪场毁了的时候， 塔波是从这里逃出去的家伙之一！
<font color="#ffd200">巴拉哈</font>那家伙也是在十几年前，被拉去屠宰场的路上侥幸逃生的， 这些该死的猪既然逃走了就自生自灭去吧…… 为什么一定要再来捣乱！
问是什么意思。
<font color="#ffd200">塔波</font>，那家伙就和巴拉哈一样，回到养猪场来， 把农场弄得一片狼藉。那家伙比巴拉哈更狠毒，只要农场一恢复， 就又来捣乱，搞得我现在都没办法办养猪场了！

我想着自己也不能总是就这么忍气吞声，于是追着猪群来了这里…… 哼……<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:24001205$</font>！那个家伙一旦认定了目标，就不会放弃的！ 它肯定会再次带领猪群攻击城墙的！说不定已经回来了…… 如果你不相信我说的话，那就亲自去$map:2000334$看看吧。 如果<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:24001205$</font>回来了……请你一定！！要消灭它！

我说的就是在那边的住宅中间到处张望的 奇怪的人。听说不久前有一艘大船越过$map:2000062$大海来到了这里…… 难道是坐着那个船来的？$MyPCName$也很好奇吧？ 你去向他们问好，偷偷问问他们是从哪儿来的吧。
我说的就是在那边的住宅中间到处张望的 奇怪的人。听说不久前有一艘大船越过$map:2000062$大海来到了这里…… 难道是坐着那个船来的？$MyPCName$也很好奇吧？ 你去向他们问好，偷偷问问他们是从哪儿来的吧。
呀哩哩哟~不错啊！见到你很高兴！ 这里的人看上去都不错啊，感觉很好~
他们从哪里来。
啊……我们是糊涂商团！从海的另一边来的。 我们本来是要回到故乡，但是途中偏离了航道，不知不觉就发现了 这片新的大陆！在船头发现$map:2000062$的时候，我情不自禁地叫了出来！ <font color="#ffd200">霍罗莱伊！霍罗莱伊!</font>
询问<font color="#ffd200">霍罗莱伊</font>是什么意思。
啊，这是我们家乡那边的话。 发现新的地方时，就会发出这样的欢呼声！ 越过大海，居然有这样的地方……呵呵……
不知道是什么东西引导我们来到了这里，但是我们肯定能在这里做些什么。 在此之前，我们必须熟悉这里的文化和生活。请你多多帮助我们吧。
Huh? $MyPCName$! Is something wrong? You look really very tired today... I know exactly what you need! Oh, what is the word...?
What are you talking about?

You know! When people want to relax. They have a... spa day! That's the word! You hop in a $item:50400036$ and bathe with expensive, fragrant soap. You stick your feet in a nice warm $item:50400091$, and then you lie back in a cozy $item:50400037$ and let all of your troubles fly away.

Go on $male:boy,female:girl$, treat yourself! Well, it need not be your own house. You could even go to a friend's house and make use of their tub or massage chair for a while. Whatever you decide, take a little me-time, all right?

You know! When people want to relax. They take a spa day! That's the word! You hop in a $item:50400036$ and bathe with expensive soap. You stick your feet in a nice warm $item:50400091$, and then you lie back in a cozy $item:50400037$ and let a machine do all the work!
Well, how do you feel? You look like a million mesos!
Oh my! Is it true? Someone told me of a mystical object often referred to as an idiot box. They say, those who gaze upon it actually grow dumber! Such an outrageous tale must surely be false.
$MyPCName$, what do you say, will you disprove this myth? Go and find one of these so-called "Televisions", look upon it, and tell me what happens.
$MyPCName$, will you disprove this myth? Go and find one of these so-called "Televisions", look upon it, and tell me what happens.
Oh! $MyPCName$, you're back! Tell me, what is one plus one? And 3 times 5?
Are you serious?
One plus one is two, and three times five is fifteen.
Ah...! Were you rendered mindless by this "Television"? No... the look on your face tells me you are in full possession of your faculties.
Hmm. Perhaps those questions were too simple. But honestly, you do not seem any dumber than before. I will consider this myth busted.

Oh, what I would give for a soft and friendly kitten to keep me company. But sadly, I could not bring one on our ship. In my homeland the cats were so friendly, but the ones living here seem so cold and distant. Someone here said there is an object called a $item:50400004$ that makes cats much more playful.
$MyPCName$, would you find a $item:50400004$ and see if the rumors are true?
$MyPCName$, would you find a $item:50400004$ and see if the rumors are true?
Oh, $MyPcName$, you're finally back! I managed to befriend a cute little kitty, without the aid of a $item:50400004$! I'm sorry, I didn't mean to waste your time.

One of my friends said she attended a party at someone's home, where they have glimmering lights just like at a dance club! Ahh... It would be so much fun to... what do you say? "Let loose" on the dance floor.
$MyPCName$, do you think you could find me one of these house-parties? And if you do not mind, please ensure the lights are all working. I would hate for anyone to miss my disco-dance debut!
$MyPCName$, do you think you could find me one of these house-parties? And if you do not mind, please ensure the lights are all working. I would hate for anyone to miss my disco-dance debut!
Oh! Did you find a suitable house? How was their lighting setup? Ooh! Did they have a disco ball?
Yep!
Oh yes! Yalamas! I will practice my dance moves and pay that house a visit! Thank you for checking it out.
Hello $MyPCName$! I am wondering, are you a... how do you say...? Hardcore gamer? Or perhaps a "filthy casual?"
Woah, lady. You never go full meta...

Hmm? I do not know this phrase. I ask only because my friend spoke of roving packs of gamers known for subjugating the neighborhood arcades. I love meeting new people, but I do not know if I am good enough for them to accept me. Back home, we only had very basic games ling Plong and Tortroise.
Could you be inspecting the neighborhood arcades and see if the games are simple enough for a beginner?
Could you be inspecting the neighborhood arcades and see if the games are simple enough for a beginner?
Hmm? Let me check your fingers for callouses! What do you think, $MyPCName$, are the games around here easy to learn, or hard?
Easy-peasy. I was eating noobs three square meals a day.
I don't know...
It was awful. I never want to play another video game so long as I live.
Oh, really? That is wonderful news. When I play these games, I will try to live up to your angry talents!
Hmm... Yes, I suppose you are right. There is no point taking such things so seriously.
Oh no! Do not say that, $MyPCName$. If you could not defeat these games, how can I hope to? If you ask me, all that matters is that you have tried.

After some thought, I have decided that the best way to learn about your culture is to surround myself in it fully! That is why I am thinking about working as a maid. However... I have no professional housekeeping experience.

Washing dish, cooking, cleaning, and dusting... When you spend your whole life traveling, it is easy to neglect such talents. $MyPCName$, would you perhaps be willing to try performing such tasks, and let me know if they are difficult?

Washing dish, cooking, cleaning, and dusting... When you spend your whole life traveling, it is easy to neglect such talents. $MyPCName$, would you perhaps be willing to try performing such tasks, and let me know if they are difficult?
How swiftly you return! Well, how was a day in the life of a maid? Do you think it is something I would be good at?
Housework is easy, anyone can do it!
Cleaning is the worst. Don't put yourself through that.
Cooking and cleaning is a lot of work. There's gotta be a better way.
Really? What a relief... I will start looking for a job immediately! As a thank you, I will buy you some manner of treat when I receive my first day's pay.
Ah... Really? Well, thank you for suffering so I do not have to.
Is that so? I suppose I will have to find another way to fit in.
$MyPCName$... Your look unwell. Perhaps you need to, as they say... unleash the dogs?
Unleash the dogs?
I'm already running on empty, thanks.
Now that you mention it, I can't remember the last time I went...

Do you need to... you know... cut rope? Drop anchor? Grow a tail? Clear out your inventory? Feed the fish? Bake some brownies? Make an offering at the porcelain altar? Forgive my vulgarity, but you really should relieve yourself daily. You don't want to make a mess...
Hmm... Forgive me, but I do not believe you. Having sampled many foreign cuisines, I recognize that queasy look when I see it! Go find a restroom at once, before you have an accident!
No wonder you look so... congested? Go find a place to do your business at once, before you embarrass yourself!
At absolute minimum, you should relieve yourself once a day!
You look lighter! Are you feeling better? Saving the world is important, but you cannot forget your basic needs.

Ugh! Something smells like a shazaba! Oh, sorry. That is how we say "incontinent camel" in our language. $MyPCName$... when was the last time you bathed? Hygiene is important. Go and clean yourself up!

It's delicious. You should eat some.

嗯……呵呵……这真是…… 我还以为都挡住了……看来没有啊……
问是什么意思。
啊……蓝色魔方破碎后不久，$map:2000023$的森林深处 长出了黑暗枝条。 那个枝条朝着森林各地延伸，$map:2000023$在浓重的黑暗中，一点点失去了生命之光……
如果那时没有众多的妖精替身而出，斩断黑暗枝条， 进化被黑暗浸染的森林…… 今天别说$map:2000023$，可能这个世界都将不复存在。
但是……最近在世界各地，又出现了和黑暗枝条出现时 相似的状况……
询问是什么状况。
<font color="#ffd200">阴影之门</font>……尽管现在已经遭到封锁，消失不见了…… 蓝色魔方被摧毁后，世界各处都出现了通往黑暗之地的通道。 尽管入口已经被关闭了……但那周围仍残留着拥有着<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000435$</font>的黑暗之地怪物。
询问$item:30000435$是什么。
<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000435$</font>是黑暗种子发芽后在黑暗枝条上开出的花…… 随着时间流逝，黑暗力量聚集，那个花就会结出<font color="#ffd200">$item:90000014$</font>…… 然后又会产生新的<font color="#ffd200">黑暗种子</font>……

所以现在各地的<font color="#ffd200">净化妖精正在搜集阴影之门周围的怪物掉落的 $item:30000435$，净化其中的黑暗</font>。 只有这样……才能阻止黑暗的$item:90000014$在这个世界蔓延…… <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000037$</font>也在帮忙，如果你也想加入，就去见见<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000037$</font>吧。

所以现在各地的<font color="#ffd200">净化妖精正在搜集阴影之门周围的怪物掉落的 $item:30000435$，净化其中的黑暗</font>。 只有这样……才能阻止黑暗的$item:90000014$在这个世界蔓延…… <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000037$</font>也在帮忙，如果你也想加入，就去见见<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000037$</font>吧。
一、二、三、四……
说想帮忙净化黑暗。
啊！！！一下就忘了……呼…… 我得重新数了……你怎么能现在和我说话呢……嘤嘤……
一、二、三……四……
<font color="#909090">（等她数完。）</font>
五十二！！咻~全部数完了。 怎么了？
说想帮忙搜集$item:30000435$，一起对抗黑暗。
我正觉得光靠妖精的力量抵抗起来有些吃力呢……谢谢你！ 我们把通过拥有黑暗气息的<font color="#ffd200">阴影之门</font>入侵的怪物叫做<font color="#ffd200">哈比怪</font>， 快要开花的<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000435$</font>就算宿主死了，花也会留下， 准备结果。
$MyPCName$如果想帮忙，就请搜集快要开花的<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000435$</font>， 交给我吧。 嗯……如果拥有<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000435$</font>……可能会是和$MyPCName$差不多或者比你更强的家伙。 请你一定要小心！
$MyPCName$如果想帮忙，就请搜集快要开花的<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000435$</font>， 交给我吧。 嗯……如果拥有<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000435$</font>……可能会是和$MyPCName$差不多或者比你更强的家伙。 请你一定要小心！
啊！$MyPCName$！ 你没事吧？我没告诉你关于<font color="#ffd200">哈比毒</font>的事情…… 哈比怪在死之前都会散发一种黑暗气息。 我们把它叫做<font color="#ffd200">哈比毒</font>……如果感染，后果是致命的……我还担心来着……
说没关系。
咻~太好了。你还搜集了这么多$item:30000435$……作为谢礼，请你收下$map:2000023$生命的象征， <font color="#ffd200">$item:59200182$</font>。这有助于你成长为更强的勇士。
嗯……这可真是……最终事情还是变成了这样！ 在<font color="#ffd200">$map:2000048$</font>发现了黑暗枝条！ 比很久以前环绕$map:2000023$生长的枝条散发出了更强 的黑暗气息……看来这次只靠妖精的力量是难以阻止这个黑暗力量了。
斩断瞬间四散的黑暗枝条，这不是谁 可以一个人做到的事情。我们必须团结各自的力量， 才能避免黑暗吞噬世界的悲剧。 <font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>，请你出一份力吧。
请你前往<font color="#ffd200">$map:2000048$</font>，找守卫<font color="#ffd200">$map:2000350$</font>入口的 净化妖精<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001228[gender:1]$</font>谈谈吧。
我们必须团结各自的力量， 才能避免黑暗吞噬世界的悲剧。 <font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>，请你也出一份力吧。 请你前往<font color="#ffd200">$map:2000048$</font>，找净化妖精<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001228[gender:1]$</font>谈谈。
嗯？$npc:11000031[gender:0]$让你来的？ 嗯……虽然是初次见面……但是我似乎能知道$npcName:11000031[gender:0]$为什么让你来。
$MyPCName$…… 你应该能承受$map:2000350$中浓厚黑暗的重量。
你应该已经听$npcName:11000031[gender:0]$说过了…… <font color="#ffd200">$map:2000350$</font>是由黑暗种子生长而成的巨大的<font color="#ffd200"> 黑暗枝条</font>，它相当于传播黑暗的通道， 越靠近它的根部，环绕黑暗洪流的黑暗就越浓烈，越强大。
至今有很多妖精和像$MyPCName$这样勇敢的勇士为了阻止巨大的 黑暗枝条延伸得更远，毫不犹豫地进入了<font color="#ffd200">$map:2000350$</font> 的黑暗中。 我们现在还在和这个巨大的黑暗战斗。
我们还不知道这个黑暗的尽头在哪里，尽头又有什么。 因为至今谁都没有达到尽头。 但是，谁都没有气馁或放弃。因为我们不能 看着这个世界被黑暗吞噬。
只要<font color="#ffd200">不断战斗，永不放弃，</font>我相信总有一天，我们中 <font color="#ffd200">的某个人一定能照亮那黑暗的尽头</font>。 也许<font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>就能成为这个人…… 今天要不要迈出第一步？
只要<font color="#ffd200">不断战斗，永不放弃，</font>我相信总有一天，我们中 <font color="#ffd200">的某个人一定能照亮那黑暗的尽头</font>。 也许<font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>就能成为这个人…… 今天要不要迈出第一步？
天啊……你这汗流得……没事吧？ 没受伤……吗？
说没关系。
果然……我就知道$MyPCName$一定能做到。 虽然是第一个挑战，但是在$map:2000350$获得<font color="#ffd200">$item:90000014$</font>绝不是件简单的事情。
询问要将$item:90000014$用在什么地方。

<font color="#ffd200">$item:90000014$</font>是含有黑暗气息开放的$item:30000435$中结出的<font color="#ffd200">黑暗果实</font>。 这个果实中，有着所有黑暗的根源--<font color="#ffd200">黑暗种子</font>，那个种子 <font color="#ffd200">发芽</font>后，就会长出黑暗的<font color="#ffd200">根</font>和黑暗<font color="#ffd200">枝条</font>……那个枝条上就会再长出 <font color="#ffd200">$item:30000435$</font>和<font color="#ffd200">$item:90000014$</font>，<font color="#ffd200">反复循环</font>，黑暗力量就是这样蔓延的。

通过净化$item:30000435$和$item:90000014$中的黑暗，防止 黑暗继续蔓延到整个世界。 其中……<font color="#ffd200">被净化的$item:90000014$</font>是<font color="#ffd200">治疗哈比毒</font>的灵药。 这就是我<font color="#ffd200">搜集$item:90000014$的原因</font>。
$MyPCName$如果将<font color="#ffd200">$item:90000014$</font> 交给我，就能获得<font color="#ffd200">妖精们珍贵的宝物</font>作为谢礼。
Hmm? You want to help? Are you ready to take the task of purifying the $map:2000350$?
Yep!

Do you really think you're up to the task? You look a little... scrawny. I've got a light case of extreme havi poisoning, so I'm taking a break from my work in the $map:2000350$. Last time I managed to weather ten waves of darkness!
That doesn't sound very hard.
How arrogant! Do you have a death wish? Or... are you really that brave? Fine, if you think it's so easy, enter the $map:2000350$ and survive 10 waves of the darkness! Show me you mean business.
How arrogant! Do you have a death wish? Or... are you really that brave? Fine, if you think it's so easy, enter the $map:2000350$ and survive 10 waves of the darkness! Show me you mean business.
You really did it...? Erm... I guess you're tougher than you look. AGHH!
Are you... okay?

It's... urgh... no big deal. Once a week, the havi fruit seeds embedded in my flesh sprout stalks of shadow. Aghhhh... Just gotta pull it out so I don't become a brainless shadow monster. <font color="#909090">(She doubles over in pain and tugs at a dark vine growing from her side.)</font>
Phew. It's out. One day I'll be free of this pain. $npcName:11001228[gender:1]$ is working on a treatment for my condition.
Well, I admit it. You're as tough as I am. Here, take this $item:90000014$. You can trade it to $npcName:11001228[gender:1]$ for useful fairy treasure...
$MyPCName$来了啊。 我正好奇你的近况呢……看起来挺健康的啊，太好了。 你最近见过$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$吗……？ 我听说了奇怪的传言……
问是什么传闻。
不久前……我遇到了一个去过黑暗之地的流浪者。 他说……在$map:3000103$有个长得很像$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$的年轻人正在寻找$npcName:11000044[gender:0]$。 为了以防万一，我派人去$map:2000228$了解$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$的近况……
结果他们说$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$去了别处，不在那里。 我总觉得……有种不祥的预感…… 你能去黑暗之地的$map:3000103$ ，看看那个流浪者说的是不是真的吗？
嗯……$MyPCName$，是你啊。 正好有件事我想要确认一下，你来得正好。 你最近见过$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$吗……？ 我听到了一些<font color="#ffd200">奇怪的传闻</font>……
什么传闻？

不久前，我遇到了一个去过黑暗之地的流浪者。他说…… 在$map:3000103$有个和<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$</font>长得很像的年轻人正在寻找<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000044[gender:0]$</font>。 以防万一，我派人去$map:2000228$了解$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$的近况……
但$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$去了某个地方，不在那里。 我总觉得<font color="#ffd200">有种不详的预感</font>……嗯…… 你能去黑暗之地的<font color="#ffd200">$map:3000103$</font>，看看那个流浪者说的是不是真的吗？
我总觉得……有种不祥的预感…… 你能到黑暗之地$map:3000103$去，确认一下那个流浪者的话吗？
嗯？这是什么…… 呃……这家伙……看上去很好吃啊~
哈哈哈哈哈哈……我开玩笑的，你不用这么吃惊。 现在我肚子很饱，下次我肚子饿的时候你再来吧。
我已经说了我不饿了……你干嘛老跟着我？
你好，请问你在这里见过$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$吗？
$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$？ 那是谁？长得什么样？长的好吃吗？
说明$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$的长相。
啊，那个黄毛的家伙……看到啦！ 他一头就冲进<font color="#ffd200">$map:2000349$</font>了啊？
询问<font color="#ffd200">$map:2000349$</font>是什么。
黑暗种子发芽，扎根于无尽的黑暗后…… 魔王的儿子就诞生了…… 那个<font color="#ffd200">$map:2000349$</font>就在这里，呵呵。
叫$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$的那个家伙…… 说不定已经被黑暗气息吞噬了灵魂…… 你要是想知道，就进$map:2000349$去看看吧……呵呵……
叫$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$的那个家伙…… 说不定已经被黑暗气息吞噬了灵魂…… 你要是想知道，就进$map:2000349$去看看吧……呵呵……

那家伙……肯定回$map:2000228$去找$npcName:11000069[gender:1]$了。 那家伙……也不知道有没有受伤…… 请你前往$map:2000228$，将$item:30000434$交给$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$，问问他 为什么要做出这样鲁莽的行为。
你还没去吧……为什么又回来了？
说把$item:30000434$落下了。
说迷路了。
我再给你一次……这次可要好好保管啊。

你的背包看上去很重啊。 这样怎么能出远门了……你最好先整理下背包。
这里的地形本来就复杂艰险……确实有这个可能…… 小心安全。
$MyPCName$！ 谢谢你在$map:2000349$帮了我……我总是给你添麻烦。
询问独自前往$map:2000349$的理由。
那是个陷阱…… $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$……那家伙说他抓了爷爷……他说如果我想救爷爷， 就悄悄地去$map:2000349$找他。
询问茅屋爷爷说的事情。
嗯，没错。 我离开$map:2000306$的时候，留给爷爷了一个小证物。 只有爷爷和我才知道……而$npcName:11000044[gender:0]$把那个送了过来…… 我一看到那个，就毫不怀疑地去了，也无暇多想。

我进入了$map:2000349$后才知道被骗了。 所有的一切……都是$npcName:11000044[gender:0]$为了向我复仇，精心策划的阴谋…… 逃走的<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000044[gender:0]$</font>吞下了从<font color="#ffd200">图尔卡</font>那里获得的<font color="#ffd200">黑暗种子</font>， 变成了真正的恶魔后回来了。
那时如果不是你救了我……呼……真是谢谢你。 但是，你怎么知道这里的？
是$npcName:11000407[gender:0]$让我来的。
啊……原来如此…… 我会亲自去$map:2000306$见爷爷的。谢谢你，$MyPCName$！
呜呜……呜呜…… 我一个人逃出来了……我一个人……
问是什么意思。
其实……我是和其他妖精瞒着族长，来$map:3000103$探险的……但是……在$map:3000103$走散了…… 都是因为那个可怕的魔女……魔女可能把他们都吃了……

$MyPCName$，你能不能去黑暗之地的$map:3000103$， 找到之前和我在一起的妖精呢？

嗯？你听不懂我说的话吗？ 非要我动手吗？你还不赶紧从我眼前消失？
询问森林妖精在哪里。
妖精？啊~那些吵吵闹闹的家伙？ 呵呵呵……那些家伙实在太吵了，我就把他们送到$map:2000349$去了。 他们看见我就吓得浑身发抖，我告诉他们那是回家的路， 他们就头也不回地去了$map:2000349$哦？呵呵呵呵……

哼！不错嘛！ 我还以为你们会全部消失在黑暗的漩涡里呢……居然全都救了出来……

如果你走到$map:2000349$的尽头，确认了新的魔王之子是谁， 然后告诉我，我就会给你我非常珍惜的宝物。 怎么样？不错吧？
如果你走到$map:2000349$的尽头，确认了新的魔王之子是谁， 然后告诉我，我就会给你我非常珍惜的宝物。 怎么样？不错吧？
天啊？呵呵呵呵呵呵~你居然活着回来了？ 真是意外啊！呵呵呵……好，你知道新的魔王之子是谁了？
魔王之子就是$npcName:11000044[gender:0]$。事情是这样的……
哎呀……原来如此。 嗯……黑暗种子……遇到了好主人啊……呵呵呵……
<font color="#ffd200">布玛尔</font>……没来……为什么…… 这里太吵了……轰！咚！咣！梆梆梆梆！耳朵……好疼…… 这里……和<font color="#ffd200">卡尔卡尔</font>不一样！

反正没来。不知道在哪里。 <font color="#ffd200">糊涂商团</font>的朋友们也许知道。 帮我找到<font color="#ffd200">布玛尔</font>。去<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001274[gender:0]$</font>那里。
<font color="#ffd200">糊涂商团</font>的朋友们也许知道。 帮我找到<font color="#ffd200">布玛尔</font>。去<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001274[gender:0]$</font>那里。

啊～<font color="#ffd200">布玛尔</font>……！ 当然认识。<font color="#ffd200">布玛尔</font>也是我们<font color="#ffd200">糊涂商团的成员</font>，当初和我们一起来到了这里，但是…… 她说必须尽快回到<font color="#ffd200">卡尔卡尔</font>，就带着$npcName:11001274[gender:0]$消失了。
问<font color="#ffd200">卡尔卡尔</font>在哪里。

哎呀～不，不。 我还是更喜欢这里。有很多新奇好玩的东西……
如果你想了解更多有关<font color="#ffd200">布玛尔</font>的情况，可以去问<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001181[gender:0]$</font>。 在我们糊涂商团中，他和<font color="#ffd200">布玛尔</font>最要好了。

嗯？<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001274[gender:0]$</font>正在找<font color="#ffd200">布玛尔</font>？ $npcName:11001274[gender:0]$现在人在哪儿呢？
说在出租车停车场后面。
咦，我找了他很久……怎么就没看见呢…… 唉～$npcName:11001274[gender:0]$那个家伙……
事实上，几天前我从<font color="#ffd200">布玛尔</font>那里收到了一封信。 她说好像可以找到回到故乡的方法……她说很快就会回来，让我照顾一下$npcName:11001274[gender:0]$……
问知不知道信是从哪里寄来的。
是<font color="#ffd200">$map:2000062$</font>的一个名叫<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000994[gender:0]$</font>的人寄来的。 据说那个人是靠帮人跑腿赚钱的， 我想也许是布玛尔让他帮着寄的信。
那个人……会不会知道<font color="#ffd200">布玛尔</font>在什么地方呢？ 嗯……大概……给他<font color="#ffd200">500金币</font>，他就会把知道的一切都告诉你……

是<font color="#ffd200">$map:2000062$</font>的一个名叫<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000994[gender:0]$</font>的人寄来的。 那个人……会不会知道<font color="#ffd200">布玛尔</font>在什么地方呢？ 嗯……大概……给他<font color="#ffd200">500金币</font>，他就会把知道的一切都告诉你了……
嗯？有什么事吗？
问认不认识布玛尔。
嗯……可以说认识……也可以说不认识…… 空着手光用嘴说……我的脑袋有点转不过来……
<font color="#ffd200">布玛尔</font>……嗯……让我想想…… 啊～想起来了！ <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001276[gender:0]$</font>和他的助手们说正在寻找一个叫<font color="#ffd200">卡尔卡尔</font>还是卡莱卡莱的地方， 在我这里坐过船，我听和他一起过来的小伙子提起过！
问他们坐船去了哪里。
$map:2000183$！！ 由于下达了航海禁令，民营船舶原则上是禁止开往那里的…… 因此我特地帮他们想了办法，让他们能够偷渡到那里～ 而且价格也很优惠～呵呵呵。
如果你也想偷渡到$map:2000183$，可以随时来找我。 我会给你个最低价～
如果你也想偷渡到$map:2000183$，可以随时来找我。 我会给你个最低价～
嗯？你在找谁？
说正在找布玛尔。
啊～没错，名字叫布玛尔。 我们是<font color="#ffd200">卡尔卡尔花样少年</font>～呵呵呵～ 你到底是谁？到这里来找<font color="#ffd200">布玛尔</font>干什么？
说明来找布玛尔的原因。

呵呵～原来是这样。 我们也不知道<font color="#ffd200">布玛尔</font>为什么想回到<font color="#ffd200">卡尔卡尔岛</font>。 只有<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001276[gender:0]$</font>老师知道。听说了布玛尔的情况之后，老师就丢下了手中的一切， 来到这里一直守着<font color="#ffd200">胖胖</font>。
问<font color="#ffd200">胖胖</font>是什么。
啊～那是装备了<font color="#ffd200">卡尔卡尔岛</font>航线探测器的<font color="#ffd200">飞艇</font>。 因为飞艇涨得圆圆的漂浮在空中，所以我们给它起了这个名字。 我们和<font color="#ffd200">布玛尔</font>都是坐着它走的……
问是不是去过卡尔卡尔岛。
嗯……这个嘛……希望这次能成功抵达…… 之前全都失败了。不知道是探测器有问题，还是飞艇本身有问题…… 或者是大海中的神秘力量阻断了航路…… 我们尝试了好几次，但出发不久之后就会噗通掉进海里！
已经不知道失败了多少次了。 我也坐过一次……唉……差点被海水腌成了咸菜。 但是<font color="#ffd200">布玛尔</font>一直没有放弃。不停地乘坐，掉进海里，然后再乘坐…… 一定是有什么事，让她必须回到<font color="#ffd200">卡尔卡尔岛</font>。
平常这个时候，她应该要回来重新搭乘飞艇了…… 今天怎么……嗯……难道成功了吗？
嗯……嗯……我爷爷……每天都会做噩梦。 他的身体越来越弱了……呜呜……
问做了什么噩梦。
嗯……他说梦见纳兹卡尔神殿……哗啦啦地……倒下，在那里出现了 巨大的黑色漩涡…… 漩涡之中有一只巨大的黑龙正在张开翅膀……
纳兹卡尔神殿在很久很久以前是金龙们神圣的神殿…… 爷爷梦见的可怕景象，该不会真的发生吧？ 不会的……但要是黑龙真的在神殿深处苏醒的话，该怎么办呢？
太可怕了……我很担心……这样下去我也会做噩梦的…… $MyPCName$，你能帮我去确认一下……看看神殿中 是不是真的发生了什么事吗？
太可怕了……我很担心……这样下去我也会做噩梦的…… $MyPCName$，你能帮我去确认一下……看看神殿中 是不是真的发生了什么事吗？
呃啊啊……这里太可怕了…… 你到这黑暗的神殿来干什么哟……？
讲述$npcName:11001215[gender:1]$的故事。
呃啊啊……那个梦……有一半是真的……但也不一定…… 我也不知道哟……
事实上……前面的那扇门咪…… 好像通往什么地方……给人的感觉很不好咪哟…… 我一直在这里观察……里面好像有什么东西咪哟…… 有勇气的话……你想进去看看吗，咪哟？
事实上……前面的那扇门咪…… 好像通往什么地方……给人的感觉很不好咪哟…… 我一直在这里观察……里面好像有什么东西咪哟…… 有勇气的话……你想进去看看吗，咪哟？
啊！太好了咪哟！ 你安然出来了咪哟！里面……发生了什么事咪哟？
说黑暗的魔龙想要抢夺龙石。
<font color="#ffd200">龙石</font>？光之石……我好像听说过咪哟！ 那些名叫魔龙的家伙想抢走它咪哟？哦哦哦哦…… 这是个非常紧急的情报咪哟！！要是你的同伴们来找我的话，我得赶紧告诉他们咪哟！
还得告诉萌茸茸部族咪哟！ 此外，我会派侦察队员去告诉$npcName:11001215[gender:1]$咪哟……！
The deep corruption of the $map:02000350$'s is sure to wear on you the deeper you travel inside. I've prepared some gifts for weary warriors returning from their battle against the darkness.
$MyPCName$, when combatting the corruption of the $map:02000350$ begisn to wear on you, come see me. It won't be much, but hopefully I'll have a gift that can help you.
$MyPCName$, when combatting the corruption of the $map:02000350$ begisn to wear on you, come see me. It won't be much, but hopefully I'll have a gift that can help you.
Oh... $MyPCName$! How far did you get? I can feel that the corruption remains, but at least you are unharmed. I'd like you to have this $item:30000524$ for your efforts.
If you gather enough, you can use them to open the special treasure chests I sell in my shop. I'm certain what's inside will be of use to you.
Well... I'm almost ready to start construction on my house, but I need one more thing...
What is it?

This place is dangerous with so many $npcPlural:21000029$ around, but I'm building my house here, because $map:02000001$ is too expensive. That said, it's a great place to build. Clear running water, wide open spaces, and the fresh smell of the forest!
I have everything else ready. I was thinking all I need is cement, but I got an idea after seeing the $npcPlural:21000029$ in the surrounding area!
The $npcPlural:21000029$ love to gather down by the water. Defeat them and harvest $itemPlural:20000055$. That's all I need to carry out my brilliant plan to live off the land.
The $npcPlural:21000029$ love to gather down by the water. Defeat them and harvest $itemPlural:20000055$. That's all I need to carry out my brilliant plan to live off the land.
Oh! This will be plenty. Thanks!
If I lump up the $itemPlural:20000055$ and bake them in the furnace, I can make my own special cement. Could you help me?
Don't worry if you end up needing more $itemPlural:20000055$. You can just head right back to the stream and defeat the $npcPlural:21000029$ to get them.
Take the $itemPlural:20000055$ I gave you and make $item:30000094$ in the furnace! If you don't have enough $itemPlural:20000055$, just hunt $npcPlural:21000029$ nearby!
Excellent! Now I can work on the bricks!
汪！汪！出大事了！汪！
问是什么事。
我的朋友们！汪！<font color="#ffd200">被陨石碎片埋起来了汪！</font> 请你去陨石周围救出我的朋友汪！
汪！请把这周围散落的<font color="#ffd200">陨石碎片</font>清理掉！汪！ 那下面埋着我的朋友汪！
谢谢你汪！ 我一定会报答你的汪！
It's high time I stop acting like a hooligan!
Why do you want to stop?

Lately, my hooligan friends and I have started doing a lot worse than petty crime. I've started to think, "Is it okay? Do I really want this life for myself?" Worse, the salary for hired muscle isn't nearly what it used to be.
So I'm done with that thug life for good! I swear! But if I turn myself in, I might go to prison. I don't want to go to prison!

I was really worried about it until I saw a bulletin board! Katvan, the leader of Dark Wind himself, is the one who posted it! "Reward! Defeat $npcPlural:29000023$ and Provide Proof to Earn Cold, Hard Mesos!"
This is how I can redeem myself! It even said I'd be pardoned of my crimes if I can just collect some $itemPlural:30000097$!

I heard there are $npcPlural:29000023$ hiding somewhere in $map:02000110$. The problem is, I can't show my face anywhere right now, or I'll go straight to the big house. Won't you defeat some $npcPlural:29000023$ and collect their capes to save me from life in prison?
You'll flush all the $npcPlural:29000023$ out of hiding if you pull on the levers you see around the area!
Please defeat $npcPlural:29000023$ and get $itemPlural:30000097$ for me! Pull on the levers, and you're sure to find them.
Wow! You don't know what this means to me, friend! I'm well on my way to being a reformed hooligan now!
Why is it so noisy here?
What's wrong?
I had a call with my son, $npc:11000360[gender:0]$, yesterday. He said he's old enough to live on his own now, and he found a place in some swelteringly hot, noisy place called $map:02000086$.
I knew it was a construction site, but who knew it could be so loud?
Do you think maybe... Would you make those noisy monsters quiet down?
How is my precious son supposed to sleep through all that racket?
I'm doing all of this for my son. He really needs his beauty sleep!
Please make those noisy monsters quiet down. I love my son too much to let that racket continue.
Thank you! What a difference!
Ugh, it's really hot here.
What's wrong?
You know my son moved here, right?
Well, I came here for a visit, but it turns out that it's really noisy here... and really, really hot! Too hot for my liking!
I got worried about my son and thought it would be a good idea to give him this ice pack. The trouble is, that lava is terrifying! I'm too scared to try crossing it.
But you seem really brave. Would you please take this ice pack to my son, $npc:11000360[gender:0]$? I'm so worried he's going to pass out from heat exhaustion or something...
Why did you come back?
I lost the $item:30000098$.
Never mind.
The weather here is so hot that it must have melted. No worries! I've got more! Have another.
Hm? But it's already in your bag. You should pay more attention.
Isn't your bag full? Come to me after you empty it.
My son, $npcName:11000360[gender:0]$ is on the other side of the lava. I wanted to visit him, but I'm just too scared to cross it myself.
Mom? She doesn't need to worry. I'm doing just fine on my own! Parents are such worrywarts, aren't they?
Phew! I thought I could handle it, but this heat is unbearable!
You're darn right!
But it's not just the heat! Some engineer didn't account for the unstable ground around here. They overdeveloped the area, and now sinkholes are opening up full of lava!
The lava pits are a serious hazard to anyone passing through, and the heat they're giving off is unbearable.
Please pick up some of this ice and use it to block up those lava pits. It's the only way I can think of to solve both problems at once.
Watch out. That lava's hot, and if you aren't careful, you could fall in! As long as you do it right, you can place the ice without getting hurt.
You know, I really didn't figure on the ice melting. But it's definitely a lot cooler now! Anyway, thanks for the help. Now I've just got to order a few dozen more tons of ice...
I'm not catching anything today...
What are you trying to catch?
Oh! Hello, I'm $npc:11000362[gender:0]$.
I set up traps on the beach to catch $npcPlural:29000033$. But those sneaky little crustaceans aren't falling for my tricky traps today. They're just too smart!
I'll bet if I have help, I could catch a bunch of $npcPlural:29000033$ though! I've been looking forward to a tasty seafood meal for ages!
If you've got the time, would you help me lure the nearby $npcPlural:29000033$ into the traps on the beach?
Prep the trap by opening it, then lure the $npcPlural:29000033$ right into it.
You'll find the traps I set up down on the beach. If you lure the $npcPlural:29000033$ into them, you'll have plenty of $itemPlural:20000056$ in no time!
Oooh! My mouth's watering already. I can't wait to cook these beauties up! Thank you!
Yes! It's finally ready!
What's ready?
What do you think? $itemPlural:30000140$! You caught so many $npcPlural:29000033$ for me, I was able to make a bunch of $itemPlural:30000140$! It's a veritable feast!!
My cooking is amazing, and this dish turned out even better than the last time I made it. I want the world to taste my cooking! But how is anyone supposed to hear about it?

Listen, I'll keep making $itemPlural:30000140$. While I do that, you can spread the word to tourists on the beach. What better person to tell everyone how great my food is than the person who caught the fresh ingredients for it?
Follow the beach to the east and you're sure to find tourists. Spread the word about my $itemPlural:30000140$, so the whole world can have the best crab they've ever eaten!
Was it a success?
I only convinced one person.
Even one is enough! So begins my career as a gourmet $item:30000140$ chef! Thank you so much!
<font color="#909090">(This pig is no more. It has ceased to be.)</font>
(Look around.)
<font color="#909090">(The pig is surrounded by broken pieces of wood and a propeller that is still spinning. A cloud of dust hangs in the air, slowly settling to the ground.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Was this pig... trying to fly? This oddity warrants further investigation)</font>

<font color="#909090">(It seems that before its untimely demise, this pig was attempting to fly on a homemade aircraft. It must have jumped from somewhere high. Perhaps you can retrace its short-lived journey.)</font>
Hello, my name is Fondue. All my life I've looked up at the sky in envy of the birds who soared so freely above.
Continue reading.
My friends would merely laugh at me and say, "Only things with wings can fly. You don't have any." A lesser pig's dreams would be forever dashed. But I was inspired.

Couldn't I make my own wings? Why should I settle for the way the world made me? And so I set to work, sneaking wood and tools from nearby humans. And after a long effort, my wings are finally complete!
All that's left is to don my wings, and jump. Today is the day that a pig will finally fly!
And so, if you are reading this, look up to the sky. That's where you'll find me. Flying free with the birds.
Humans... they try to change everything to their taste!
What is it?
Humans are trying to develop the $map:2000017$! $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ over there is one of them!
I can't understand why they are trying to destroy this beautiful forest. Take this potion made from dew and spray it on the seedlings around the path!
If they can't be driven out... I'm going to make it as difficult as possible for them to move here!
$MyPCName$, I trust that you won't do something like $npc:11000350[gender:0]$ and build a house in my already perfect forest!
You can get the potion from the basket next to me! Spray it in front of the portal to the human town!
Thank you! You taught those entitled humans a lesson while protecting the forest. I call that a win-win deal!
Such raw power, it will be mine!
Uhh... What?
Let me guess, you look upon what's happening here in $map:02000145$ with horror. That is because you are shortsighted! When I look out there, I see beauty!
Observe the overwhelming power of those creatures as they overtake their prey. In nature, the strong triumph over the weak. But science is a tool that allows men to conquer nature itself!
We need only learn to harness nature's power, a task which requires data. Unfortunately, my assistants are cowards. A few light maimings, and they abandon all of our research!
That data is crucial to my research, perhaps even the future of humanity!
You'll note that this facility has three large structures. At the top of each is a computer used to store our research.

As our network was disrupted in the first attack, the computers' data must be retrieved manually. I however, am ill suited to deal with the monsters that surround them. And so it falls to you! Will you answer science's call?
What are you doing standing around gawking like a buffoon? Find the three computers and download their data!
Beep! Primary ingredient is rabbit saliva infused with shadow energy. Sample Contents by volume: Rabbit Saliva 55.75%. Slime Extract 44.25%.
Beep! Transfer data to terminal $npc:11000370$ for further analysis.
Beep! Transfer data to terminal $npc:11000370$ for further analysis.
Beep! High concentrations of dark energy contaminants detected. Tests Conclusion: Distillation of shadow energies viable. Prolonged exposure to sample not recommended.
Beep! Extrapolating. Serum synthesis viable using provided formula. Transfer data to terminal $npc:11000371$ for usage analysis.
Beep! Extrapolating. Serum synthesis viable using provided formula. Transfer data to terminal $npc:11000371$ for usage analysis.
Beep! Analysis Findings: Injection of 29 ml distilled proteins via syringe will trigger extreme spontaneous muscle growth, and diminished brain capacity. Effects irreversible.
Beep! Analysis concluded. Serum synthesis data processed for mass-production. Please deliver data to appropriate department representative.
Beep! Analysis concluded. Serum synthesis data processed for mass-production. Please deliver data to appropriate department representative.
Yes, yes! This research will prove most helpful. Hmm? Oh, you needn't worry, I will use it responsibly. Eheheh.
Oh great beings from beyond the stars... Hear my call! <font color="#909090">(He stands with his eyes closed and his arms outstretched toward the sky.)</font>
What are you doing?
AN ALIEN!!! Huh? Oh, s-sorry... I thought you were one of them.
I'm trying to contact the aliens watching over Maple World from above! I set up messages of love all over the $map:02000087$ for them, so they know they are welcome.

Any alien culture advanced enough to reach our planet is probably waaaay more advanced than us. So they could squish us like bugs if they wanted to. That's why it's important to get on their good sides!
It's been a while since I set up my signals. Would you mind checking to see if the aliens have left a response? You can find my messages all over the hilltop!
You can find my messages all over the hilltop. Hurry and see if the aliens have responded!
What? My neighbors are complaining about my signals? They're the idiots! The universe is too big for us to be alone. We'll see who's laughing when the invasion comes!
All right! Ready to surmount your next challenge?
Yep!
This time, you've gotta climb your way to my buddy $npc:11000382[gender:0]$ in the $map:02000148$!
What are you still doing here? Hurry up and climb your way to $npc:11000382[gender:0]$ in the $map:02000148$!
Impressive! I like your gumption, pal.
Ahh, the wind on your face and a view that can't be matched. A worthwhile reward after a long climb.
What are you doing up here?
Oh hey! Did you climb all the way up here? You might have what it takes to join the Wall Climbers!
Doesn't reaching the top just fill you with a sense of serenity and accomplishment?
In that case, maybe you would be a good fit for our crew.

But don't get your hopes up! Not everybody has what it takes to become a Wall Climber! You'll have to go through a series of rigorous tests and come out on top. Only then will you be able to call yourself one of us.
My associate $npc:11000379[gender:0]$ is somewhere high up in $map:02000135$. Put your climbing skills to the test, and find him.
Put your climbing skills to the test and find $npc:11000379[gender:0]$ high above $map:02000135$!
Well I'll be a mushroom's uncle. $npc:11000381[gender:0]$ said you were coming. Good work making it to the top!
Ready for your final challenge?
Sure.
This time you've gotta climb your way to a cool cat named $npc:11000380[gender:0]$ at $map:02000110$.
It's time for your final challenge! Climb your way to $npc:11000380[gender:0]$ at $map:02000110$. Well? Hop to it!
No way, you made it all the way up here!
Did I pass the test?
Did you pass? With style!
It's my pleasure to officially welcome you to the ranks of the Wall Climbers! Congratulations, and keep climbing to greater heights!
这可真是……有点严重啊？
问是什么事。
这个可怜的少年在缆车上<font color="#ffd200">打闹</font>，结果 <font color="#ffd200">掉了下来</font>，受了重伤。
他受了重伤…… 连身为医生的我都束手无策！
你能去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000134$</font>，把格尔多斯制药厂的<font color="#ffd200">$item:20000057$</font>拿点过来吗？
幸好是我发现了这个家伙…… 请你去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000134$</font>，把格尔多斯制药厂的<font color="#ffd200">$item:20000057$</font>拿点过来！
谢谢你！ 现在我就能治疗这个家伙了！
为什么垃圾这么多！真是烦死了！
询问她为什么心烦。
嗯？$MyPCName$，你好啊？我问你<font color="#ffd200">一个问题</font>。 $MyPCName$为什么来到森林里呢？
没错！为了享受美丽的自然，对吧！ 那我<font color="#ffd200">再问你个问题</font>！ 那么，在森林可以扔垃圾吗？不行吧？
<font color="#ffd200">当然不行！</font>但是，在森林各个地方的人们把 自己吃剩的水果到处乱扔！ 我没办法忍受这个森林变得这么脏乱！
$MyPCName$！请帮我打扫一下森林吧！ 你<font color="#ffd200">应该</font>不会说…… ……又不是你弄的，还要你来打扫……这样的话吧？
你在干什么呢！快点打扫那些被乱扔的<font color="#ffd200">水果篮</font>！ 它们在<font color="#ffd200">这下面</font>滚来滚去的！
你弄了挺久啊。都扫完了吧？
告诉她关于道古力的事情。
真的吗？<font color="#ffd200">道古力设置的陷阱</font>？？ 抱歉，$MyPCName$……我都不知道……
Life is about solitude.
Is that tree really talking?
You know, I wasn't always alone like this. When I was just a sapling, I had more tree friends than leaves!
But it's been many years since then, and all of my friends have gone. I'm so lonely. I have only myself to talk to now.
But you... You could plant new friends for me! Red trees if you please. Not those green ones. They're notorious sunlight hogs.
Red trees next to me, please!
Thanks! They don't talk much now, but I'm sure they will in time.
He's so dreamy...
Who's dreamy?
Haven't you heard? It's $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$</font>! $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ is right here in $map:02000137$!
That vacant stare on your face... Do you really not know who $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ is?! Have you been living under a rock?

$npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ is a really, really, really, ridiculously good looking superstar sensation with the voice of an angel. His singles constantly top the charts. Ladies want him, and men want to be him!
And he's RIGHT OVER THERE ON THAT STAGE! I have to get a picture of him... <font color="#909090">(She stares intently into the distance, her breathing intensifying).</font>
His stupid bodyguards are confiscating cameras from anybody who gets too close. Somebody could climb up that building <b>to the left of the stage</b to get a picture...
But since that building is swarming with monsters, all I can do is stand here and stamp my feet.

I can't let $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ just swoop out of my life without at least some kind of memento. But you... You could get past those monsters! Would you please take some pictures of $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ without getting caught by his bodyguards?
Here you can use my camera. Won't you help a girl in love? Just get me some shots from a few different angles. Pleeeeeeaaase?
What are you doing back here?
Hey, I uhh, lost your $item:30000109$.
Never mind.
WHAT?! Do you know how much I spent on that camera? Sigh, it's a good thing I've got extras.
What? It's right there in your bag!
There's no room in your bag! Let me know when you've made some space.
What are you waiting for? Go get me some pictures of $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$! <font color="#909090">(She stares off into the distance and starts to drool.)</font>
Wow! Thank you so much! I'm going to keep these pictures under my pillow, heehee!
我还有件事要拜托你……
问是什么事。
这次是<font color="#ffd200">$npc:21090071$</font>，它们总是折磨我！ 你看见这周围的<font color="#ffd200">大树</font>了吗？
藏在那里的<font color="#ffd200">$npc:21090071$</font>总是把<font color="#ffd200">苹果</font>扔过来！ 不仅是行人，连我的气球也被那些家伙的<font color="#ffd200">苹果</font>砸中……
在我看来，得把它们的的武器<font color="#ffd200">苹果</font>弄没了才行！ 在大树中的各个地方都有苹果树！ 把那些树上的苹果都消灭掉吧！
<font color="#ffd200">$npc:21090071$</font>的周围有很多苹果树。 把那里的苹果全都弄没，让他们再也不能扔苹果！
谢谢你！现在我总算能好好做生意了！
This is such pitiful art. It's breaking my heart.
Yo! Have you seen my magnificent art all over $map:02000110$?
What do you mean you don't know which art is mine? The magnificent ones are mine, of course! It's that weird mushroom stuff that's bringing down the class in this joint!
Don't you agree? I don't know who that artist is, but they're cramping my style. They must be stopped!
I'm going to find out who is doing this. In the mean time, you can go around and erase all those lame mushrooms! Just make sure you don't mess up my stuff by mistake, okay? It's gonna make me famous!
What are you doing wasting time?! Hurry up and erase those mushrooms! I can't stand too look at them anymore!
You're sure you got them all? Good! You're the best!
I finally found the culprit behind that eyesore art!
Who is it?
It's some hack named $npc:11000412[gender:0]$ living in $map:02000086$! Pah! That name is almost as pathetic as their art.

$MyPCName$! I need you to go to $npc:11000412[gender:0]$'s hideout in $map:02000086$ and replace all the art around their house with mine! I know you're not an artist but, it's more about payback than quality now anyway.
Time for some sweet revenge! I need you to go to $npc:11000412[gender:0]$'s hideout in $map:02000086$ and replace all the art around their house with mine!
Hey! I saw your art in $map:02000110$, and it's actually pretty cool. I guess we're kindred artist spirits, huh?
A real adventurer feels no pain!
What are you talking about?
Strength and daring, of course! Do you think you've got what it takes to be a real adventurer?
You bet!
Ha! Maybe you think so, but you look weak to me. I'll bet you can't even handle a pinch on the arm!

You disagree? All right then. If you're so great, then prove it, hot shot! Bring me some of the $itemPlural:20000061$ that grow in the lava! Survive the heat, and I might just consider you worthy of my respect!
What? You still haven't gotten the $itemPlural:20000061$? You're scared, aren't you. I'll bet if you put some thought into it, you could figure out a way to get it without going into the lava.
Wow, you actually did it! Did you really go into the lava to get them?
(Give him a deeply-charred thumbs-up.)
S-sure I did.
Good job! I can admit when I'm wrong. You're a lot tougher than I thought!
I can't believe you actually got the $itemPlural:20000061$!
Adventurers should go on adventures all the time!
Now what are you talking about?
So, how did it feel to pluck those $itemPlural:20000061$ straight out of that lava? I've got to say, I find adventures like that to be completely exhilarating! You must be flying right now!
Of course. Who doesn't love a good soak in hot lava?
Well, now I've got another adventure that's sure to make your heart race! The Twingo workers around here mine something that's really hard to get. It's called $item:30000142$.
Now, the $npcPlural:21000086$ do the really tough work on the night shift. That's why they take a lot of naps.

So here's what I want you to do. Wake up the sleeping $npcPlural:21000086$ and while they're still confused, take them down and steal their $itemPlural:30000142$! If that doesn't get your heart racing, I don't know what will!
Follow the lava all the way down there, then bang on the smelting furnace to wake the $npcPlural:21000086$! They'll be so dazed, they won't know what hit 'em! Haha!
Just follow the lava down, and you can't miss the smelting furnace. Ha! These are the kind of adventures I live for!
You really did it! You really are a true adventurer!
Hmph! How rude! There's just no respect for business ethics anymore!
What's wrong?
My mom owns a fish store here in $map:02000111$, but business has gotten really tough recently.
She was doing really well until $npc:11000362[gender:0]$ came and opened up a $item:30000140$ business! Now she can't get customers to even glance her direction.
I can't sit by and watch my mom's business fail! Ugh! I hate competition. What happened to a good old corner on the market?
We've got to tip the scales back in our favor. Stack those tubes over the $npc:29000033$ traps $npc:11000362[gender:0]$ set up! That'll teach him not to interfere with our business!
It's his own fault! He should have known better than to come into our territory and disrupt our business.
Quick! Put the stack of tubes on the traps. Business is getting worse by the second!
Good job! I would have liked to solve this amicably, but this is a cold, rough world. Sometimes you've got to be aggressive!
Hm? That's strange...
What is it?
Well, we hardly sold any fish today, but our display is almost completely empty. There should be a lot more there...
There must be a fish thief in our midst! They're out to sabotage me!
Maybe you're overreacting a little...
I am not! I'll bet you anything those $npcPlural:21000101$ in the center of town are up to no good!
I'm so furious! $MyPCName$, I need you to go to the center of town, lay down the law with those $npcPlural:21000101$, and get my fish back. I refuse to tolerate thieves!
I knew this would happen the moment those $npcPlural:21000101$ came to $map:02000111$! I need you to go to the center of town and teach those meanies a lesson!
You're back! But where are the fish?
It turns out they weren't the fish thieves.
Wh-what? Hmph! Fine, just forget it! Whether they stole the fish or not, those $npcPlural:21000101$ still needed to be taught a lesson. They cause so much trouble!
It's not fair!
What's wrong?
My mom said drinking milk would make me taller, but I drank until I hurled, and I haven't grown an inch!
Look at those $npcPlural:21099049$ that wander around here. How did they get so tall?
There must be some secret allowing them to bulk up so quick.
I tried to ask one but he threw a tire at me... You look tough though. Would you mind investigating those crates of mysterious pill bottles they keep around?
Just rummage through those crates down there and let me know what you find!
Oh man! This'll make me tall, right? All right bottle of mystery pills, down the hatch!
Come on, you can do this.
What are you doing?
Ahh! Oh, hey. You see all those $npcPlural:29000025$ in the maintenance tunnel behind me? If somebody doesn't do something, they're gonna keep multiplying.
Okay, so do something about them.
That's what I was about to do right before you interrupted me! I've just... Gotta do some spider-squishing warm-ups first. <font color="#909090"> (He starts stomping back and forth.)</font>
Are you scared?
Scared? W-who me?
I've just gotta get my stompers ready before I go crawling into that dark, web-covered death trap, okay? If you're in such a hurry, why don't you go in there and squish them?!
Okay.
Well, get to work then! I was totally going to squish them all when I finished my warm up, but since you've volunteered...
Weren't you going to squish those spiders? Don't tell me you're backing out now!
Oh man, you squished them all? That's a real shame, I was just about to send them on a one-way trip to Stomptown. Oh well, thanks!
终于上市了！最尖端的瞬间移动机械TELI！
继续读。
您觉得去逛街太麻烦？ 生病了却不想去医院？
不要担心！ 最尖端的瞬间移动机械TELI！终于问世了。
绝对不会发生部分身体瞬间移动的事情！
现在就请体验一下传送装置_A吧！
现在就请体验一下传送装置_A吧！
怎么样？果然是可靠的TELI！
现在您能信任TELI的性能了吧？
继续读。
现在是回家的时间！
用TELI既然可以轻松地移动到家外面， 肯定也能轻松地移动到家里面吧？
马上把您送回家！ 现在就请使用TELI_B！
马上把您送回家~ 现在就请使用TELI_B！
哔- 数据错误。传送装置_控制器重新设置中…
唉……究竟是哪里出了错呢…
询问有什么问题。
嗯？你好。我是这个研究所的首席研究员。
你也应该看到了，应该流向发电机的熔岩 全都凝固了。
你查看一下这周围，就能发现熔岩路。 你能沿着熔岩路看看为什么 熔岩的流动会停止吗？
观察地面，就能看到凝固的熔岩路。 沿着那条路一直走，应该就能找到堵住的地方了吧？
果然是路被堵住了… 谢谢你！现在发电机又能启动啦！
Oh man... That was too close...
What happened to you?
Huh? Oh, hey. I'm $npcName:11000599[gender:0]$, treasure hunter extraordinaire.
I was checking out the tunnels behind me. Seemed like the perfect place to hide a treasure chest...
Well, there wasn't a treasure chest. Instead, there were falling rocks!
My foot got stuck and I had to leave my lucky shoe behind to escape.
Do me a solid and find it, would you? The entrance to the tunnel system is behind me, just past the "do not enter" sign.
Sure, I have these spare shoes, but that was my lucky shoe. Good luck in those tunnels.
Oh man, my shoe is a mess. It's still lucky, I guess... Thanks for your help.
Dummy
Dummy
Dummy
Dummy
Really? Really?
Really what?
We Kiyos are great flyers, but even we need to practice. It's not as though we're born knowing how to fly...
But good luck getting my good-for-nothing husband to acknowledge that!
$npcName:11000630[gender:0]$ said he'd teach the kids how to fly. So what does he do? He zooms off to the other side of the mountain and tells them to catch him if they can!
My poor babies! That's too far for little buzzards to fly on their own.
Please save my babies! They're probably crying for help down below...
My babies, my babies. You must save my babies!
Ha! Look at the little brats go! I told $npcName:11000629[gender:1]$ she was worried for nothing!
Sigh. I suppose there's no helping it.
What's going on?
After recent developments in my research, I thought I would finally be able to realize a project of great importance to me.
However, things did not turn out as I had hoped...
We face many setbacks in science. Sometimes they change things for good. But the science... The science must go on.
Below us is the $map:02000240$. Inside, you will find what remains of my experiment.
It must be destroyed.
Please... Go down there and end the abomination that lies within. It will bring nothing to this world but pain.
T-that note... Give that to me! You didn't read it, did you?
...What was that thing?
Merely a memory. One that should never have been unearthed.
Thank you. Now, I'd like to be left alone... I... I have much science to conduct.
I won't have this. I can't have it! This is unacceptable!
What are you going on about?
It's the T'oomba! It's all their fault!
The $map:02000048$ is my home. See the tipis everywhere? Those belonged to my neighbors!
Did the T'oomba care? Nooooo! They showed up one day and kicked us out of our own homes! Those good-for-nothing so-and-sos...
Oh, they think they can boss us around because there are more of them and they're stronger than us.
But I'll show them. I'll show them all!
You! Help me out. Gather a bunch of $item:30000198$ for me. There should be plenty laying around here.
You go get that $itemPlural:30000198$. I've got a plan...
The $map:02000048$ used to be a mine. You'll find the $item:30000198$ in no time.
This $item:30000198$ will do. This will do quite nicely...
All right. Now... it begins.
What begins?
I can't fight the T'oomba. I can't take our homes back. There's only one thing I can do...
I'll burn it all to the ground!!
Have you thought this through?
Of course I have! I'm not a madwoman, after all. But if we can't have our houses, then no one can!
Don't hold back. Teach the T'oomba a lesson they'll never forget!
What is it?
I lost the $item:30000198$...
Nothing.
How can you be so irresponsible? Luckily for you, I have plenty to spare. Now get back to committing arson!
It's in your hand! Pay attention. You still have homes to burn down!
Losing your home is the worst feeling in the world. I want the T'oomba to know exactly how that feels.
Yes, burn... Burn! The T'oomba deserve what they got! Thanks. You're a real hero.
呼……究竟是什么事……
开心地打招呼。
哦？这是谁啊？ $MyPCName$？
询问他过得好不好。
当然过得很好了。 但是……发生了一件让我很在意的事情。。
问是什么事。
你记得我的女朋友$npc:11000106[gender:1]$吗？ 最近完全没了联系……
<font color="#ffd200">"干什么呢。"</font> <font color="#ffd200">"怎么了。"</font> 她曾经给我发了许多这样的信息……
最近我都睡不着啊！ 这样下去是不行的！
$MyPCName$！请你现在就去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000162</font>$，从 怪物那里获得<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000035$</font>！
我要用那个<font color="#ffd200">入侵</font>$npc:11000106[gender:1]$的<font color="#ffd200">短信明细</font>！
你搜集了<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000035$</font>后，交给那里的<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000594[gender:0]$</font>博士，他就会告诉你要怎么做！
呼……究竟是什么事……
