我为了躲避人类才来到这里，你现在 要找到这里来<font color="#ffd200">折磨</font> 我吗？
说会尽全力帮助它。
如果你真的想帮我，好啊。 我可不是信任你，只是我现在的<font color="#ffd200">情况</font>不太好。我太累了。
这里开始产生熔岩泉后，可以获得的 食物少了很多。我现在需要给<font color="#ffd200">孩子</font>找到<font color="#ffd200">食物</font>。
在这里，我们能吃的食物就只有藏在 <font color="#ffd200">草丛</font>里的<font color="#ffd200">$npc:29000041$</font>。 如果你能去草丛里找到吃的， 我就<font color="#ffd200">信你一次</font>。
请你去<font color="#ffd200">草丛</font>那里翻找，藏在里面的<font color="#ffd200">$npc:29000041$</font>就会被吓得跑出来。请你抓到$npc:29000041$后带给我。
居然能从人类那里获得<font color="#ffd200">食物</font>…… 莫卡莫卡不相信人类。但是，我可以相信<font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>，现在你就是莫卡莫卡的<font color="#ffd200">朋友</font>了。
多亏了$MyPCName$，我们暂时不用<font color="#ffd200">孤军奋战</font>了。谢谢你。
I didn't even tell her goodbye. I have failed as a mate...
What's the matter, buddy?
I am blind, but in my mind's eye, I see visions. Visions of distant places and of the future.
These past few nights, I have dreamt of my mate. I see Anka standing alone in a desolate wasteland. A dark shadow passes over her, and when it passes, only her fur remains...
I could not accept it, but now... now I'm sure something terrible has happened to her.
You don't know that for sure.
I appreciate the thought, but I know it to be true. If only I had $item:30000270$... to give her a proper burial...
An old blind wolf like me wouldn't survive $map:02000267$, but you could go there. Please, find my mate. Or what remains of her...
In my dream, $item:30000270$ was burning amongst the lava flows. I don't know why she would have gone to such a dangerous place.
If... If you do find her fur, find somewhere in a sunny place to lay her to rest. Help her find peace in the afterlife.
Truly, I am wretched. All I can do is beg a stranger to do this thing in my place...
In my dream, $item:30000270$ is nestled in the lava flows of $map:02000267$. If you find her there, please find somewhere sunny to lay her to rest.
I have been watching for you to return. My vision has often been a boon, but it failed me when I needed it most...
I am pleased that she is at rest, at least. The love and warmth that she embodied in life continues on with the ancestors. Thank you.
Just look at this place. It's a cesspool of pollution thanks to the fat cats who rule $map:02000100$. It's a tale as old as time.

Rich companies get folks elected to city hall, who furnish them with private contracts in the name of "industrialization" and "development." The companies cut corners during production. Toxic chemicals enter the environment, and the city covers it up. And then...
And then what happens?

Giant mutant frogs is what happens! I keep telling people, you can do things the right way and still make a profit. But they're insatiable. They're got to have every last meso they can squeeze out of you, no matter the cost.
Okay, but... How do you even get mutant frogs?

Easy. The frogs live in the brook. Improperly disposed industrial waste gets into that brook and mixes up their DNA. Next thing you know, the frogs weigh a thousand pounds and are dressing themselves like some kind of royalty!
We call it $npc:23000013[gender:0]$, because that's what his stomping sounds like when you hear him coming. Really, that frog is prodigiously fat. It's kind of impressive.

Anyway, city hall knows all about our buddy $npc:23000013[gender:0]$ here, but they couldn't do anything about him if they wanted to, and they don't. You know this place used to be a purification facility? Well, now it's where they dump their sludge, which I can only assume forms the base of $npc:23000013[gender:0]$'s diet.
Is there something I can do to help?

Help? You could start by putting $npc:23000013[gender:0]$ out of our misery, but really that's as good as shutting the stable door after the horses have bolted. Failing that, just get out of my face. I've already got a headache from this smell.
If you can't solve corporate greed, you could at least get rid of $npc:23000013[gender:0]$. It'd be one less thing I have to smell in the morning.
Wait, what? You really got rid of fatso the frog?
I did.

Well I'll be! Now if you could just address the corrupting influence of capitalism that spawned this whole mess, maybe we could start turning this water back the color it was before. You heard me. That green stuff down there is crisp, refreshing water. Yum yum!
No? Well, it was worth a try. Now if you'll excuse me, I'm off to toil for an unlivable wage so my kids can live in above-average squalor on a quietly dying rock.
你听到这个声音了吗？ 我在梦里感觉到的不祥气息成了 <font color="#ffd200">现实</font>啊……
询问梦的详情。
魔法密林上发生大<font color="#ffd200">地震</font>时， 地面<font color="#ffd200">下陷</font>， 有一些妖精被红黑的水流卷走，身体发生了<font color="#ffd200">变形</font>。
曾经在魔法密林最漂亮的，叫做<font color="#ffd200">爱丽尔</font>的 妖精也遭遇了这个<font color="#ffd200">灾难</font>。 爱丽尔因为自己和其他妖精的外表不同而伤心， 成为了<font color="#ffd200">堕落的黑妖精</font>。
最终，她撒下了<font color="#ffd200">黑暗的种子</font>， 唤醒了地下世界凶残的警卫兵<font color="#ffd200">$npc:23100039[gender:0]$</font>。
我用<font color="#ffd200">瞬间移动</font>魔法将$npc:23000039[gender:0]$关在了过去古代魔法师的休息处 <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000312$</font>， 但是，吸收了黑暗的精气之后，$npc:23000039[gender:0]$正在渐渐变得<font color="#ffd200">残暴</font>。
在<font color="#ffd200">$npc:23100039[gender:0]$</font>变得更加狂暴之前， 我们无论如何都必须阻止它。 不然魔法密林会<font color="#ffd200">被毁灭</font>的。
我们一定要阻止<font color="#ffd200">$npc:23100039[gender:0]$</font>，守护魔法密林和 这里的妖精。
请你消灭<font color="#ffd200">$npc:23100039[gender:0]$</font>。否则 魔法密林会<font color="#ffd200">被毁灭</font>的。
哦，你回来了，我刚才在生命球中看到 有一束光照亮了魔法密林。 你消灭了<font color="#ffd200">$npc:23100039[gender:0]$</font>吗？
没错。
我十分<font color="#ffd200">尊敬</font>你的勇敢。真的谢谢你。 魔法密林的希望之光将照亮你的<font color="#ffd200">前路</font>。
They say that no news is good news, but I've got a bad feeling about this.
The captain sent a squad out a few days ago, and we haven't heard a peep from them since. They should be back by now.
There have been all kinds of rumors about the $map:02000013$ lately. We didn't take it seriously, but now I'm wondering if we should have...
If you happen to be headed out that way, would you mind swinging by the $map:02000013$ to see if my fellow Green Hoods are still there?
The captain is all about following procedures and making regular reports. The squad we sent to the $map:02000013$ wouldn't go this long without checking in. I'm worried...
Huh? What are you doing in this remote place?
$npc:11000961[gender:1]$ sent me to check on you.
I-I knew it... I knew $npc:11000961[gender:1]$ wouldn't forget about us! Listen, the situation here is bad.
We're fighting for our lives out here. Things seemed peaceful at first, but then a whole mess of monsters appeared from nowhere and ambushed us.
We've got wounded, and we don't have the medicine we need to cure them. We don't even have any basic field supplies left...
Are you hurt?
Me? I'm fine. It's the others that I'm worried about. If you're here to help, go find them, first.
Where should I go?
Find $npcName:11000832[gender:1]$. She's the only person treating the wounded right now.
I'll head back to $map:02000076$ and get reinforcements.
Find $npcName:11000832[gender:1]$! She can't heal all the injured Green Hoods on her own.
$npc:11000962[gender:1]$ must have sent you. Glad to hear she's still on her feet!
I'm $npcName:11000832$. Quiet, you fool! This is no time for introductions!
You seem fit enough for the job. There's no time to waste. Get to it!
Get to what, exactly?
Helping the injured, of course! I'm fresh out of medicine, and their prognosis is not good without it.
Luckily, I happen to know a thing or two about field chemistry. You'd be surprised at all the tinctures and cures you can make up with the right mixture of goo and gunk!
What goo and gunk do you need?
Oh, good question! Let's see. A handful of $item:30000285$ and a cup of $itemPlural:30000286$ should do the trick!
The area is teeming with $npcPlural:21000353$ and $npcPlural:21000003$, so this should be a piece of cake for you. Probably.
Hunt the $npcPlural:21000353$ and $npcPlural:21000003$ nearby. Get $item:30000285$ and $itemPlural:30000286$. Simple, no?
There you are. I hope you didn't sample any of the ingredients while you were collecting them—I may have forgotten to mention they're pretty poisonous on their own.
Anyway, this should be enough to keep our medicine cabinets full. For now.
It's going to take me a while to mash this goop into something usable. In the meantime, I need you to check on my patients.
I've enlisted the aid of a traveling merchant named $npcName:11000963[gender:0]$. Go find him on the hill west of here.
The folks here deserve better than this. But I gotta say, my supplies are running low and I don't really know what I'm doing.
The nice lady over the hill gave me this medicine to ease the pain of all the injured people on the path below. I think you're better suited to that particular job.
I'm going to take a quick breather, then I'll head out and get more medicine from $npcName:11000832[gender:1]$. Good luck down there!
It won't cure them, but that $item:30000287$ should help with the pain.
I might have used up all the $item:30000287$.
Never mind.
You already ran out of $item:30000287$? I'm practically out of it, myself. I've gotta get back to $npcName:11000832[gender:1]$ for more...
I don't exactly have enough of the stuff. You'll have to make due with however much you have left for now.
Your bag is stuffed to the brim! Drop some stuff and ask me again.
We don't have time for this. Please hurry.
That stuff was potent. I saw a bunch of the survivors run off towards $map:02000076$!
What about you? Need some ointment?
Oh, no, no, I'm fine! Thank you for offering, though. Mighty kind of you.
Besides, teamwork is the best medicine. Or maybe kindness? Whatever it is, your good acts today have put a smile on my face.
I don't know what happened here. Honestly, I'm not sure I even care.
Look at those hideous creatures, swarming the fortress below. I've seen my share of action in my time with the militia, but this...
But if I let something like a little monster army be the end of me, I'd be a disgrace to the Green Hoods!
$MyPCName$, stand with me. We're the only ones left who can hold the fort!
I'll snipe any monsters trying to scale the walls. I want you on the ground, cutting through the $npcPlural:21000003$, $npcPlural:21000353$, and $npcPlural:21000306$ below.
There's an army of $npcPlural:21000003$, $npcPlural:21000353$, and $npcPlural:21000306$ at the base of the $map:02000013$. I suggest we do something to thin their numbers.
Blast it! We've hardly put a dent in their numbers. At least you've bought us some time to regroup...
When I get back to $map:02000076$, I'm letting $npc:11000015[gender:1]$ know that we couldn't have held this place without you.
Persistent gnat! Unsightly cretin! Have you come to taunt me with your CLANG CLANG and your THUMP THUMP and your... ugh! ...trendy music?
My what now?
Don't interrupt me! I'm asking the questions here! If I hear another peep from you, I'll beat you 'round the ears!
(Say nothing.)
Well, speak up! Are you deaf?!
You told me not to say anything!
And you'd do well to do so! Honestly, kids these days. It's impossible to have a civilized conversation with the likes of you...
What's got you in such a tizzy?
Don't you hear all that banging and clanging just outside my door? It's enough to drive a man mad! Trendy, uncultured drivel!
A man of culture—like me—should only subject himself to the finest of concertos! If you really aren't with them, then it is your duty to society to drive them from this place!
Sure. Who am I evicting, exactly?

I hesitate to say their names, lest the mere act of speaking them lowers my standing in polite society! But it must be done. I would have you defeat the $npcPlural:21000173$... ugh! ...and the $npcPlural:21000278$. Disgusting!
I cannot tolerate such uncouth percussion! Defeat the $npcPlural:21000173$... ugh! ...and the $npcPlural:21000278$.
Yes, yes, that's better. Say what you will about the peasantry, but you lot do know a thing or two about brute strength.
That will be all. I have my compositions to return to, and you really belong... Well, anywhere that isn't here, I suppose.

You just can't stay away, can you? It doesn't matter what you are—man, woman, disgruntled chicken—I'm simply irresistable! It's enough to get on a gal's nerves, I tell you. And this terrible hunger is not helping.
It's almost swimsuit season here in the $map:02000186$, so I'm working on shedding some pounds, but... this diet hasn't even shed one pound yet!
I don't get it. I made a super strict diet plan and everything! It makes no sense.
There's a lot that doesn't make sense here...
Stop mumbling to yourself and help me. That's what you hero-types do, isn't it?
There's a lady uphill from here, $npcName:11000974[gender:1]$. I hear she knows all about cooking.
Show her my diet regimen and figure out what I'm doing wrong. There's no point starving myself if I'm not getting my beach bod back!
What's the hold up? My diet regimen won't bring itself to $npcName:11000974[gender:1]$!
I may have lost the regimen...
I'll get right on that.
Pay attention! I only have so many of these. If I didn't know any better, I'd think you were trying to sabotage my diet...
I can see it sticking out of your pack! You aren't trying to steal my secret diet plan, are you? For shame!
Your bag could stand to lose some weight, too! Drop some of the garbage and I'll give you another copy.
Hurry! Time waits for no $male:man,female:woman$, and swimsuit season is almost here!
Oh my! Look at all the rich food on this regimen. Surely this isn't meant to be a diet...?
If someone were to eat all of this food in a single day... Why, it's enough to kill a normal human!
She's actually a pig...
Is that so? This might be an interesting challenge. All right, I'll try my best!
She'll be the slimmest pig in the pen. Hmm... am I allowed to say that? Anyway, I've got a delicious dish in store for her!
What's the dish?
I call it $item:30000292$! I don't have all of the ingredients I need, though. Help a lady out?
What ingredients do you need?
Let's see here... $itemPlural:30000289$, $itemPlural:30000290$, and... $itemPlural:30000291$! Yes, those ingredients will do.
You can get $itemPlural:30000289$ from $npcNamePlural:21000160$. $itemPlural:30000289$ grow on the trees around here and there are $itemPlural:30000291$ all over the place.
Such lovely, fresh ingredients! Give me just a moment to pack this lunch box.
Ta-da! Presenting $item:30000292$! Doesn't it smell good?
Hurry it over to $npcName:11000973[gender:1]$ while it's still hot.
Oh! And let her know that I threw away her old diet regimen and put a new one in the lunch box.
I'd like $npcName:11000973[gender:1]$ to try the lunch before it gets cold, if at all possible. May I help you?
I lost the lunch box.
I'd better get going, then.
I'm a little hurt you lost it, to be honest. Oh well. I'll whip up another box, I suppose!
Oh-ho! You're a busy one, aren't you? The lunch box is in your bag. I can smell it from here!
Oh dear! Your bag is full, I'm afraid. Are you sure you can't make any room?
There aren't any preservatives in my cooking, so please get the lunch box to $npcName:11000973[gender:1]$ straight away. Until next time!
Mm, what's that smell? It's so... sweet!
<font color="#909090">(She snatches $item:30000292$ from your hands and gobbles it down.)</font> This's supposed to be healthy? Really? But it's so good!
That's it! Starting today, I'm on $npcName:11000974[gender:1]$'s diet!
With this diet and my natural good looks, I'll be unstoppable! Now, if only the beach wasn't so far away...
Will be added
Will be added
Will be added
Will be added
Will be added
Will be added
Will be added
Will be added
Will be added
Hey, kid! You see that? My punch flew at the speed of light!
I didn't see anything.
Hmph, of course you didn't. My fists are too fast to be seen by the naked eye!
But... Oh oh! I threw out my shoulder. That smarts.
You look fine to me.
O-of course I look fine! A martial arts master never reveals his weaknesses. I wouldn't want my opponent to see any openings, eh?
Aaaanyway... Since I need a minute to, um, set my shoulder, I can't collect the $itemPlural:30000294$ I came here for.
Why do you need them?
You ever hear of the Black Bamboo School? They—I mean, we're a school of the most powerful martial artists in the world. And our big tournament is coming out.
I need those $itemPlural:30000294$ to gain entry into the tournament and rise to the head of the school, but my shoulder...
You aren't busy, are you? Stroll on down to the lava flows and pick some $itemPlural:30000294$ for me.
You aren't busy, are you? Stroll on down to the lava flows and pick some $itemPlural:30000294$ for me.
Oh, they look just like they did in those old books! Yes! With these, the Black Bamboo School will have to let me join!
I thought you were already a member.
Ahem! Did I say become a member? I meant... become the leader! Wa-tcha!
A martial artist always repays his favors. Come find the Black Bamboo School someday and ask for $npcName:11000976[gender:0]$ if you ever need help.
This is a catastrophe! It is nearly time to begin our prayers, but I'm not nearly ready.
What's this about, then?
My people wake up every 777 days and devote ourselves to the rituals of our god... which, incidentally, also take 777 days.When we're done, we go back to sleep for another 777 days, and so on.
The humans of Perion know little of us, because we spend most of our lives either sleeping or tending to our duties. But we are as tied to this land as they are.

This place is holy to my people's god, and he is not a patient deity. The flowing lava is proof of his displeasure that the prayers have been delayed. Lava and heat are pretty motivating when you're made of straw...
I must complete the ritual and begin our 777 days of prayer before we all burn away. But this is not something I can do alone! For the sake of the kunkun, please help me gather the ritual components!
What do you need?
Hunt the monsters sent to test my people and retrieve their $itemPlural:30000295$, $itemPlural:30000296$, and $itemPlural:30000297$.

These monsters are the $npcNamePlural:21000374$, $npcNamePlural:21000377$, and $npcNamePlural:21000303$, and they wield terrible powers of flame. Sometimes I think our god doesn't like us very much...
Hunt the $npcNamePlural:21000374$, $npcNamePlural:21000377$, and $npcNamePlural:40000038$. Retrieve the $itemPlural:30000295$, $itemPlural:30000296$, and $itemPlural:30000297$.
Kunba, oh, kunba, oh, kunbaba kunbaba kunba, oh! That is everything I need. Now we must awaken the $npcNamePlural:11000978[gender:0]$ who will join me in our prayer.
The shamans are nearing the end of their 777-day slumber. Find their huts and shake the last of the sleep from their eyes.
If even a single shaman is missing, we will incur our god's wrath. And, you guessed it, that means more fire.
It may seem rude to awaken my fellow shamans from their huts, but it will be much more rude if our god awakens them with fire and brimstone.
Everything is ready and I must begin my 777 days of prayer. When I am done, I shall grant you a great blessing as thanks for the service you have done for the kunkun.
哎呀，哎呀~腰啊，肩啊，腿啊…… 没有地方<font color="#ffd200">不疼</font>啊。 喂，年轻人。你知道这里<font color="#ffd200">是哪里</font>吗？
我明明是在煮倾听愿望的<font color="#ffd200">愿望之汤</font>， 不小心打了个瞌睡就跑到<font color="#ffd200">这里</font>来了~
糟糕了，出大事了。我要给<font color="#ffd200">白雪公主</font>愿望之汤的……不知道现在<font color="#ffd200">几点了</font>，也不知道这里<font color="#ffd200">是哪里</font>……
询问愿望之汤是什么。
啊哈！愿望之汤？！就是倾听<font color="#ffd200">愿望</font>的汤啊。 在<font color="#ffd200">心里</font>想着你想要的东西，<font color="#ffd200">尝一口汤</font> 就能…… 啊！我知道了，现在我明白了。
我在尝愿望之汤的咸淡时，因为<font color="#ffd200">太饿了</font>， 就想到了<font color="#ffd200">甜甜的蛋糕</font>，愿望之汤就把我送到这儿来了。哦呵呵
不过，这个<font color="#ffd200">甜甜的味道</font>究竟是从哪儿冒出来的？ 喂，年轻人。我现在太饿了， 你能去看看这个甜味<font color="#ffd200">究竟是什么</font>，给我<font color="#ffd200">拿点来</font>吗？
我的年纪大了，如果不按时<font color="#ffd200">补充糖分</font>，就会手脚<font color="#ffd200">发抖</font>，神智<font color="#ffd200">不清</font>啊~
不过你可别当我是<font color="#ffd200">老奶奶</font>啊。 不是糖分的问题，我的口味本来就比较<font color="#ffd200">年轻</font>，所以看到甜甜的甜点就会走不动路。嗯呢。
这个散发甜味的食物究竟是什么，你能拿点给我吗？ <font color="#ffd200">$item:30000298$</font>或者<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000300$</font>……啊，对了！ 还有<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000299$</font>也行啊~
我从大老远就闻到了<font color="#ffd200">香味</font>，口水<font color="#ffd200">直流</font>啊~
谢谢你，年轻人。下次我会为你做好吃的 <font color="#ffd200">愿望之汤</font>，你一定要来找我啊！
真是的，最近在念咒语的时候，总是<font color="#ffd200">出错</font>，每次 <font color="#ffd200">时间旅行</font>都会来到新的地方啊。
我是生活在<font color="#ffd200">安德森童话村</font>的魔法师。 我正在寻找奇怪王宫的艾丽西亚，结果<font color="#ffd200">念错</font>了咒语……
如果要重新进行时间旅行，需要<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000301$</font>，但 附近的<font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000278$</font>把我的<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000301$</font> 偷走了。
请你帮我找到被<font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000278$</font>偷走的<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000301$</font>。
请你帮我找到被<font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000278$</font>偷走的<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000301$</font>。
啊，这是我的<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000301$</font>！没错！ 嗯，但是这可怎么办？又发生了一个<font color="#ffd200">问题</font>。
就算用$item:30000301$重新连接了道路，但是因为错误的时差， 没办法把狂暴的<font color="#ffd200">怪物</font>送回去了。
这都是我的<font color="#ffd200">失误</font>，我又不能把怪物就这么 <font color="#ffd200">留在这里</font>……哎~
既然如此，为了安德森童话村和这里的<font color="#ffd200">安全</font>，虽然我很痛心，但是只能把这里<font color="#ffd200">让人头疼的家伙</font>都<font color="#ffd200">消灭</font>掉了。
你能<font color="#ffd200">消灭</font>从安德森童话村过来的怪物吧？ 这样有点残忍，但是我只能<font color="#ffd200">这么做了</font>。
请消灭<font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000278$</font>、<font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000173$</font>、<font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000160$</font>。
啊，现在我已经做好<font color="#ffd200">离开的准备</font>了。 我回去估计会被大魔法师<font color="#ffd200">责备</font>的……
我回去以后，要先找找<font color="#ffd200">提高记忆力</font>的魔法了。 谢谢你帮助了我。$MyPCName$！
I... I can make it work! I don't care of the others think I'm mad. I won't give up on them...
Who are you talking about?
It's my finest creations, the $npcPlural:21000241[gender:0]$. I created them to defend $map:02000023$. At first, it was going so well!
What happened next?
I assembled them each by hand. Chassis, arms, legs, and an advanced chipset that gave them intelligence and... life...
I don't know where it all went so wrong. The robots started attacking people and tearing down trees. It breaks my heart, but there's no other choice. They must be...
No! No, I can't do it. Please, you have to act in my place. Destroy the $npcPlural:21000241[gender:0]$ before they cause any more damage...
No! No, I can't do it. Please, you have to act in my place. Destroy the $npcPlural:21000241[gender:0]$ before they cause any more damage...
It's already over? My poor $npcPlural:21000241[gender:0]$...
I can't give up yet. I'll rebuild them with a better AI, even if it takes me another forty years!
Data doesn't lie. If I analyze it long enough, then I can find the source of the error.
I'm afraid I need to rely on you one more time. While I get started up here, can you copy the data from my computer?
Take this chip and download all of my research records onto it.
Just insert the $item:30000302$ into the console below. The computer will take care of the rest automatically.
I lost the $item:30000302$.
I'll go get that data.
You need to pay more attention, kid. Luckily, I've got plenty of $itemPlural:30000302$ to spare. Here you go.
And what's that in your bag, hm? Looks like a $item:30000302$ to me.
Hey! These $itemPlural:30000302$ are fragile. Make some room in your bag or it'll get crushed under all that other junk!
Well, go on, then.
Good. I don't know how long it will take, but I will not rest until I've succeeded with this research!
I will prove that I'm not mad with my next batch of high-power combat droids. Then they'll have no choice but to call me a genius!
Help me. Oh, please help me. The took my birthstones!
What's the matter?
My parents are... they're no longer with us. After they went away, I wandered deep into the forest to be alone...
I made new friends there. They helped me work through the pain.
I was going to craft some necklaces using my father's birthstones to thank them. But... but those monsters stole all of the stones!
Leave this to me.
R-really? The $npcPlural:21000052$ and the $npcPlural:21000004$ are the ones who did this!
Those birthstones are all that I have left from my father. Please get them back from the $npcPlural:21000052$ and $npcPlural:21000004$!
Those are my father's birthstones! Thank you! I'd better get to work on those necklaces...
I owe you a big reward for this. I know! I'll introduce you to my friends!
But first, you have to promise not to tell anyone else about them. It'll be our little secret, okay?
Come close and I'll whisper it in your ear. My friends are... the boroboro dwarves! Isn't that amazing?
They vanished years and years ago. Most people don't even know they exist anymore! Why, I wouldn't be surprised if you had no idea what I'm talking about.
Well, what do you say? Want to meet them? This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity!
Uh, sure. Where are they?
Make sure you aren't being followed, then climb to the top of the Ellin Tree. You'll see the entrance to $map:02000197$ way up there.
Tell them hello for me, okay? Oh, and don't mention the necklaces I'm making for them. They're a surprise!
Do you still want to meet my friends? Just climb to the top of the Ellin Tree and find the entrance to $map:02000197$.
Speak up! What're you doing here, giant?!
I'm a friend of $npc:11000986[gender:1]$'s.
That crybaby sent you? Hmph. Come to think of it, I haven't seen her in a while...
The other boroboros will be happy to see her again soon. But we don't got time for pleasantries right now!
Look, I'm not in the habit of sharing our worries with outsiders, but our beloved $npc:11000751[gender:1]$ was in a spot of trouble not too long ago.

Luckily for us, someone came along and saved her. Unluckily for us, the person who saved her was an outsider. Like you, but even uglier. And now it'll be impossible to keep our existence a secret any more!
That's why we're looking for a new home out in the world. If we don't have to squat in caves, then we may as well make the most of it.
At least, that was the plan. These lazy bums decided to nap the day away, instead.
Since you're here anyway, make yourself useful and rouse the others. They'll be happy to hear that $npc:11000986[gender:1]$ is visiting soon, anyhow.
You go ahead and wake up the other boroboros. Let them know that $npc:11000986[gender:1]$ will be here soon.
The boroboro are at a turning point, and they're all sleeping like babies. Sigh...
Can't say I'd mind a little nap myself... Lucky pups.
Out of the frying pan, into the fire. Defeat one and there's two to take its place. Cut down two, and three more appear...
The $map:02000091$ plays a key role in keeping $map:02000076$ safe. Which is too bad, because I don't know how much longer I can hold it.
The rest of my unit abandoned their posts when the monsters came. Now I patrol the ramparts alone, and let me tell you... it's not easy.
You're loyal to the empire, aren't you? I could use another strong arm to hold off the monster horde.
Just tell me what to do.
We've got too many monsters swarming the base of the watchtower. I'd like you to keep them busy while I shore up our defenses.
If you can thin out the $npcNamePlural:21000265$ and $npcNamePlural:21000306$, we may hold the tower yet.
Well fought! Are you hurt?
Not a scratch on me.
I'm glad to hear it. We've held on for now, but this struggle is far from over.
I'll do my best to hold this position for a while longer. In the meantime, I want you to send a request for reinforcements.
Sure! Where should I go?
You don't have to go far. There are carrier pigeons all over the watchtower. They can deliver the message.
All you need to do is send the birds on their way, and my fellow soldiers will get the message.
Don't let your guard down. The monsters sieging this place will not hesitate to fire at you with their cannons.

All over the watchtower are <font color="#ffd200">carrier pigeons</font> that carry messages for scouts to send and receive <font color="#ffd200">information</font>. Send the carrier pigeon to <font color="#ffd200">request reinforcements</font>.
All I can do now is clench my teeth and hold out for reinforcements.
I've never felt so exhausted in my life. But as long as the watchtower is in danger, I will stand my ground.
<font color="#ffd200">糟糕</font>了。糟糕了！ 快点，快点，快点！
问是什么事。
<font color="#ffd200">卫生纸</font>……没有卫生纸，没有卫生纸啊！ 呃啊……<font color="#ffd200">卫生间</font>里没有卫生纸，这<font color="#ffd200">像话吗</font>？嗯？
快点帮我<font color="#ffd200">找点卫生纸来</font>！ 快点，快点，快点！
在哪儿找。
我怎么知道，我现在在卫生间里面呢！ 你去附近侦查队员的<font color="#ffd200">医疗用品箱</font>里面看看吧。 总会有点什么吧！
快点帮我<font color="#ffd200">找点卫生纸来</font>！ 快点，快点，快点！ 你去附近侦查队员的<font color="#ffd200">医疗用品箱</font>里面看看吧。 总会有点什么吧！
你来了？<font color="#ffd200">卫生纸</font>呢？ 卫生纸<font color="#ffd200">拿来了</font>吗？
说拿来了。
咻，太好了。呜呜 你快点把卫生纸从卫生间的<font color="#ffd200">门缝</font>里给我吧。
在这么硬的马桶上坐久了， 我感觉都要得<font color="#ffd200">痔疮</font>了。
呃啊啊啊~啊！我要疯了，真的…… 我……我的手<font color="#ffd200">够不到</font>……拿不到卫生纸。
没……没办法了…… 虽然很抱歉，但是请你<font color="#ffd200">进来</font>把卫生纸拿给我吧。
呃啊，现在这个瞬间！所有的一切如果<font color="#ffd200">都是梦</font>就好了… 是啊，这都是<font color="#ffd200">噩梦</font>……我现在在做梦呢。
今天这件事！是我们两个的<font color="#ffd200">秘密</font>。 你一定要把这个秘密<font color="#ffd200">带进坟墓里！！</font>
嗯，其实嘛，谁都会<font color="#ffd200">有这种经历</font>的，对吧？ 人<font color="#ffd200">活着</font>，总会遇到这样那样的事情……
我们今天！在这里成为了<font color="#ffd200">共患难</font>的<font color="#ffd200">朋友</font>。其实，我有个不能说的<font color="#ffd200">秘密</font>……
询问秘密是什么。
便…秘……而且是<font color="#ffd200">严重便秘</font>……根本<font color="#ffd200">出不来</font>……呜呜 像我这么可爱的女生，如果别人知道我有便秘， 那我的形象<font color="#ffd200">就全毁了吧</font>……？
我在书上看到过，把<font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000353$</font>炖熟， 喝下那个汤汁，马上就能把便秘<font color="#ffd200">治好</font>。
所以，我正打算去抓<font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000353$</font>， 结果路上就<font color="#ffd200">这样</font>了……
你在卫生间外面见到<font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000353$</font>了吗？
说看到了。
我刚才为了把我体内的<font color="#ffd200">毒素</font>排出去，用完了所有<font color="#ffd200">能量</font>，请你帮我去抓点<font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000353$</font>来吧。
我们这也算是<font color="#ffd200">缘分</font>啊，你难道不能帮助朋友一下吗？！这可是<font color="#ffd200">难得的运气</font> 啊！
呃，这个真的<font color="#ffd200">能吃</font> 吗…… 总之，既然这个能<font color="#ffd200">治好便秘</font>， 那我就要坚持吃才行。
啊，我感觉肚子里<font color="#ffd200">变轻松了</font>啊？！ 谢谢你，朋友！
He'll understand, won't he? Of course he will. This is no problem. No problem at all...
Who am I kidding? If $npc:11000031[gender:0]$ finds out about this, he'll turn me into a shrub!!
Take a deep breath and start from the top.
It was all that little fur ball's fault! He kept nagging me to make him beautiful. Look at my face. Do you think I have that kind of power?
So... what did you tell him?

I... I told him that I could make him beautiful if he brought me the whispers that live in a spider's heart, three golden apples, and the seed of the great tree. I never thought he would believe it...
And I certainly never thought Lo would go to $npc:11000304[gender:1]$ and get the $item:30000329$!
I don't like the sound of that.
It's a mask with the power to brainwash monsters. Once it's on, you have no choice but to obey the person who put it on you.
The forest giant Moomoo is a gentle soul. Gentle, but powerful. Lo put the $item:30000329$ on him and now they're trying to steal the seed!

$npc:23000035$ must be stopped before they do any more damage! And, more importantly, before $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$ finds out I had anything to do with this! That man can make a witch's blood turn cold...
I beg you. Defeat $npc:23000035$ and bring the $item:30000329$ to me.
This can't be allowed to go on! Defeat $npc:23000035$ and bring the $item:30000329$ to me.
I'm saved! Oh, that old $npc:11000304[gender:1]$ will be hearing from me! And I'll make sure no one ever gets their hands on this $item:30000329$ again.
It looks like I'm in your debt. Huh. A strange feeling...
Ellinia just doesn't smell as nature-y as it used to, you know?
I was walking through the forest the other day to listen to the ladybugs sing—you know how ladybugs are, always singing such beautiful songs—but something had turned them all purple!
Ladybugs are supposed to be red. A purple ladybug... Well, that's just not a very good ladybug at all!
It's all because of those goggy guys! I spotted them putting some purple goop in the water at the $map:02000022$ before, but I didn't think anything of it at the time...
And it's reached as far as the $map:02000215$. Just one drop of that purple water is enough to make the grass all withered and gross!
If this keeps up, the whole $map:02000215$ will be totally purple. Please get those goggy guys!
Oh, by goggy guys, I mean the $npcPlural:21090176$, $npcPlural:21090177$, and $npcPlural:21090175$.
Please kick the $npcPlural:21090176$, $npcPlural:21090177$, and $npc:21090175$ out of the forest before they totally ruin the $map:02000215$.
With the goggy guys gone, hopefully the $map:02000215$ can return to normal soon...
I can't wait to hear the ladybugs sing again. Thank you!
I say, what year is it? How long have I been traveling?
Uh... Who are you?
Don't you recognize your own king? It is I, $npc:11001016[gender:0]$! Tell me, peasant, which county are you from?
...Maple World county?
World, you say? Then that mage sent me a very far ways, indeed! Little matter. I've taken a liking to this $map:02000181$ and I've decided to take it as my own.
Your world is a tad more blocky than I'm used to, but I'm sure I'll be feeling right at home in no time. Nothing like some free real estate to put a smile on one's face, after all!
First order of business: I need to hire on some pest control! The wild beasties wandering around the palace grounds are simply unacceptable. Why, one of them could splash mud onto my fine clothes!
Attend me, my commoner friend. As the new king of this castle, I command you to remove these creatures from my sight!
Which creatures, exactly?
The $npcPlural:21000220$, $npcPlural:21000222$, and $npcPlural:21000266$, of course! I detest such atrocious critters. I shan't tolerate them in my new kingdom!
As a reward for your service, I shall bestow upon you invisible silken garments, just like the robe I am wearing at this very moment. A tempting offer, no?
I'll have no $npcPlural:21000220$, $npcPlural:21000222$, or $npcPlural:21000266$ in my palace!
Good, very good. Now that that's done, I shall erect a statue of myself up front... and a statue on the side parapet... and in the rear courtyard, another statue, perhaps?
As for your reward, here you go. It may be invisible to the naked eye, but I assure you, this robe is woven from the finest silk!
没有人生来就是坏人…… 这都是我这个没用的师父的错啊。
询问他发生了什么事。
那边，那些赤龙坏鸟帮的家伙。 其实，正是我交给了那些家伙武功。
就在几年前，我在修行的路上遇到了一群变异鹈鹕。 脖子又细又长，看上去蔫蔫的喉囊， 他们因为长相奇怪，被欺负得很惨。
判断别人不能以外表为标准， 仅仅因为长相奇怪就被折磨， 他们是多么痛苦啊……哈……
因为那些家伙被孤立，我想至少能让他们不被欺负， 拥有可以保护自己的力量，就教了他们武功。
但是，我却不知道，事情会变成这样…… 真是件错综复杂的事情。
问发生了什么事。
我为他们量身打造的武术，他们在熟悉了这个套路之后， 开始慢慢变强，也开始折磨弱者。
不仅如此，在同族中也通过竞争 产生了阶级。
我来到这里打算劝阻他们……但是，我错了。 看到他们的眼神，我就明白了。他们已经成为了邪恶的奴隶。
但是，即使这样，我曾经把他们当做自己的孩子一样看待，生活在一个屋檐下， 我怎么能亲手去处置它们呢……
请你帮我去消灭那些被邪恶所污染的家伙吧。 啊，现在赤龙坏鸟帮分为了师父、修炼生和入门生啊。嗬……
请你帮我去消灭那些被邪恶所污染的家伙吧。 现在应该叫做$npc:21000312$、$npc:21000311$、$npc:21000310$。
通过这次的事情，我又获得了一个教训， 今天可真是让人伤心的一天啊。
看你的眼神，应该是不需要我的建议了， 不过，你还是要保持谦虚，不要骄傲自大。
嘿~看看这个~ 这还真是~~~什么都有啊？！
但是，不管怎么找都找不到克洛伊啊…… 这个老鼠一样的小鬼，到底跑哪儿去了！
询问克洛伊是谁。
哦？我还以为你也是来抓小恶魔的呢…… 看来不是啊。克洛伊是在魔王陷入沉睡时， 在魔王的怀中一起沉睡的小恶魔。
魔王的手下图尔卡唤醒魔王时， 小恶魔克洛伊也一起醒了， 但是却吵着说要自由，就消失了。
这里的这些家伙就是克洛伊恶魔灵魂 附着后制造的玩具怪物。
长得是挺可爱，但做出的都是邪恶又可怕的坏事… 它们吸收孩子的童心，正变得越来越强。
其实，我也曾是这些玩具中的一员。 我运气好，遇到了$npc:11000146[gender:0]$，在他的帮助下， 才能把体内的恶魔灵魂驱逐了出去。
现在，正如你所见，我的朋友都变成了怪物， 而我成了要狩猎元凶克洛伊的猎人。
嗯……我说的太多了吗……已经这个时间了！ 来~我告诉了你这么高级的情报，这次轮到你来帮我了。
询问要做什么。
我要重新回去抓克洛伊了。 如果要追踪下落不明的克洛伊，我需要有着 克洛伊灵魂的这些家伙。
我需要的有什么呢……啊，对了！ 只要有$item:30000359$、$item:30000360$、$item:30000361$就行了。 克洛伊……你给我等着！
对了，要找到它们，方法很简单。 只要狩猎这附近的$npc:21000279$、$npc:21000168$、$npc:21000195$就行了！
哦~不错嘛？你想不想和我一起去时间旅行，抓捕那些坏蛋？！
郑重拒绝。
切，我又没求你！总之，还是谢谢你。 如果在这个时间里，我们应该还会再见面的。
啊，我知道研究员都很累了…… 但是没想到会发生这种事情。
问是什么事。
我因为去见研究所长出去了一下， 研究员中有人带着在这里进行研究的资料逃跑了。
更可怕的是，他们为了抢走数据，将用作武器 的休眠气体用在同组的 研究员身上，让他们陷入了沉睡。
我们一起共事了这么长时间…… 居然为了点钱，就背叛同事和自己的良心……
我们得先把沉睡中的研究员叫醒， 把他们带到安全的地方。
请你把各个地方倒下的研究员 唤醒，带到安全的地方。
请你把各个地方倒下的研究员 唤醒，带到安全的地方。
幸好休眠气体不会对人的健康产生什么危害。
我得听听醒来的研究员讲述一下这件事的来龙去脉。
呜呜，糟糕了，糟糕了。 我的朋友全都变成怪物了。呜呜
问是怎么回事。
我和朋友们在月之国度顺着月晕指引 的方向旅行，但是迷了路…… 我们很害怕，就边唱歌边走，来到了这里。
但是，我的朋友肚子饿了，就在$map:02000280$采了 胡萝卜吃……结果全变成了怪物兔子。
看来，应该是有人为了不让别人拔胡萝卜，在上面下了诅咒。
呜呜，请你帮我回到美丽的月之国度吧。 因为可怕的怪物兔子，我一步都不敢动啊。 请把那些被诅咒的怪物兔子都消灭吧。
因为可怕的怪物兔子，我一步都不敢动啊。 请把那些被诅咒的$npc:21090189$、$npc:21090187$、$npc:21090188$ 都消灭吧。
呃……我真害怕连我都变成怪物兔子啊…… 真不知道，没有朋友，我怎么回到月之国度去啊…
如果我能安全回到月之国度，我会用月之碎片来招待 $MyPCName$的~
预计之后增加剧本。
预计之后增加剧本。
预计之后增加剧本。
在这个冰天雪地里，联络不上本部…… 真是完全被孤立了。
本来我们海洋勘探本部成立后，去 外部勘探的队员就大多失踪或被怪物攻击，正在讨论要不要废除本部呢……啧。
虽然我很讨厌向别人求助…… 你能帮帮我吗？
询问要做什么。
只要消灭了山脊上的怪物，我应该就能想办法离开这里了。
别看我这样，我可是攀岩达人，只要能把怪物阻挡的这个 道路清出来，我就能爬上$map:02000260$。
说会帮助他。
呵呵，你这个年轻人看上去不错啊！ 我好像看到了年轻时候的我啊~哈哈~
怪物不仅数量多，而且十分凶猛，请你小心。
多亏了你，我才能安全回到本部。 如果你能来我们海洋本部，我一定会亲自接待你的。
The only thing worse than a terrifying scream... is a terrifying scream that you can't put to a face...
You must help me, $MyPCName$. I've been kept up for days by constant screaming... crying... wailing...
Around the time this started, primordial monsters from the last ice age started showing up nearby.
The last time I experienced such horror... the Blue Lapenta was destroyed...
I won't stand idly by while evil is afoot. It's time I performed a divination to get at the heart of this.
Will you help me? I need objects related to these disturbances in order to do my reading.
Leave this to me.
To learn where the monsters are coming from, I need $itemPlural:30000345$ and $itemPlural:30000346$.
For the ritual itself, I will need a mirror. I doubt we'll find any of those out here... But a reflective $item:30000344$ will do in a pinch.
You can hunt $npcNamePlural:21000199$ and $npcNamePlural:21000089$ for the $itemPlural:30000345$ and $itemPlural:30000346$.
As for $itemPlural:30000344$, just break some off the nearby ice blocks.
You can hunt $npcNamePlural:21000199$ and $npcNamePlural:21000089$ for the $itemPlural:30000345$ and $itemPlural:30000346$.
As for $itemPlural:30000344$, just break some off the nearby ice blocks.
Everything is ready. Please be quiet while I tune into the vibes of divination...
No... Oh, no...
What's the matter?
It's terrible... Simply terrible! The reason the monsters have come here... is to awaken $npcName:23000026[gender:1]$...
I'm guessing $npcName:23000026[gender:1]$ is bad.

哎呀~我的意思就是把电线杆上闪着火花 的电线全部切断。你听懂了吗？

这个呢，是……呃……用可以隔绝超强电力的金属 做的钳子。你用这个吧。
我的意思就是把电线杆上闪着火花 的电线全部切断。你听懂了吗？

说现在就出发。
什么？你太不像话了~ 那个得多少钱啊，居然弄丢了…… 呼……我只能再给你一次了，这次不能弄丢了啊。
哎呀，大哥~你是不是糊涂了~ 现在你拿着的不就是钳子吗~快去吧。
呃，为什么背包里这么多没用的东西啊。 工作的时候得轻松上阵才行~快点把背包 清理一下再出发吧。

太好了~如果以后还要修理电线， 我就去找你~肯定马上就能处理好的。
这可怎么办啊。我真后悔，没有早点进入研究所。
不久前，我去了$map:02000276$， 偶然发现了一个研究日志……真是太可怕了。
询问日志是什么内容。
在$map:02000270$分离之前，这里有一个叫 科奈尔的博士在$map:02000276$发现了，能量间相互拉扯的磁力。
如果这个能量遇到闪电或者电流， 就会产生巨大的力量。
这个发现可能对科奈尔博士并不是件好事。 科奈尔博士决定要亲自确认一下， 吸收了这个能量的生命体能够发挥出怎样的力量。
他用活着的野生熊做实验，在经过几次失败后， 最终，吸收了巨大电力能量的闪电熊诞生了。 名字就是$npc:22000023$。
但是，$npc:22000023$无法控制巨大的能量， 将创造自己的科奈尔博士和所有的研究人员都击败了。
同样身为研究家，我不是不能能理解科奈尔博士的心理， 但是，人类的欲望是无止境的，如果想要追求欲望的尽头， 就会招来这样的结果吧……

这个恩情我要怎么报答你呢…… 多亏了你，现在$map:02000276$变得安定了一些。
什么改恶从善项目…… 有钱又闲的人总是来搞这么无聊的东西。

哎呀，我真是气得……我真是活不下去了。 我现在嗓子太疼了，没法说话， 你去帮我叫那些罪犯别闲着了，干点活。

让做的事情不做，每天游手好闲的罪犯，你快点去好好教训他们一下！

独角兽都像我一样，有着自己的光芒。 而且，那个光芒可以成为保护自己的保护膜。

我还记得那天，恶魔缪杰林的歌声在 独角兽森林回响，大部分独角兽都被邪灵 所附身，失去了光芒，四散而逃。

当然了，我们第一次见面，你不可能知道的。 总之，我的愿望。就是能在一个安静偏僻的地方，没有任何人打扰，悠闲地冰钓。
哇~你看看现在的我。在这个陌生的地方， 还下着雪，我站的这个地方 具备了冰钓的所有条件。

请你到附近帮我找到可以生火的$item:30000354$和 用作鱼饵的$npc:21091094$。

哎哟，真的太伤心了。 本来最近就没有客人，正在想要不要把店卖掉呢……
问是什么事。
都是因为<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001116[gender:1]$</font>……啊，那是我的女儿。 她好几天不吃饭，每天就待在<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000328$</font>……
本来$map:02000167$的庭院被<font color="#ffd200">污染</font>后， 因为担心发生什么事情，入口都已经关闭了，我很担心……
我好说歹说，她就是不听。 $MyPCName$，你能去见见我的女儿<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001116[gender:1]$</font>吗？
你去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000328$</font>的入口，就能见到$npc:11001116[gender:1]$。 请你帮我劝劝她，让她<font color="#ffd200">回家吧</font>。
你去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000328$</font>的入口，就能见到我的女儿$npc:11001116[gender:1]$。 请你帮我劝劝她，让她<font color="#ffd200">回家吧</font>。
我知道你是来劝说我的。 你肯定又是妈妈派来的对吧……？
我都知道。现在庭院很<font color="#ffd200">危险</font>， 我总是来这里，妈妈<font color="#ffd200">很担心</font>我……
但是，我不能就这么回去。曾经美丽的<font color="#ffd200">庭院</font>被 <font color="#ffd200">污染</font>了，这都是<font color="#ffd200">因为我</font>…………呜呜。
询问这是怎么回事。
其实，在庭院里种下<font color="#ffd200">种子</font>的就是我…… 之前有个卖种子的老奶奶，说这是红色郁金香的种子…… 我只是想把这里变成郁金香庭院……
但是……但是……呜呜呜哇~ 呜呜。 我不知道怎么办……呜呜……
让她不要哭，慢慢说。
那个……从我种下的种子里长出的不是花而是有着 <font color="#ffd200">剧毒</font>的<font color="#ffd200">怪物</font>……
这都是因为我。我那时如果没有收下并急忙种下<font color="#ffd200">种子</font>…… 呜呜……
$MyPCName$，请帮帮我。帮助<font color="#ffd200">美丽的庭院</font><font color="#ffd200">恢复原状</font>，请帮帮我。嗯？好吗？
只要消灭在<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000328$</font>种下的种子中诞生的<font color="#ffd200">怪物</font>， $map:02000328$肯定就能 <font color="#ffd200">恢复原状</font>的。
请你消灭<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000328$</font>种下的种子中诞生的 <font color="#ffd200">$npc:24001101$</font>、<font color="#ffd200">$npc:24001102$</font> 。
呀~嚯！真的，真的吗？ 太好了！$MyPCName$救了<font color="#ffd200">绿洲庭院</font>！
真的，真的，真的谢谢你！ 现在我不会让妈妈担心了！谢谢你。
啊，上次多亏了$MyPCName$， 我还以为被污染的庭院全都被<font color="#ffd200">净化</font>了……原来并非如此。
询问庭院中又发生了什么。
那个……呜呜……随着时间流逝，花花草草都失去了生机，又变得<font color="#ffd200">枯萎</font>了。
我写信问了<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000023$</font>那~边的博士，他说在空气中有<font color="#ffd200">孢子粉末</font>在传播， 可能又有花开了。
本来<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000167$</font>的人们来看到庭院恢复原状的时候，是那么开心……呜呜
$MyPCName$，再拜托你一次，你能去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000328$</font>确认一下吗？
在庭院重新<font color="#ffd200">衰败</font>之前，最后来的那个大叔说，在他逃出来之前，看到了<font color="#ffd200">巨大的花</font>……
嗯……名字是什么来着…… 啊！<font color="#ffd200">$npc:24001103$</font>……没错，就是这个名字。 请你一定要消灭$npc:24001103$。好吗？
请你去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000328$</font>消灭 <font color="#ffd200">$npc:24001103$</font> 吧。拜托了！
现在真的不会再出现庭院被<font color="#ffd200">污染</font>的事情了吧……？
我从今天开始要努力<font color="#ffd200">学习</font>关于<font color="#ffd200">植物</font>的知识。 我一定要守护<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000167$</font>的庭院！
Wow! There's so much work to do here that we're always busy, but that means we never have any time for safety. It's getting downright hazardous here!
What's wrong?
I'm just so worried. We're really lucky we haven't had an accident already. But the conditions around here have gotten so bad. It's only a matter of time before something terrible happens.
I mean, just look at these rusty gas tanks leaking everywhere! It's like working in the middle of a minefield. One spark, and the whole place will go up!
It used to be that when the tanks started looking bad, they'd get replaced. Safety inspectors get mean when you're not following the rules. But not anymore.
And the $npcPlural:21000281$ around here aren't helping matters. Every time they throw a bomb, my heart skips a beat. What if they hit a gas tank?!
I can't stand it any more. If no one else is going to do anything, I'll fix the problem myself. $MyPCName$, will you help me?
How can I help?
Please make sure all the valves on the nearby gas tanks are closed, and check to see if any of them are leaking.
Just be careful! A lot of the tanks here are so rusty and old that just looking at them could make them explode. They're already venting a ton of soot and smoke.
Please make sure all the valves on the nearby gas tanks are closed, and check to see if any of them are leaking.
I'm relieved to hear there aren't any big problems, but this is just a temporary solution. I hope they replace the tanks soon.
I'm going to ask HQ to store the gas tanks somewhere safer until they can be removed.
你看到了吗？看到了吗？
询问看到什么。
呼~哈~等一下，让我深呼吸一下…… 刚才，在这个危险的工地上，似乎砰~地一下出现了闪着蓝光的 <font color="#ffd200">帽子</font>！
附近什么都没有，突然<font color="#ffd200">砰~</font>地出现了。 怎么说呢……就像是通往新世界的<font color="#ffd200">次元之门</font>…… 那样？
啊……怎么办……怎么办？是去呢，还是不去呢~ 我还有事情要做，还有很多作业……如果晚上回家晚了， 又要被妈妈唠叨好久了……咻~
$MyPCName$能不能去那个闪着蓝光的<font color="#ffd200">神秘帽子</font>里面看看呢？！
啊，如果你很忙，也不用在$map:02000136$等那个帽子出现。它偶尔也会出现在<font color="#ffd200">其他地方</font>的。
根据$npc:11000471[gender:0]$的感觉……嗯…… 那里肯定充满了<font color="#ffd200">冒险</font>和<font color="#ffd200">神秘</font>！
你能不能去那个闪着蓝光的<font color="#ffd200">神秘帽子</font>里面看看呢？！ 那里肯定充满了冒险和神秘！
怎么样？你回来了？ 你去了<font color="#ffd200">帽子里的世界</font>吗？嗯？
说去了帽子里的世界。
哦！真的吗？怎么样，那里有什么？ 啊啊啊啊，不对！等一下！ 不要告诉我。
我想要亲自去确认。 太厉害了！$MyPCName$，真是太厉害了！哈哈，哈哈哈哈。
Infuriating! Those shelled thugs won't get away with this!
What's the matter?
It's those slow... foolish... block-headed turtles! They stepped on the tail of the salamander I was riding and sent him running for the hills!
Sigh... I was going to get back before $npcName:11001314[gender:0]$ noticed I was gone, but that plan's done for.
Since those turtles messed up my day, I want to mess up their day. They'll feel sorry they ever even heard of the great $npcName:11001328[gender:0]$!
Hey, you going to help me, or you going to stand their gawking? Why'd you ask me what's wrong if you aren't going to help?
We'll wipe those filthy turtles from the face of $map:02010043$! First the $npcNamePlural:21000143$, and then the $npcNamePlural:21000145$, and especially the $npcNamePlural:21000144$!
We'll wipe those filthy turtles from the face of $map:02010043$! First the $npcNamePlural:21000143$, and then the $npcNamePlural:21000145$, and especially the $npcNamePlural:21000144$!
Gosh, I feel better!
Is this your first time to Karkar Island? Come see me sometime. I owe you one, after all!
Absurd. Absolutely absurd! There is only a one-in-sixty-five million chance of something like this ever occurring!
What's the matter?

Last night, as I was stepping out for my nightly counting of the stars, a brazen band of $npcNamePlural:21000423$ and $npcNamePlural:21000417$ broke into the house and stole all of Master Oliver's portraits!
Who's Oliver?
Surely you jest! Why, the odds that you've never heard of the great $npcName:11001350[gender:0]$ are less than 0.000002%!

The master is the famous oil baron of Karkar Island. There is no greater businessman in all of Maple World, or so I am contractually obligated to say. He is known throughout the lands for his opulent tastes and... gulp... utter ruthlessness...
Maybe I'll just pack up my things and leave before word gets out that his portraits were stolen. Yes, that would yield the highest chance of my survival...
Leave this to me.
Unbelievable! For precisely 0.01 seconds, I thought I was hearing things. For a complete stranger to offer $male:his,female:her$ aid...
Very well. I shall place my fate in your hands.
I estimate a 95% chance that the $npcNamePlural:21000423$ and $npcNamePlural:21000417$ that stole the $itemPlural:30000451$ are still nearby.
Please defeat the $npcNamePlural:21000423$ and $npcNamePlural:21000417$ and ensure the safe return of $itemPlural:30000451$.
You are back far too early. It is as I feared... The chance that an utter stranger could help me was one-to-thirty-five million...
(Hand over the $itemPlural:30000451$.)
I never thought this would happen! Out of the 3,527 people that passed me today, I never thought one of them would save my hide.
Thank you. I don't think I can ever repay you, but come to me if you ever have questions about Karkar Island. You will find that I am a font of information.
Ugh, my guts... What could be taking her so long?
Maybe you should slow down with the burgers.
Youngster! Everything aches when you get to be my age. But it isn't my tummy that's bothering me today. No, it's my... feelings.
I decided to join my wife at the mall today, but it's been hours and she still hasn't come back from her shopping.
Women, am I right? $female:No offense. $I don't know where she gets all that energy for shopping...
I've got a bad case of the ol' burger bloats to go find her. Would you be a friend and let her know that her doting husband is waiting for her?
Sure. What's her name?
$npcName:11001331[gender:1]$, of course. I'm sure you'll have no trouble finding her. Let's just say she stands out in a crowd.
You let my wife to get back straight away. I don't know how many more of these burgers I can take.
B-but they cost so much...
My husband sent you? Oh no! I completely lost track of the time...
But what am I going to do? I can't go back like this!
What's going on?
I was about to join my husband for a lovely lunch of cheeseburgers, but I was accosted by monsters. They took everything!
I am not moving one inch until I get my things back. Do you have any idea how much that cute new top cost?
Leave this to me.
Oh? You don't look like a mall employee... But I guess I have no choice.
Please get my things back from the awful, horrible, no-good $npcNamePlural:21000726$, $npcNamePlural:21000720$, and $npcNamePlural:21000714$ that are loitering about $map:02010010$.
Please get my things back from the awful, horrible, no-good $npcNamePlural:21000726$, $npcNamePlural:21000720$, and $npcNamePlural:21000714$ that are loitering about $map:02010010$.
Adore by Perika... Perion Pursery... Racheal's Rags... It's all here. No wonder the monsters picked on me. I have all the best brands!
Now, my husband... I won't ever hear the end of this, will I?
I can find him from my own. Poor dear is probably eating himself silly at our favorite burger place. Thank you!
Y-you look like you're tougher than our usual customers. Perhaps you can help!
You s-see those... those walking tin cans? Steel cans? I'm honestly not sure what their cans are made of. The important thing is, they're scaring off all our business!
I r-run the $map:02010010$ Merchant Society. But if the merchants all go out of business, there will be no society, right? S-so please, I beg you, help us with this inconvenient monster problem!
I will pay you h-handsomely for driving off the $npcNamePlural:21000726$, $npcNamePlural:21000720$, and $npcNamePlural:21000714$.
I will pay you h-handsomely for driving the $npcNamePlural:21000726$, $npcNamePlural:21000720$, and $npcNamePlural:21000714$ away from $map:02010010$.
At $map:02010010$, we pride ourselves in providing the highest quality retail, entertainment, and dining experience for our customers.
Thanks to you, we can now boast that we offer the highest quality monster extermination service, as well.
Phew. I feel like I can finally get my nerves under control...
You're here to see my $npcName:11001334[gender:0]$, aren't you? He's world famous for his charms, you know.
But now he's got a bad case of the crankies. A cranky $npcName:11001334[gender:0]$ is not a charming $npcName:11001334[gender:0]$.
There's only one thing that can calm $npcName:11001334[gender:0]$ down when he's like this: $item:30000453$. But there are too many monsters for me to make it to the vending machine!
$MyPCName$, can you get some $item:30000453$ for me? $npcName:11001334[gender:0]$ is no good without it!
You can get $item:30000453$ from the vending machines all over $map:02010010$.
$npcName:11001334[gender:0]$, boopsie-kins! Your $item:30000453$ is here.
Thank you, $MyPCName$. You're welcome to come by whenever you want to bask in $npcName:11001334[gender:0]$'s cuteness.
Hold on! Don't just walk away. We got to talk, you and me.
What's the matter?
We're two of a kind. I can tell. Real skaters, deep down in our hearts. You heading up to see $npcName:11001336[gender:0]$?
No.
Oh, I gotcha. You were too lazy to return your board, and now you're scared of what he'll say if you bring it back now. We've all been there, $male:bro,female:girl$.
I'm pretty sure I've never been "there."
Don't feel bad, $male:bro,female:girl$. It's never too late to start! Heck, I bet if you headed over to the skate shop right now, they'd be happy to hook you up with a sweet board.
And while you're at it, mind taking the board I rented back to $npcName:11001336[gender:0]$? You'd be doing me a real solid.
No time like the present, $male:bro,female:girl$. I bet $npcName:11001336[gender:0]$'s real eager to get that board back.
$npcName:11001335[gender:0]$, that slacker. Couldn't face me after waiting weeks to return this, eh? Well, thanks.
Man.. I don't want to be that guy. I remember how it is. I used to be a skater when I was younger, y'know?
But I'm trying to run a business here. These kids don't appreciate that.
They rent a skateboard and I never hear from them again. Most of them just ditch their boards in the park. It's not like the boards'll magically pick up themselves...
Maybe they'll come to their senses if I start charging late fees... See this? Half my boards are missing!
If you're headed out to the skate park anyway, mind grabbing the abandoned boards for me? I'll throw in a free rental to make it worth your time.
I'm in a bit of a hurry. It's skating season and I need those skateboards back to rent to new customers.
Look at all the boards you found! That does it. Let's see how those punks like paying late fees out the nose!
It was bad enough that nobody returns my board. But the bugs here are out of control!
You saw it, didn't you? Swarms of filthy insects all over the place! I stepped out of the shop for just a minute and they looted all my skateboard parts.
What do they even want with skateboard parks? Are they just in it to annoy me? Ugh, my head is throbbing...
You've got to help me. Track down those bugs and get my $itemPlural:30000458$ back.
I've got to watch the store. But if you do this for me, I'll pay you generously.
Hurry over to $map:02010014$ and defeat the $npcNamePlural:21000438$ and $npcNamePlural:21000434$. They're the ones who took my $itemPlural:30000458$
They better not have damaged these parts... Anyway, you did your part. Here's your pay.
First, the customers stopped coming. Then I complained that things couldn't get any worse. Then the bugs showed up...
Let's make a deal. You exterminate those bugs for me, and I'll cook you up a fresh dish. On the house.
I've got to keep sanitary, you know? I can't be seen touching those dirty bugs!
Take out any $npcNamePlural:21000434$ and $npcNamePlural:21000438$ you see. I beg you!
Take out any $npcNamePlural:21000434$ and $npcNamePlural:21000438$ you see. I beg you!
You got rid of 'em already? Amazing!
I came here because we got a report of an infestation. I had no idea things'd be this bad.
If the bug swarms keep growing, then soon all of Ludari will be infested!
Something must be done. Find $npcName:11001342[gender:0]$ out in $map:02010019$ and tell him I need help.
I'll be here. Fighting bugs. <font size='20'>Please hurry.</font>
We don't have much time! Please get my message to $npcName:11001342[gender:0]$ in $map:02010019$. If you don't hurry, $map:02010019$ may be lost!
$map:02010014$ is that bad? I can't exactly leave here. Not while there are so many bugs left...
What's the cause of all this? We'll never win if we can't cut them off at the source.
I can't understand it. Nobody's ever escaped Alikar before. So how did these louts manage it?
There was a prison break?
Yes, but they won't enjoy their freedom for long. I've tracked them to $map:52010008$.
They may have escaped before, but $npcName:11001344[gender:0]$ is on the job now. They're trapped like rats.
Lend me a hand. Go into the $map:52010008$ and drag them out of hiding.
I'll watch the exits to make sure they don't make a run for it. Any come out, and I'll be all over them.
$map:52010008$ is big, so be careful not to lose them. Check under all the beds and in all the closets!
Leave no bed unturned and no closet unchecked.
Criminals. Will they ever learn?
Thanks for the help. I'm glad to put this whole mess behind me.
Unexpected. Unplanned for. And, worst of all, unscheduled!
What's the matter?
We put in an order for repairmen to fix up the subway, but the workers were actually monsters in disguise!
Without the rails, Ludari simply doesn't run. We're the lifeblood of the city!
We must eliminate these monsters to keep the peace. $MyPCName$, can I rely on you to take care of this matter?
Defeat the monsters near the tracks. The $npcNamePlural:21000735$ and $npcNamePlural:21000732$ cannot be allowed to continue this charade!
I'm relieved. With your help, we were able to evacuate the passengers, at least.
The repairmen—the real repairmen—are still trapped inside the $map:52010009$.
I'm certain there are monsters in there with them... While I want the rails repaired, their safety is more important.
Please go into the $map:52010009$ and make sure my workers are okay.
Please go into the $map:52010009$ and make sure my workers are okay.
The last of the repairmen just made it out. They're being checked for injuries now.
Thanks to you, nobody was seriously hurt. I don't know if I can ever thank you enough.
Help me. Please help!
What's the matter?
I was on my home to my blessed hometown, and the train stopped... And th-then... And then!!
Take a deep breath and speak slowly.
I thought they were workers coming to help me with my bags... but they were monsters in disguise! They took all my things!
I've been busy lately, and I haven't had time to keep up with my parents back home. I was going to make it up to them with piles and piles of gifts, but now they're all gone...
Leave this to me.
R-really? You'll get my gifts back? While you're at it, teach those nasty $npcNamePlural:21000735$ and $npcNamePlural:21000732$ for stealing my precious presents!
I'd rather not go home at all if I can't get my stuff back. Please get the gifts back from the $npcNamePlural:21000735$ and $npcNamePlural:21000732$.
Th-thank you! Thank you so much! Sniff...
Bravo! Bravo! This is it! I've hit the jackpot!
Congratulations...?
Hey, come closer and I'll let you in on this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity!
I'm here to record the upcoming fight. But the thing is, there's not much money in these kinds of shows anymore. People want something fresh.
Something like... the monsters completely destroying the arena here! I already have a name in mind. "Arena Attack! A Special Seven Day Miniseries."
It doesn't get more real than this! We'll get ratings to die for. I promise you that.
We've got to hurry up or this opportunity will pass us by. Get the $itemPlural:30000482$ from the cameras around $map:02010020$. Quickly!
Collect the $itemPlural:30000482$ from the cameras around $map:02010020$. Hurry!
Now I possess all the tapes! Thanks. It's time for my star to rise at last...
This makes absolutely no sense! My calculations were perfect. I analyzed the last twenty bouts of both fighters. There's no way my prediction could have been wrong.
This match should have gone to $npcName:11001378[gender:0]$, no question. There must be something else going on here...
I hope you're not brushing me off. My calculations are never wrong! Somebody must have manipulated the data...
Let me think... The original copies of the data should be in the $map:52010010$. I'm sure of it.
The solution is simple, then. All you need to do is sneak into the $map:52010010$ and bring me the $item:30000483$.
You will do it, of course. I'm an extremely popular manager. People will notice if I go myself.
All you need to do is sneak into the $map:52010010$ and bring me the $item:30000483$.
And I was right, of course. The $item:30000483$ were in the office. I'd better hurry up and check out this data...
这世界上真是无奇不有啊。 你了解的越多，越能发现各种奇奇怪怪的东西。
你看到前面的那个<font color="#ffd200">红色金字塔</font>了吗？ 在不久前，强烈的红色沙尘暴之后， 在那里就发现了不知名的红色金字塔。
我们是谁！我们收集情报的集团啊。 我们派出了24组的侦察队员去金字塔里面调查。
但是！第三天、第四天……已经过去了一周了， 我们的队员还没回来。谁也不知道队员的<font color="#ffd200">下落</font>。
人类！你能去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02010070$</font>里面 看看我们的队员的情况如何吗？ 我最关心的就是我们队员的<font color="#ffd200">生命安全</font>！
请你去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02010070$</font> 确认一下我们去调查的队员 <font color="#ffd200">是不是还活着</font>！拜托了！
你说什么？<font color="#ffd200">$npc:24001904$</font>？ 我似乎听说过这个疯子伯爵。
如果照你所说，金字塔内的空间全部都是 卡卡夫制作的<font color="#ffd200">幻影</font>，那懦弱的人类 可能就会死在里面了。
没时间了！我现在就要回猫鼬侦查总部， 把这个消息告诉侦察队员。
人类！我正在等你！ 上次多亏了你，我们的侦察队员 都没再去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02010070$</font>附近了。
而且我们打听到了新的信息。 作为上次你帮助了我们的回报！我要告诉你这个信息。
询问新的信息是什么。
现在为了引诱人类游客，让人们前往充满金银财宝的 <font color="#ffd200">幻影金字塔</font>的回音正随风到处飘散。

谁去管他是不是真的呢！ 重要的是有了那样的传闻，就能卖出好价钱。 但是发生大地震之后，石巨人山脉分散到了大陆的各个地方。 现在$item:30000055$已经很难找到了。
没想到竟然有人发现了那种石块！ 只要能弄到几个，就发财了！呵呵呵…… 但是必须进入到处都是怪物的矿山内部才行…… 我可不敢冒着生命危险到那里去……
你能帮帮我吗？ 只要到<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000235$</font>去帮我搜集几个<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000055$</font>就行。
嗯？你还没到矿山里面去吗？ 我不是说了吗！只要帮我到<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000235$</font>去搜集几个<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000055$</font>就行。
哦！矿山内部有那么多怪物，居然被你找到啦！ 谢谢你！
咦……咦！……这……这是！ 怎……怎么会有这种可怕的东西！ 快，快拿走！快点！！！
问为什么那样。
你是在明知故问吗？ 你拿回来的$item:30000055$中……混着这个可怕的东西！
问那到底是什么东西。
啊，不知道！不知道！！ 我不能说！这个<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000056$</font>是<font color="#ffd200">非常可怕的东西</font>！ 你要不把它扔回矿山，要不拿去交给<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000039[gender:1]$</font>！
嗯？怎么又回来了？
说迷路了。
什么？你把这个可怕的东西忘在了这里？ 快拿走！快拿着它消失！
刚才你不是放进背包了吗！ 快点拿走！
你怎么背着这么重的背包？ 先整理一下吧！
怎么还拿着那个可怕的东西，在我周围转悠？ 你要不把它扔回矿山，要不拿去交给纳梅德！
你到祭坛这里来，有什么事吗？
问这到底是什么石头。
咦，这是！ 只有古代贤者们才能制作的<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000056$</font>！ 你是在哪里找到的？
说是在$map:02000235$中偶然发现的。
啊，原来如此。 $item:30000056$……没想到能再见到这种传说中的石头……
<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000056$</font>…… 那时消失了的古代部落用$item:30000055$制成的神秘石头。
制作智慧之石的方法现在已经失传了。 随着石巨人山脉变得四分五裂，古代部落消失之后，制作$item:30000056$ 的方法也变成了历史中的秘密。没想到竟然还能发现这种石头……
$npc:11000135[gender:0]$为什么说$item:30000056$很可怕呢？
那是因为…… $item:30000056$是古代人镶嵌在石巨人的胸口， 为它们赋予智慧的石头。
蕴含$item:30000056$的石巨人是守护古代人的神圣守护者。 但是有人……对$item:30000056$施放了邪恶的咒术…… 石巨人们变成了<font color="#ffd200">邪恶力量的傀儡</font>，威胁着整个世界。 $npc:11000135[gender:0]$害怕$item:30000056$，就是这个原因。
$item:30000056$之间会相互共鸣，因此去感受那些气息的话，就能知道 蕴含$item:30000056$的其他石巨人的位置。 必须查明它们的位置，然后告诉$npc:11000134[gender:0]$。 只有这样才能查明<font color="#ffd200">在智慧之石上施加邪恶咒术的人是谁</font>！
我感觉到了……$item:30000056$的气息…… 一个在<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000148$</font>……另一个在<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000021$</font>…… 咦！但是还有一个！！
问为什么这么吃惊。
我感觉到了！像刀子一样锋利，比万年雪更寒冷的<font color="#ffd200">寒冷气息</font>！ 让人难以呼吸的腥臭的<font color="#ffd200">大海味道</font>！ 啊……这里到底是哪儿呢……
这一定是拥有$item:30000056$的石巨人中<font color="#ffd200">最强大的石巨人</font>。 在传说中也几乎难觅踪迹的<font color="#ffd200">$npc:23100006[gender:0]$</font>！ 但是眼下没办法感应到它的准确位置。
要是可怕的石巨人重新苏醒，那就出大事了。 必须尽快弄清楚它的位置才行…… $MyPCName$，你能去寻找<font color="#ffd200">$npc:23100006[gender:0]$的踪迹</font>吗？
要是可怕的石巨人重新苏醒，那就出大事了。 必须尽快弄清楚它的位置才行…… $MyPCName$，你能去寻找<font color="#ffd200">$npc:23100006[gender:0]$的踪迹</font>吗？
散发出寒冷气息的$item:30000055$。 虽然被雪覆盖着，但上面雕刻着和帮曲伯搜集到的石块一样的纹样。
但是可以感觉到更强、更邪恶的气息。 好像……是从<font color="#ffd200">$npc:23100006[gender:0]$</font>身上掉下来的。
$MyPCName$... I don't know what brought you here, but do you think you could help me?
What is it?
There is someone whom I owe my life. It was his final wish that I take care of his newborn son.

From that day forward, I made it my life's mission to look after that boy. Wherever I might go, we were never apart. But one day, I received an ominous fortune from $npc:11001046[gender:0]$ of $map:02000268$.
He said that the child would lose his life at the hands of the terrible $npc:23090005[gender:0]$... But the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$ is immortal. It can be defeated, but never destroyed.
So where do I come into this?

$npc:11001046[gender:0]$ told me how to seal the beast away for a time. First, he told me to obtain a $item:30000157$ in $map:02000268$. But... try as I might, I couldn't find it, despite coming all the way here.
Please, will you help me by scouring $map:02000268$ for a $item:30000157$ while I search this place?
If you do find a $item:30000157$</font>, bring it directly to $npc:11001046[gender:0]$! He will surely know a way to defeat the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$!

$npc:11001046[gender:0]$ told me how to seal the beast away for a time. First, he told me to obtain a $item:30000157$ in $map:02000268$. Please, will you help me by scouring $map:02000268$ for a $item:30000157$
Hmm? What's that? A $item:30000157$?
Heh. He sure is a stubborn one. He should slow down a little. It's not like a dead man can collect on his debts. Trying to repay a life-debt at any cost... Ho-hum.

Long ago, a group of nameless swordsmen clothed adorned with simple bamboo hats sealed the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$ in the $map:02000037$. They managed to seal the temple entrance and put the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$ to sleep, but it cost them their souls.

This $item:30000157$ was the blade wielded by one of those heroes, so many years ago. It is old and worn, yes, but it can be restored to its former glory by means of an ancient magic. One designed to undo the toll of time.

I can restore the $item:13200028$ to its former power, so that you can it can be used to seal the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$ away once more. There may also be a way to prevent the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$ from ever awakening again. But first, give me some time to work on the blade...
Unbelievable!
What's going on?
Wooo! One try! I managed to restore the $item:13200028$ in a single attempt! All of those years of Shaman training really paid off. TAKE THAT, DAD!
I've placed the $item:13200028$ inside this $item:30000155$, please deliver it to $npc:11000144[gender:0]$. He will need it when he confronts the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$.
There's one more thing! The $item:13200028$ alone will not be enough to defeat the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$... What we need is the power of the one who wielded it.

The souls of the heroes rest within the grave markers in $map:02000200$. Find the $item:30000153$, and throw it into the $npcName:11000345$ which sits nearby! The heroes gave the last of their strength to ignite the $npcName:11000345$ before they fell. You can find it near the entrance of the $map:02000037$.
From the flames, you will draw forth the $item:30000154$, which can be used to unleash the true power of the $item:13200028$. Bring it to $npcName:11000144$. Also... tell him I wish him luck.
Did you forget something?
I, uhh... misplaced the $item:30000155$.
Nope! I just got turned around.
What are you thinking! This is it here. You should take better care of such things!
Didn't you put it in your bag? Maybe you should double-check.
Your bag looks full. Maybe you should make some space.
Oh... Okay then.
You're back! Did you talk to $npc:11001046[gender:0]$? What happened?
(Hand him the $item:30000155$, and tell him about the $item:30000154$.)
Could it be?! This is the $item:13200028$ used to seal away the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$ long ago... Using this, I'll be sure to win!
I'm not sure how much good the $item:13200028$ is going to do me if I can't reach the $npc:23090005$ breaks free of the $map:02000037$...
What do you mean?
While you were in $map:02000268$, I wandered deep inside the Ant Tunnel and found the door to the $map:02000037$. However... it was shut tight and could not be opened from the outside.
Maybe you can open the door using the $item:30000154$?

Hmm... Perhaps. We still need to find the $item:30000153$ $npcName:11001046[gender:0]$ spoke of. The resting place of the nameless heroes... $MyPCName$, lets search the Ant Tunnel for the $item:30000153$ together. You start in the $map:02000200$ where the $map:02000037$ entrance is located.

According to the prophecy, time is short. If you find the $item:30000153$, take it straight to the $npcName:11000345$ and place it inside. If all goes well, it should be transformed into the $item:30000154$.
$npcName:11001046[gender:0]$ said the $npcName:11000345$ is found near the entrance to the $map:02000037$ in the $map:02000200$, right? Then there's no time to waste! Get going!

According to the prophecy, time is short. If you find the $item:30000153$, take it straight to the $npcName:11000345$ and place it inside. If all goes well, it should be transformed into the $item:30000154$.
You found the $npc:11000345$ burning amidst the boiling lava.
Casting the $item:30000153$ into the $npc:11000345$ should awaken the power of the soul that sleeps within, transforming it into the $item:30000154$,
The $npc:11000345$ smolders.
(Approach the flames.)
All that remains is to throw the $item:30000153$ into the flames.
(Throw the $item:30000153$ into the fire.)
Ah... That's the $item:30000154$! With the $item:13200028$ restored to its true power, I should be able to defeat the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$... Ugh...
Are you okay?
It's no big deal... I was in a hurry, and I tripped and fell off a cliff. Agh... It's probably just a minor internal injury...
Uhh... You should see a doctor.
There's no time for that! If the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$ awakens, and I'm not here to stop him...!
I'll stop him.
Ugh... It looks like I'm in your debt yet again. I'll leave it to you, but don't try and face the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$ alone.

Here, take the $item:13200028$. Gather the strongest warriors you can find and travel to the $map:02000037$. Ugh... I'll follow you when I can. I need to look after my wound and check in on the boy. I have to set my affairs in order, in case...
Just beyond the Cleansing Flames in the deepest part of the $map:02000200$, you'll find the entrance to the $map:02000037$.
Take this. I have embedded the $item:30000154$ within the $item:13200028$. Gather the strongest allies you can find... Face the$npc:23090005[gender:0]$. I'll follow as soon as I can!

Ah, $MyPCName$! Just the adventurer I was hoping to see. I have a new project that I'd love your help with. I'm making an illustrated guide to monsters all around the world! It will tell you what they look like, how to fight them, when to run away... all sorts of useful facts!
My monster guide is going to sell like hotcakes when it's finished! I would be more than happy to credit you as a co-author if you help me with my research.

Of course, there's still a lot of data to gather. For instance, I know very little about mechanical monsters. I heard there are many mechanical monsters to be found near $map:2000270$... Do you think you could face them in combat and tell me what you learn?
There are many kinds of mechanical monsters throughout this world. I want you to face various kinds in battle, and learn all you can about them.
Have you already faced off against those mechanical monsters? Tell, me! What sort of fascinating things did you learn about them? Do they have any special weaknesses?
(Tell him everything you observed about the monsters.)
Oh! What fascinating details! I'll be sure to jot all of this down. Thank you so very much for your help! Why don't you stop by tomorrow, and we can continue our research?

A true warrior knows how to take advantage of their surroundings. Sometimes, an improvised weapon is the best one. For example, the Flaming Barrels often found at construction sites can be thrown, to devastating effect.
An object's use is determined by the people who use it. Finding new uses for things is one of the way we merchants turn a profit. Maybe you could help me test something out...

I have heard you can find unattended Flaming Barrels in the areas around $map:2000270$... Of course, they can be found other places as well. Would you mind investigating whether they make an effective weapon?
I have heard you can find unattended Flaming Barrels in the areas around $map:2000270$... Of course, they can be found other places as well.
Well, did you try using Flaming Barrels as a weapon? Was it very effective?
It roasted them like marshmallows.
I see! Now if I could only find a way to package and sell Flaming Barrels...

I heard there are many discarded Tires in the areas surrounding $map:02000100$... Of course, they can be found other places as well. Would you mind investigating whether they make an effective weapon?
I heard there are many discarded Tires in the areas surrounding $map:02000100$.... Of course, they can be found other places as well.
Well, did you try using Tires as a weapon? Was it very effective?
It bowled my enemies over.
I see! Now if I could only find a way to package and sell Tires...

<font color="#909090">(He sighs.)</font> My monster compendium has turned out to be a much bigger task than I realized... I'm not sure I'll ever finish it! In the interim, I've decided to create an illustrated booklet that focuses only on very powerful adversaries. What do you say, will you help me with the data collection?

While I was tinkering with my idea for a digest on powerful and notorious foes, I heard of one named $npc:22000045$. If you could analyze their special attacks and weaknesses, my illustrated booklet will be a best seller for sure!

Rumor has it, $npc:22000045$ is a persona split from the psyche of a knight with a dissociative identity disorder... They are said to appear in $map:02000262$. Please analyze $npc:22000045$'s strengths and weaknesses, so that I can document them for my guide. Of course, anything else you learn about them would be welcome information indeed.

While I was tinkering with my idea for a digest on powerful and notorious foes, I heard of one named $npc:23000012$. If you could analyze their special attacks and weaknesses, my illustrated booklet will be a best seller for sure!

Rumor has it, $npc:23000012$ freezes everything it touches... It is said to appear in $map:02000176$. Please analyze $npc:23000012$'s strengths and weaknesses, so that I can document them for my guide. Of course, anything else you learn about them would be welcome information indeed.

Rumor has it, $npc:23000012$ freezes everything it touches... It is said to appear in $map:02000176$. Please analyze $npc:23000012$'s strengths and weaknesses, so that I can document them for my guide.
You're alive! You'd been gone so long I thought something had happened.... Well, tell me about your encounter with $npc:23000012$! What did you learn?
Have you heard of $map:2000325$? It is said to be the ultimate challenge! Surely there's no better way to hone your combat skills.

Why not go there and test your mettle? And... while you're there, perhaps you can collect some data on the unique monsters that appear there, for my book? I would be very grateful, of course! What do you say, will you take on $map:2000325$?
Weren't you going to challenge $map:2000325$? You can get there by way of $map:02000217$.
Tell me, did you discover any rare and unusual monsters? What were they like?
There were a bunch of powerful spirits. They didn't go down without a fight.
Ah, I see. Spirits... Well, in any case, I'm glad you returned from the trial none the worse for the wair.
Have you heard the rumors about the time machine? That's right! A time machine is being developed in $map:2000298$!

Can you imagine everything I could do with a time machine? ...I could sell them, and get filthy rich! A time machine in every home! Forget to pick up the kids? Go back in time! Do something embarrassing at work? Jump forward to when everyone's forgotten! I can't see a single flaw in my plan.

I've heard the time machine is located in the deepest room within $map:2000298$. They call the place the "$map:02000304$" or something… Anyway, go and see for yourself if this time machine is the real thing!
I have to know, is the time machine real?! Hurry up and go to $map:02000304$ and find out!
You're back! Well, was there really a time machine?!
So... there is a time machine, but no one should ever, ever own one.
W-what? Oh... How disappointing. I was so excited about being the exclusive vendor of time machines...

Have you heard the rumors? A Vayarian who disappeared long ago has resurfaced at $map:02000191$. If what they say is true, its body is covered in chunks of ice imbued with magical, disease-curing powers! I'm not sure how they discovered that...
I know it's a big favor to ask, but do you think you could retrieve some of that magic ice for me? If the rumors are true, the commercial implications are staggering!
I know it's a big favor to ask, but do you think you could retrieve some of that magic ice for me? I know it won't be easy separating it from the giant's body...
You're back! Did you bring me some magic ice?
I couldn't collect any ice, but it didn't have a medicinal use anyway.
Is that so? Oh dear... I guess the rumors were false. Well, it's back to the drawing board...
Have you heard? $npc:23100033$, who appear in $map:2000098$, have fur whose softness and warmth cannot be matched! If I were to line boots with their fur, it would be an incredible hit!

I've seen a number of strong adventurers toting around hats and garments woven from their fur. But these creatures are violent. Shearing the beasts and making it out with your life is no easy task, so I haven't been able to get my hands on any. If you could bring me some of their fur so that I could verify these rumors, I would be most grateful.
Please investigate whether $npc:23100033$'s fur is as soft and warm as people say. If you can, bring me back some. You can find them at $map:2000098$.
Well, was $npc:23100033$'s fur as cozy as described?
It was soft, but they were too violent for me to bring back a sample.

Ah… If you had brought me some, I would've been able to see for myself. A pity. If you should happen to get a hold of some of $npc:23100033$'s fur in the future, I'd be grateful if you would bring it here for me to see.
Have you heard of the ancient shaman who wields a dark and terrible magic? I speak of course of $npc:24002005$.

I was wondering if I could harness that magic to help me lift heavy objects and restock the shelves... Although i worry that using such dark magic could drive me insane. I know! All I have to do is investigate whether $npc:24002005$ seems like a well-adjusted person.
Would you go to $map:02010047$ in $map:02010054$ and see if $npc:24002005$'s mind has been affected by the use of dark magic?
Well, was $npc:24002005$'s still in their right mind? Is their dark magic safe to use?
Considering he tried to take control of my mind, I'm going to say no.
Ah... R-Really? Hm... If it's that dangerous... Maybe I should just stick to lifting things the old-fashioned way.
呀哩哩哟~ 我不久前看了一个关于生态情况异常的纪录片。 里面说<font color="#ffd200">水凝固成了玩具城方块，出现了奇怪的积木傀儡</font>。 当时我就灵光一现！
你想想，如果能修理那个积木傀儡，肯定 能做成孩子们喜欢的玩具，我这主意是不是很棒？
说似乎不好修理。
不要觉得不可能，<font color="#ffd200">要想怎么变得可能</font>。 你先去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000346$</font> ，看看能不能修理<font color="#ffd200">$npc:24001603$</font> ， 好吗？
你先去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000346$</font>确认一下能不能修理<font color="#ffd200">$npc:24001603$</font>吧？
怎么样？能修理<font color="#ffd200">$npc:24001603$</font> 吗？
如果不是非常厉害的修理工人，是不可能完成的。
啊……看来得找个厉害的修理工了。 总之，谢谢你。
呀哩哩哟~ 我不久前看了个关于生态异常的纪录片。 里面出现了<font color="#ffd200">突变的红色仙人掌。</font> 当时我就灵光一现！
你想想， <font color="#ffd200">爱和热情的红色！在没有水的沙漠中生长的仙人掌！</font> 如果把它包装成家庭园艺商品， 人们会不会买了？
说谁会买怪物仙人掌。
不要觉得不可能，<font color="#ffd200">要想怎么变得可能</font>。 你先去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000347$</font>看看能不能把<font color="#ffd200">$npc:24001604$</font> 用作观赏植物吧？
你先去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000347$</font>看看能不能把<font color="#ffd200">$npc:24001604$</font> 用作观赏植物吧？
怎么样？<font color="#ffd200">$npc:24001604$</font>能用作观赏植物吗？
说我不喜欢。
啊……原来如此，但我觉得肯定有人能感受到那种仙人掌的魅力。 总之，谢谢你。
哎呀，出大事了。 给我提供煤炭的<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000348$</font>好几月没了联系， 几天前我看了那个纪录片才知道了原因。 居然在矿山里<font color="#ffd200">出现了可恶的小恶魔</font>！！
你快点去矿山把 <font color="#ffd200">$npc:24001605$</font>消灭掉。 拜托了！
请你快点去$map:2000348$ 消灭<font color="#ffd200">$npc:24001605$</font>。 拜托了！
啊，你回来了！<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000348$</font>已经告诉我会尽快给我煤炭的。 真是谢谢你！
呀哩哩哟~ 我不久前看了个关于生态异常的纪录片。 里面出现了<font color="#ffd200">吓人箱子变成了怪物</font>的内容。 当时我就灵光一现！
你想想，如果修理一下<font color="#ffd200">$npc:24001601$</font>，肯定就能变为孩子们喜欢的 <font color="#ffd200">玩具</font>，我这主意是不是很棒？
说似乎不好修理。
不要觉得不可能，<font color="#ffd200">要想怎么变得可能</font>。 请你先去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000344$</font>看看能不能修理<font color="#ffd200">$npc:24001601$</font>吧？
你能去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000344$</font>看看能不能修理<font color="#ffd200">$npc:24001601$</font>吗？
怎么样？可以修理<font color="#ffd200">$npc:24001601$</font> 吗？
如果不是非常厉害的修理工人，是不可能完成的。
啊……看来得找个厉害的修理工了。 总之，谢谢你。
呀哩哩哟~ 我不久前看了个关于生态异常的纪录片。 那里面说<font color="#ffd200">棋盘上的女王变成了具有致命魅力的怪物</font>。 当时我就灵光一现！
你想想，如果能消除<font color="#ffd200">$npc:24001602[gender:1]$</font>的邪恶气息， 那就能做成孩子们喜欢的<font color="#ffd200">玩具</font>了。 我这主意是不是很棒？
说她已经成了怪物，应该不太容易做成玩具。
