This business plan needs to be convincing. A lot of the locals aren't so happy with the idea of turning their dusty desert into a modernized paradise, but if I can get a picture that really shows off $map:02010036$, I'm sure I can win them over.

Take this camera and get some great shots for me, will you? Just climb to the top of $map:02010036$ and let your artistic vision take over. While you're at it, defeat any monsters who get in your way.
Back already?
I lost the $item:30000511$.
I'm just passing through.
I found the $item:30000511$ lying on the ground. I can't believe you dropped it...
I'm sure I saw you shove it into your bag earlier!
I found it lying on the ground. I can't believe you dropped it... And now you don't have room in your bag to take it back!
Go take the picture. Quickly now!
With this picture, the business plan is unbeatable. Just have to find the right spot for it...
If this works out, we'll have you to thank for some small part of it. If there's anything you need in the future, feel free to ask me.
Finally, my $item:30000509$ is finished! We'll start by showing it to $npc:11001386[gender:0]$. If he agrees, then getting the other locals on board will be a cinch.
Before we start constructions, we need the villagers to clear the area. But there are a lot of them, and they're not all keen to move...
Will you take the $item:30000509$ to $npcName:11001386[gender:0]$? Not that I'm worried for my safety, of course.
Back already?
I lost the $item:30000509$.
I'm just passing through.
I found the $item:30000509$ lying on the ground. I can't believe you dropped it...
I'm sure I saw you shove it into your bag earlier!
I found it lying on the ground. I can't believe you dropped it... And now you don't have room in your bag to take it back!
Let's hurry this along.
So, this is the $item:30000509$ I've been waiting for. That was faster than I thought.
$npcName:11001381[gender:0]$ is efficient. Thank you for delivering it.
Do I have to read this whole thing? I'm sure everything's in order. Well, let's see...
Words... Words... Words... Ah, a picture! And a pretty one, too.
Here's the $item:30000510$ for our investor in $map:02010036$. His name is... $npcName:11001382[gender:0]$, I believe.
Why'd you come back?
I lost the $item:30000510$.
I'm just passing through.
I found the $item:30000510$ lying on the ground.
I could have sworn you had it earlier...
I found it lying on the ground. I'd give it back to you, but your bag's full.
I see. I was wondering what happened.
Now that I have the $item:30000510$, we can get to business.
Aren't you in Blackstar?
What do you have to do with this, anyway? Not planning to nose in on our business, I hope.
<font color="#909090">（口水）</font> 真是的，被派到这个一次也没来过的地方， 晕头转向，没一个认识的人，真是……
问是什么事。
女王派我来了这里， 但是我从没来过这，正在考虑从哪里开始参观。
询问他任务就是参观吗。
<font color="#909090">（装作没听见，然后突然想起了什么。）</font> 你看到那边了吗？那个高高瘦瘦的人。
他一看到我就说我看上去很好，说他很兴奋什么的，吵死了。 你能去问问他到底是什么意思吗？
如果我穿成这样去购物中心，大家肯定都会盯着我看的，真是的……
这之前是荒凉的沙漠…… 现在连一粒沙子都找不到，道路宽阔，建筑林立。
呀哩哩哟~ 你好，新朋友！

Put on a big smile!
Marvelous! You, my new friend, are a master of the art of fun!

Put on a big smile!
Marvelous! You, my new friend, are a master of the art of fun!
Ahh, you scared me! I thought you were one of the those onion-tops. Are they still out there?
I've seen them around.
Damn it. Those dirty ground-dwellers won't leave me alone. And all this because something I said when I thought no one was listening.
What did you say?
I just said "I absolutely love frying onions, I'd fry them all up if I could." Don't look at me like that! I meant regular onions, not gross onion-people who walk on two legs.
Listen, I haven't eaten in hours and staring at all those onion-folk is making me hungry. Do me a favor and drive them away, will you?
I think I'm gonna pass out... How much longer do I need to hide here?
You know, I'm gonna have to ask for a refund for that invisibility potion, considering how easily you found me.
Oh! Did you drive the onions away? Whew, now I can finally relax.
So, after you got rid of all those smelly onions, I decided to rest my eyes for a moment and ended up falling asleep. Then I wake up to find they've all come back.
So instead of collecting $npc:11000285[gender:0]$'s tears like I came here to do in the first place, I'm stuck here hiding from those stupid sprout-heads.
What do you need $npc:11000285[gender:0]$'s tears for?
Well, I'd be happy to tell you. That is if you don't mind getting some for me.
Tell me, and I'll think about it.
Hmph, fine. There's this huge cooking competition coming up, and as an aspiring chef, it's a great way to get my name out there.
So I'm preparing a special dish for the judges, boiled in the spring waters which are supposedly made up of $npc:11000285[gender:0]$'s tears.
Rumor is, people will fall in love with any dish cooked in the spring water. I know it doesn't sound that likely, but I'll do whatever it takes to win!
I guess I can help.
Great! Here's a bottle. Go over to the spring $npc:11000285[gender:0]$ and fill it up with water.
Back already?
I lost your bottle.
Any cooking tips?
Ugh, you're as clumsy as a sprout-head. Lucky for you I brought an extra. Don't lose it this time.
I'm sure I saw you shove it into your bag earlier!
Are you kidding? There's no room in your bag.
The trick to a good onion stew is to catch them while they're young. Err... I mean, pick them while they're fresh.
You got it? Awesome, thanks! Now all I need to do is harvest some onions at peak freshness, and I'll be ready to cook an award-winning dish.
What a fruitless journey... <font color="#909090">(She sighs.)</font>
What's wrong?
I ventured here from afar to meet with $npc:11000285[gender:0]$, and beseech him to aid me in a matter of the heart.
What are you talking about?

In my town there are whispers on the wind that $npc:11000285[gender:0]$ can salvage even the most hopeless case of unrequited love. Though vast oceans and treacherous mountains bocked my path, I persevered and made it here.
But when I finally spoke with $npc:11000285[gender:0]$ he said there was nothing he could do to assist me, and requested that I leave.
Did he say why?
$npc:11000285[gender:0]$ told me that he holds no power over love but that, if it was truly meant to be, my love would be returned in kind.
I never expected $npc:11000285[gender:0]$ to grant my wish without receiving anything in return...
That is why I visited the most prestigious pet store in my land and acquired a generous helping of premium turtle feed. Even so, he refuses to aid me!
Please, adventurer, won't you try and persuade $npc:11000285[gender:0]$ to change his mind?
I would not have traveled so far were I not desperate!
Have you too come to have a wish granted? I'm afraid there's no truth to the rumors.
Why have you come to see me?
(Tell him about $npc:11001538[gender:1]$'s story.)
Ah. Poor girl. I hope that she finds what she is looking for, but there is nothing I can do. After all, I could not even protect my own love.
I have no special powers. I am merely a lonely widower. All I can do is hope the girl's love is returned.
Go and tell the girl that I wish to see no more visitors showing up in my spring with turtle feed. It's sad and demeaning for the both of us.
I am just like any other turtle. This foolish myth was created by those afraid to take responsibility for their own lives.
You've returned.
(Tell her $npc:11000285[gender:0]$ said.)
To learn this after coming so far... If I cannot have love, then I will have vengeance. I will find the ones responsible for spreading this myth, and destroy them!
$MyPCName$！你有没有看到一个小孩子？ 黄色头发，个子大概到我的腰……名字叫做<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001166[gender:0]$</font>。 他是我弟弟……我怎么找也找不到他了。
他好像是去找朋友了……我担心他们去了<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000331$</font>。 我之前明明告诉过他绝对不能进去，连想都不要想……！
问<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000331$</font>是什么地方，为什么那么担心。
那里有很多五彩缤纷的花树，林间的小路看上去非常漂亮。 但是那里很危险，不能随便进去，所以大人们把入口给挡住了。 据说那里住着一个凶恶的魔法师，会攻击所有进入森林的人。
问为什么认为弟弟去了那里。
<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001166[gender:0]$</font>是个很活泼、好奇心很强的孩子。 他有很多朋友，经常在一起玩。
但是几天前，他问我知不知道<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000331$在哪里</font> 。 他这么一问，我就知道他是想去那里，所以我说这样绝对不行，教训了他一顿。 他居然连声招呼都不打就走掉了……必须快点找到<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001166[gender:0]$</font>才行。
该怎么帮他。
责怪他为什么不管教得更严厉一些。
我打算沿着这条路查看村庄北部的情况。 $MyPCName$，你能去一下<font color="#ffd200">村庄南部</font>吗？ 还有些朋友……你去好好劝劝他们，把他们带到安全的地方吧。拜托了。
他还小，什么都不懂，希望你能理解。找到之后，一定要好好劝他。 $MyPCName$，你能到<font color="#ffd200">村子南边</font>去找找看吗？我到北边去看看。 他应该和朋友们在一起……拜托你了。
$MyPCName$，如果你见到$npcName:11001166[gender:0]$的话，请把他带到安全的地方去。 我去村子北边找找看，你到<font color="#ffd200">村子南边</font>去看看。拜托你了。
啊……是，没错。我就是<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001166[gender:0]$</font>。 你怎么知道我的？
嗯？哥哥正在找我？ 真的吗？
劝他回到安全的地方去。
不，不行！ 我的<font color="#ffd200">朋友们</font>还在里面……呜呜……
让他别哭，慢慢说。
我和朋友们想在<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000331$</font>玩<font color="#ffd200">捉迷藏</font>……呜呜。 但是突然听到了爆炸声，还有什么人 在动的声音……！
$npc:11001167[gender:0]$哥哥说的那个<font color="#ffd200">凶恶的魔法师</font>看到我们之后， 作势要把我们抓走，我很害怕……！ 于是连忙逃了出来，呜呜……！
问朋友们是不是还在森林里。
嗯，是的……！他们好像躲起来了…… $MyPCName$，请你和我一起进入$map:02000331$，救出我的朋友们……！ 有你在的话，就不用怕那个魔法师了～好吗？
$MyPCName$，从这个入口进去，就能到达$map:02000331$。 我们在$map:02000331$里面见吧！
$MyPCName$，谢谢你救我们出来。 朋友们让我向你转达谢意！你真是个好人！
哇！是$MyPCName$！！ 你能帮帮我吗？求你了～！
我……我们又被那个<font color="#ffd200">凶恶的魔法师</font>发现了！ 请你和我一起进入<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000331$</font>，帮助我的朋友们……！ 呜呜……不知道……
责备他说为什么又到那种危险的地方去。
$map:02000331$有很多漂亮的花树，又没什么人， 最适合玩<font color="#ffd200">捉迷藏</font>了。 只要不被那个<font color="#ffd200">魔法师</font>发现就行……为什么总是在我捉人的时候出现呢……！
<font color="#909090">（那好像没什么关系吧……）</font>
$MyPCName$，你那么强。请再帮我一次。 算我求你了。嗯？求求你～
$MyPCName$，你真是个好人～！又答应帮我！！ 我们在$map:02000331$里面见吧！
$MyPCName$，这次你真帅！ 在你的帮助下，大家都安全出来了。谢谢你！
您好。你是<font color="#ffd200">冒险岛电视台的员工</font>吗？
说是。
不是。
是吗？之前好像没见过……是<font color="#ffd200">新职员</font>吧？ 从现在开始，你要<font color="#ffd200">按我的指示去做</font>，后辈。
如实说其实不是冒险岛电视台的职员。
说有事尽管吩咐。
也是……现在正是忙的时候，能出来的人只有我一个。 我很担心，但又不能直接过去…… 心里觉得郁闷，所以出来吹吹风。一会儿就得进去了。
问在担心什么。

我叫<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001191[gender:1]$</font>，目前正在准备拍摄一部讲述生态界异常现象的纪录片。 但是<font color="#ffd200">到现场去的工作人员</font>一直都没有回来， 本来就缺少人手，拍摄日程也很紧，我们大家真的都很努力来着…… 我好担心<font color="#ffd200">他们会不会出了什么事</font>。
拍摄地点是<font color="#ffd200">$map:2000045$、$map:2000003$、$map:2000010$、 $map:2000255$和$map:2000007$</font>。一共五个地方。 台长说想看看拍摄的画面，但是现在拍摄到的内容太少了。 只要其中一个人能把<font color="#ffd200">设置的摄像机回收回来</font>就行……

像<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001193[gender:1]$和$npc:11001194[gender:0]$</font>之类的专业人士应该没问题…… 但是糊里糊涂的<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001192[gender:0]$</font>和懒散的<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001196$</font>有点让人不太放心。
尤其是<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001195[gender:0]$</font>。他不是我们摄制组的人， 听说人手不够之后，就毛遂自荐过来帮忙。他去了<font color="#ffd200">$map:2000045$</font>之后已经好几天了， 但却没有任何消息。
说愿意帮他。
真的非常感谢。 请你去<font color="#ffd200">$map:2000045$</font>找<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001195[gender:0]$</font>。 必须确认一下有没有发生什么事。
除了$npcName:11001195[gender:0]$之外，其实我也很担心其他人。 <font color="#ffd200">五个摄影地点</font>分散在各处，没办法互相帮助…… 在这期间，<font color="#ffd200">台长</font>又来催问什么时候能看影片， 真是焦头烂额。
<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001195[gender:0]$</font>……？我就是。你找我有什么事吗？ 你是<font color="#ffd200">电视台的人</font>吗？
<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001191[gender:1]$</font>正在找你呢。
什么！哎呀，哎呀，我的渡渡鸟。我给<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001191[gender:1]$</font>添麻烦了！ 你也看到了，我身体很好。 只是我的心和灵魂在哭泣～
哎呀，真让人担心。估计不光是这里遇到了麻烦…… <font color="#ffd200">到其他摄影地点去的人</font>一定也需要<font color="#ffd200">帮.助.</font>！ 我的<font color="#ffd200">第六感</font>一向没错！
喂，甜心！喂，漂亮的宝贝～ 既然来了，就帮我个忙呗。

你听说过<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000350$</font>吗？那是从黑暗种子中生长出来的影子枝条。 那东西曾经一直深入到<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000023$</font>附近，后来我们依靠 $npc:11000031[gender:0]$和妖精们的力量，才好不容易把它挡住。 在当初进入<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000350$</font>的妖精中，<font color="#ffd200">有一部分中了哈比毒</font>。

在那些妖精的身上，每天都会长出一个<font color="#ffd200">$item:59200180$</font>， 据说打开之后，就能获得名叫<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000437$</font>的东西。 那是<font color="#ffd200">凝聚着强大黑暗能量的结晶</font>。你去尽量多搜集一些。 那样才能解开围绕在你的那个东西周围的封印。
听说最近发现了从<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000048$</font>通往$map:02000350$的入口。 你最好去那里打听一下有关<font color="#ffd200">$item:59200180$</font>和<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000437$</font>的情况。
通往$map:02000350$的入口在<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000048$</font>。 你去那里打听一下有关<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000437$</font>的情况，尽量多搜集一些。 快点，趁我还没改主意！
让我看看……哦，不错，这些就够了！ 快给我，我要开始<font color="#ffd201">工作</font>了。
等待$npcName:11001242[gender:0]$完成工作。
这个……没错。 嗯……这里。
再等一会儿。
好的……应该，这样。还有，这里，这样。
$npcName:11001242[gender:0]$的表情似乎有点奇怪。
好了。给你，拿着。
哦，这个力量……？喂，这东西你是从哪里得到的？ 你也一定很想知道，所以才会仔细听<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001212[gender:0]$</font>那个怪家伙的话，到这里来找我，不是吗？快点告诉我。
说明打倒$npcName:23090005[gender:0]$之后发生的事情。
打倒<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:23090005[gender:0]$</font>之后，对获得的物质进行了净化， 并向利用<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000421$</font>制成的武器中注入了力量， 结果却得到了无法当作武器使用的玩意，对吧？
说是。
哈哈哈哈！见到我，你应该感到荣幸。 刚好我正在覆盖在这里的深沉黑暗力量及它的波长。 围绕在这个东西上的<font color="#ffd200">不祥而又奇妙的魔力</font>具有与此处的力量相类似的波长。 很好，这样就行了。一定有<font color="#ffd200">办法</font>的。
虽然我不知道你能不能听懂，但是我还是简单说明下吧。 一种力量遇到<font color="#ffd200">相同波长的力量</font>时，就会产生巨大的力量，互相排斥。 就像是磁铁同性相斥一样。
将覆盖在这里的强大黑暗能量聚集起来， 让它和你带来的这件东西相互碰撞，就会产生<font color="#ffd200">相互排斥的强大力量</font>。 那样的话，也许就能将围绕在这件东西上的不祥的魔力<font color="#ffd200">解封</font>。
说那就快试试吧。
喂，你以为让它解开就能解开啊。 我不是说了吗？必须<font color="#ffd200">搜集大量的黑暗能量，与之发生冲突</font>才行。 需要非常多的黑暗能量！<font color="#ffd200">首先必须去搜集那个东西</font>。
问那种东西在哪里可以获得。

说是。
哈哈哈哈！见到我，你应该感到荣幸。 刚好我正在覆盖在这里的深沉黑暗力量及它的波长。 围绕在这个东西上的<font color="#ffd200">不祥而又奇妙的魔力</font>具有与此处的力量相类似的波长。 很好，这样就行了。一定有<font color="#ffd200">办法</font>的。

将覆盖在这里的强大黑暗能量聚集起来， 让它和你带来的这件东西相互碰撞，就会产生<font color="#ffd200">相互排斥的强大力量</font>。 那样的话，也许就能将围绕在这件东西上的不祥的魔力<font color="#ffd200">解封</font>。

拿出$item:13200043$，并委托冶炼。
等下，这个……！难道你解开封印了？对了，等等……你，<font color="#ffd200">身体没事吧</font>？在来这里的时候，没发生什么事吧？
说在挥舞武器的时候差点出了大事，请他快点冶炼。
没什么事，但是$npcName:11001242[gender:0]$说在使用武器前一定要冶炼。

这个不是<font color="#ffd200">冶炼</font>就能解决的问题。 你拿来的这个武器上的气息和<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:23090005[gender:0]$</font>拥有的无限生命力的本质相同， $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$会吸收其他生命的血液为己用。 而这个武器<font color="#ffd200">会吸收装备者的气息</font>。

用自深沉的黑暗中聚集起来的<font color="#ffd200">强大气息</font>使<font color="#ffd200">不祥的魔力封印上出现了裂缝</font>……？ 真有趣。最终变成了可以装备的<font color="#ffd200">武器</font>的形态……！ 不过，单单打破封印，似乎并不能<font color="#ffd200">获得真正的力量</font>。
问应该怎么办。
根据先祖们留下的记录，<font color="#ffd200">注入了魔力的武器</font> 会很像它的力量之源，并受到其强烈影响。 这把武器中注入的魔力源自<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:23090005[gender:0]$</font>，果然…… 看来……好像得想想<font color="#ffd200">别的办法</font>。
<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:23090005[gender:0]$</font>是超脱于普通生命循环的不灭存在。 能够<font color="#ffd200">完全控制</font>源自于他魔力的力量的方法， 会不会和他的秘密有关呢……？ 但这只是<font color="#ffd200">推测</font>，没办法确定，相关的线索又很少。
事实上，从在武器中注入力量失败的那天开始，我就一直在阅读<font color="#ffd200">先祖们的记录</font>， 以及<font color="#ffd200">来自其他大陆的资料</font>。 请你再耐心等等。我一定会找到<font color="#ffd200">解决方法</font>！

用从深沉的黑暗中聚集的<font color="#ffd200">强大气息</font>，<font color="#ffd200">让不祥的魔力封印产生裂痕</font>……？ 真是个新奇的方法。最终变成了可以装备的<font color="#ffd200">武器</font>形态……！ 但光是解开封印，好像<font color="#ffd200">并不能获得真正的力量</font>。
问应该怎么办。
根据先祖们留下的记录，<font color="#ffd200">注入了魔力的武器</font> 会很像它的力量之源，并受到其强烈影响。 这把武器中注入的魔力源自<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:23090005[gender:0]$</font>，果然…… 看来……好像得想想<font color="#ffd200">别的办法</font>。
<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:23090005[gender:0]$</font>是超脱于普通生命循环的不灭存在。 能够<font color="#ffd200">完全控制</font>源自于他魔力的力量的方法， 会不会和他的秘密有关呢……？ 但这只是<font color="#ffd200">推测</font>，没办法确定，相关的线索又很少。
事实上，从在武器中注入力量失败的那天开始，我就一直在阅读<font color="#ffd200">先祖们的记录</font>， 以及<font color="#ffd200">来自其他大陆的资料</font>。 请你再耐心等等。我一定会找到<font color="#ffd200">解决方法</font>！
等等。站在那里仔细听我说。 在<font color="#ffd200">使用武器之前</font>，还得再做一件事。 虽然封印解开了，但在完成那件事之前，还称不上是完整的武器。
问需要干什么。
那就是<font color="#ffd200">冶炼</font>。越是强大的武器，这一步就越重要。 你必须到<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000203$</font>去对武器进行冶炼。 如果在这之前试着使用武器，那发生的一切后果<font color="#ffd200">全部由你负责</font>。
你还不走？ 你记住了，一定要冶炼以后才能使用武器！ 去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000203$</font> 吧！快点！
你好，$MyPCName$！这段时间过得怎么样？
拿出$item:15000041$，并委托冶炼。
咦，这是……！难道你已经解开封印了吗？对了，等等……你，<font color="#ffd200">身体没事吧</font>？在来这里的时候，没发生什么事吧？
说在挥舞武器的时候差点出了大事，请他快点冶炼。
没什么事，但是$npcName:11001242[gender:0]$说在使用武器前一定要冶炼。

这个不是<font color="#ffd200">冶炼</font>就能解决的问题。 你拿来的这个武器上的气息和<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:23090005[gender:0]$</font>拥有的无限生命力的本质相同， $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$会吸收其他生命的血液为己用。 而这个武器<font color="#ffd200">会吸收装备者的气息</font>。
难道这就是那时我在注入力量时发生<font color="#ffd200">暴走</font>的那把武器吗？ 跟我说说到底发生了什么事。

等等。站在那里仔细听我说。 在<font color="#ffd200">使用武器之前</font>，还得再做一件事。 虽然封印解开了，但在完成那件事之前，还称不上是完整的武器。
问需要干什么。
那就是<font color="#ffd200">冶炼</font>。越是强大的武器，这一步就越重要。 你必须到<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000203$</font>去对武器进行冶炼。 如果在这之前试着使用武器，那发生的一切后果<font color="#ffd200">全部由你负责</font>。
你还不走？ 你记住了，一定要冶炼以后才能使用武器！ 去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000203$</font> 吧！快点！
你好，$MyPCName$！这段时间过得怎么样？
拿出$item:13400136$，并委托冶炼。
咦，这是……！难道你已经解开封印了吗？对了，等等……你，<font color="#ffd200">身体没事吧</font>？在来这里的时候，没发生什么事吧？
说在挥舞武器的时候差点出了大事，请他快点冶炼。
没什么事，但是$npcName:11001242[gender:0]$说在使用武器前一定要冶炼。

这个不是<font color="#ffd200">冶炼</font>就能解决的问题。 你拿来的这个武器上的气息和<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:23090005[gender:0]$</font>拥有的无限生命力的本质相同， $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$会吸收其他生命的血液为己用。 而这个武器<font color="#ffd200">会吸收装备者的气息</font>。
难道这就是那时我在注入力量时发生<font color="#ffd200">暴走</font>的那把武器吗？ 跟我说说到底发生了什么事。
说明事情的来龙去脉。
用从深沉的黑暗中聚集的<font color="#ffd200">强大气息</font>，<font color="#ffd200">让不祥的魔力封印产生裂痕</font>……？ 真是个新奇的方法。最终变成了可以装备的<font color="#ffd200">武器</font>形态……！ 但光是解开封印，好像<font color="#ffd200">并不能获得真正的力量</font>。

<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:23090005[gender:0]$</font>是超脱于普通生命循环的不灭存在。 能够<font color="#ffd200">完全控制</font>源自于他魔力的力量的方法， 会不会和他的秘密有关呢……？ 但这只是<font color="#ffd200">推测</font>，没办法确定，相关的线索又很少。

嗯，请等一下，$MyPCName$……！ 如果你要去$map:02010026$，能帮我一个忙吗？
需要帮什么忙。
说我很忙，请找其他人。
啊，真是谢谢你！ 我正在找一个人。是一个<font color="#ffd200">和我差不多年纪的女孩</font>。 个子比我稍微高一点，长头发……名字叫<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:24001807$</font>。
问和那个少女是什么关系。
反正你也要到$map:02010026$里面去，对吧？看你带着的武器就知道了。 听说最近$map:02010026$里面有很多来历不明的怪物和恶魔出现， 只有<font color="#ffd200">有能力的冒险家</font>才敢到这附近来。
我想拜托你的事情非常简单。 只要帮我在路上看看有没有一个<font color="#ffd200">和我差不多年纪的女孩</font>就行。 个子比我稍微高一点，长头发……名字叫<font color="#ffd200">卡娜</font>。
问和那个少女是什么关系。
哈哈……其实我们也只是一面之缘。 我在沙漠中遇到了沙暴，是她在我快要渴死的时候给了我水喝。 并让我躲在安全的地方，直到沙暴过去为止。 我真的非常感激她……她是我的<font color="#ffd200">救命恩人</font>。
我让她和我一起回村里来，但是她说<font color="#ffd200">有东西必须守护</font>， 之后就消失在了$map:02010026$中。那个孩子……非常沉默寡言。 她都没告诉我她的名字，我说那就<font color="#ffd200">叫你“卡娜”</font>吧。 她听完之后微笑着点了点头……后来我一直想起她，心里感觉很担心。
我很担心$npcName:24001807$，所以来到了这里。但是听说有怪物和恶魔出没…… 以我的力量，根本不敢到$map:02010026$里面去。 虽然<font color="#ffd200">隐约感觉到她会在某个地方</font>，但没办法过去。
问那个地方是哪里。

进入入口之后，往旁边走，有一条宽阔的通道。 沿着台阶爬上去，在旁边仔细寻找，可以看到一扇<font color="#ffd200">漏风的门</font>。 如果你在那里见到<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:24001807$</font>的话，请把她带出来。 如果你一个人没法把她带出来的话，请去向<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001434[gender:0]$大叔</font>求助。

<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001434[gender:0]$大叔</font>是考古学家，他正在$map:02010026$内部进行研究的。 就算$npcName:24001807$不在<font color="#ffd200">漏风的门</font>里面， 你也可以去对内部进行调查，然后把结果告诉<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001434[gender:0]$大叔</font>， 他也许可以告诉你一些有用的信息。那就拜托你了。
你是谁……？你认识我吗？ 等等，你的身体没事吧？ 你看上去像是在<font color="#ffd200">非常冷的地方</font>待过一样，嘴唇非常苍白……
我受$npcName:11001433[gender:0]$之托，去了一趟$map:02010052$。
$map:02010052$……？ 啊，那你有没有看见<font color="#ffd200">蓝色珠子</font>之类的东西？ 或者<font color="#ffd200">散发出奇异气息的人</font>……或者神兽之类……
讲述在$map:02010052$发现的少女$npcName:24001807$的情况。
我说弱不经风的$npcName:11001433[gender:0]$为什么要冒着生命危险来到这里找人， 原来还有这样的故事。 <font color="#ffd200">雪豹族</font>的神女竟然是他的<font color="#ffd200">初恋对象</font>……那个孩子真可怜。
问雪豹族的神女是什么意思。
如果<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000478$</font>是从她身上掉落的，那就几乎可以确信了。 她应该是照顾生病或受伤的神兽的神女。 <font color="#ffd200">雪豹族</font>在成长过程中会逐渐丧失人类的语言和记忆，获得神圣的力量。 不过<font color="#ffd200">据说和人类接近的话，会减缓成长速度。</font>
因此雪豹族一直与人类保持着距离。研究起来会有很多困难。 唯一的线索就是他们留在住处的这个<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000478$</font>…… 但是其中蕴含的光芒很快就会消失，所以就会更加困难。
真不知道该怎么跟$npcName:11001433[gender:0]$说。
请你告诉$npcName:11001433[gender:0]$，就说<font color="#ffd200">什么都没看到</font>。有时候遗忘是最好的良药。 ……啊，你能把<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000478$</font>交给我吗？我研究时需要用到它。 作为补偿，我会给你一笔酬劳。
$MyPCName$，你的故事……真是神奇。 是叫$npcName:24001807$吗？那个雪豹族神女于危难之中救了人类的孩子$npcName:11001433[gender:0]$， 并记住了那个孩子给自己起的名字。
拥有将整个空间全部冰冻起来的强大力量的雪豹族神女竟然还保留着 对人类的记忆……我在任何记录中都没有见到过。 如果<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000478$</font>是那个神女掉落的东西， 那将是对他们的成长和觉醒进行研究的<font color="#ffd200">重要资料</font>。
$MyPCName$，你能帮我把$item:30000478$从$map:02010052$拿回来吗？ 我一定会好好酬谢你的。
名叫<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:24001807$</font>的小神女留下的<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000478$</font> 一定会是非常有趣的研究材料。 请帮我把$item:30000478$从$map:02010052$拿回来。
<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000478$</font>拿回来了吗……！ 这冰冷的光……仿佛就像活的一样。真是太感谢了。
嗯……$MyPCName$！看你好像很闲的样子，请帮我一个忙咪。 是非常简单的事情咪。我会给你报酬的哟。
问非常简单的事情是什么。

<font color="#909090">（嘁嘁喳喳）</font>上面那位是我们<font color="#ffd200">队长</font>，你去跟他说句话。 <font color="#ffd200">“$npcName:11001084[gender:1]$和$npcName:11001355[gender:1]$的调查内容是准确无误的！”</font>你这么跟他说就行了。 怎么样？很简单吧！既然这样，那就赶紧去呀，赶紧！
说必须说明一下到底是什么事，队长才会相信。
咦，人类！没想到你还挺细心的咪～我看好你哟！ 好的咪。我来给你大致说明一下调查的内容咪。 最近在<font color="#ffd200">$map:02010047$</font>经常发生奇怪的事情咪。 那就是非常<font color="#ffd200">漫长的夜晚</font>咪。黑暗遮挡吞噬了太阳哟。

<font color="#ffd200">队长</font>、<font color="#ffd200">我</font>，还有<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001355[gender:1]$</font>想查明这一现象的原因咪。 我们三人分别进行了细致的调查，发现漫长的夜晚 会在<font color="#ffd200">残月升起的夜晚</font>或发生<font color="#ffd200">月食</font>的日子出现咪。 这还不是全部咪。在漫长的夜晚开始的时候，必定会出现一样东西哟。
<font color="#ffd200">非常巨大的影子</font>会在那个遗迹上出现咪。看上去就像鸟一样哟。 根据某些记录，在非常久远的古代曾经有个长得像<font color="#ffd200">乌鸦</font>一样的 咒术师咪。据说他可以<font color="#ffd200">自由地控制力量的流动</font>咪！！
说对那个遗迹进行调查不就行了。
但问题是我们没办法那样做哟…… 因为<font color="#ffd200">队长</font>说“必须慎重”，所以一直拖了下来咪！ 明明可以对遗迹进行调查之后再寻找其他资料，他却不听哟……
说那应该好好劝劝他。
人类……不然我怎么会拜托人类呢咪！ 我和<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001355[gender:1]$</font>都试着说服队长，但是没用咪…… 所以希望你能假扮成人类学者，告诉他<font color="#ffd200">我们说的是对的</font>哟！
人类……还没去跟我们队长说吗咪？ 快去假扮成人类学者，告诉他<font color="#ffd200">我们说的是对的</font>哟！ 我们调查的内容明明是正确的……真是急死人了咪～
人类……？有什么事吗咪？
说是路过的学者，在那片遗迹中住着一个古代咒术师。
……该不会是<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001084[gender:1]$和$npcName:11001355[gender:1]$</font>让你来的吧咪？ 人类，你看上去一点都不像学者咪……别在我面前<font color="#ffd200">装腔作势</font>哟。
<font color="#909090">(咦，他是怎么知道的！)</font>
如果是真正的学者，一定知道那个遗迹的名字叫做<font color="#ffd200">$map:02010054$</font>咪。 那是<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:24002005$的家园</font>哟。 ……呃呃，希望不是。但随着调查的深入，我就越确信咪。
人类，<font color="#ffd200">$npc:24002005$</font>非常可怕咪。 如果冒险进去调查，要是中了他的咒术该怎么办咪？ 我们虽然擅长<font color="#ffd200">侦察</font>，但不擅长<font color="#ffd200">战斗</font>咪。所以不能随便进去哟。
问为什么害怕$npc:24002005$。
$npcName:24002005$是非常古老的记录上记载的咒术师咪。 据说他原本是只活了很长时间，因此拥有了智慧的乌鸦，他非常<font color="#ffd200">渴望变成龙</font>咪。 拥有庞大、健壮的身躯，美丽的外表，高贵的举止…… 但是不管他多么努力，<font color="#ffd200">乌鸦都无法变成龙哟。</font>
$npc:24002005$感觉到了自己的<font color="#ffd200">极限</font>，因此决定寻找其他方法咪。 他开始研究<font color="#ffd200">黑咒术</font>，并因此获得了<font color="#ffd200">操纵力量流动的能力</font>哟。 他打算将龙拥有的能力夺过来，变成自己的东西咪。
但是分裂成光明和黑暗势力的<font color="#ffd200">龙之间爆发了战争</font>咪。 在龙的力量发生剧烈冲突的状态下，他无法控制力量的流动咪。 当然，也无法夺取其他人的力量，将其变成自己的东西咪。 于是$npcName:24002005$选择陷入<font color="#ffd200">沉睡</font>哟。
现在龙已经从这片土地上消失咪。力量的剧烈冲突也已经消失了哟。 因此<font color="#ffd200">$npc:24002005$</font>好像决定重新出山咪。 在没有了龙的世界上，获得龙的荣耀哟。
人类，你很擅长战斗吧哟？帮我去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02010054$</font>调查一下咪。 必须阻止$npc:24002005$重新醒来咪。 如果他开始吸取力量，世界就会被混沌笼罩哟！
人类，虽然你很擅长战斗，但我还是要叮嘱你咪。 不要一个人去咪。$npc:24002005$会操纵力量， <font color="#ffd200">独自对付会很困难</font>咪。 一定要和其他人类齐心协力哟。
人类，见到<font color="#ffd200">$npc:24002005$</font>了吗，咪？ 真的在<font color="#ffd200">$map:02010054$</font>里面吗，咪？怎么样咪？
说消灭掉了$npc:24002005$。
我说呢……！你进入$map:02010054$不久，就有一股 <font color="#ffd200">黑烟</font>冒上来咪。和遗迹的记录完全一致咪。 嗯，这么说来……事情还没有结束咪……
问是什么意思。
$npc:24002005$在遇到危险的时候，会变成其他形态逃走咪。 就算你打倒了$npc:24002005$，那也只是暂时的咪。 他逃走之后，很快又会重新出现哟。
问是不是就没有办法可以阻止他了。
那也不是咪。变换形态逃走需要消耗很多力量咪。 只要不断让他陷入危险，不断消耗他的力量， 总有一天他会<font color="#ffd200">因为力量用尽而重新陷入沉睡</font>哟。
人类，辛苦你了咪。 这是一点小小的报答，请你收下哟！
竟然在不是残月的时候出现……真奇怪咪。 生命力真是顽强咪。到底是怎么回事哟……？
问是不是在说$npcName:24002005$。
没错咪。又有人发现在<font color="#ffd200">$map:02010054$</font>有黑影晃动咪。 人类，你能再去察看一下<font color="#ffd200">$npc:24002005$</font>的动态吗，咪？ 他的力量变得越强，就会有更大的危险接踵而至咪。 拜托你了哟！
人类，虽然上次我也说过，但我还是要再叮嘱一遍咪。 不要一个人去咪。$npc:24002005$会操纵力量， <font color="#ffd200">独自对付会很困难</font>咪。 一定要和其他人类齐心协力哟。
人类，和<font color="#ffd200">$npc:24002005$</font>战斗，一定很辛苦吧咪。 这是一点小小的报答，请你收下哟！
Oh dear, where did she disappear to? We're toast if the general finds out...
$MyPCName$... you're level $MyPCLevel$, right? That's plenty strong enough to help out a meerkat in trouble.
<font color="#909090">(Three meerkats stare at you intently. It's a little awkward.)</font>
We're the Meerkat Patrol, and we've always been a three-kat team. But we've had a lot more to do lately, which led us to add a fourth. That's $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$.
Nice. So, where is she?
I was getting to that! She's gone missing! Since she's new, I wanted to see how she could perform on her own. So I sent her to patrol $map:02010026$... and she never came back.
Wouldn't it be against the rules to give solo orders like that?
Shh! Shh! That's a secret! Don't say that out loud! If the other meerkats tell the leader I did that, I'm done for! That's I need you to look for her in secret.

$MyPCName$, please search $map:02010026$ for any sign of $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$. If I go looking for her myself, it's going to raise all kinds of uncomfortable questions about why $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$ was out there alone.

$npcName:11001412[gender:1]$ is small but she knows how to make plenty of noise. She really likes flowers, so you might find her admiring the flowerpots out there. $map:02010026$ has tons of flowerpots, if you hadn't noticed.
You're back. Did you find $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$? Where is she?
Nope, all I found was this $item:30000496$.
Huh? This smell... Hm. Thank you, human. That will be all.
What? No, we need to go and rescue $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$!
There's no need for that. She's definitely safe, just laying low somewhere. I just need to figure out what to tell the leader...
How can you say that just from sniffing some fur?

Excuse me? Are you going to humansplain to me about my nose? And my ways? I know by scent that $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$ collapsed from illness, and our allies in $map:02010026$ rescued her. So, as I said, that will be all.
What is this, human? Stay out of our affairs. I never took you for such a nosy creature.
But what if $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$ was eaten by a monster?
Seriously? How incompetent do you think we are? If anyone ever got eaten on our watch, we'd be disbanded in an instant. I'm telling you, she's safe and sound at the base.
A leader who doesn't look after their followers is no leader.

Good thing I didn't ask you then, human. You simply don't understand our ways. But if you continue to insist on this foolishness, perhaps I can profit from it. I'll make you a bet. I bet my belt that $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$ is in $map:02010006$ right now. This is rare silk from $map:02010002$! It's really expensive!
You really so confident, $npcName:11001406$?
Of course I'm confident. Go to $map:02010006$ and you'll see $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$, completely untouched. We've got $map:02010033$ completely under control.
Isn't that funny? Our all-important base, right there without anyone noticing. Just sitting there, next to a small lake in the desert, hidden beneath the three great trees...
A human? How did you find this place?
I made a bet with $npcName:11001406$, and he spilled the beans.
Wait, you made a bet with a meerkat? Hee hee hee, you're a funny one!
The mighty members of the Meerkat Patrol help keep order on Karkar Island. We gather information about current events and use that to thwart any plots which could disturb the peace.
Yeah, it's great! $npcName:11001406$ seems so proud of the patrol's accomplishments.
Now that you mention it, you made a bet with $npcName:11001406$, didn't you? What's that all about?
Oh, he wanted to bet that $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$ is safe and sound at base.

Ah. Well, $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$ collapsed in $map:02010026$. Our members found her behind a rose flowerpot and brought her back. She's not in the best shape, but she is safe now. Go see her if you're curious.

Honestly, I'm pretty disappointed in $npcName:11001406$ over this. Sending $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$ out alone like that isn't something a responsible leader does. I'm sure $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$ could use some sympathy after her ordeal.
Huh...? Who are you?
Are you okay?

I've definitely been better. I tried to tell the chief I was in pain, but he wouldn't listen. Said it was my duty as a meerkat to support the patrol. Didn't seem to matter that I'd been feeling bad for a week and a half...
Where does it hurt?
It's my stomach. I don't know why, but I can't... y'know... go. To the bathroom.
Yikes! You poor dear...
Thanks. I hope my pipes will finally clear out soon! I should probably get some rest now. Don't be a stranger.
You... Where are you from?
I'm from Maple Island.
I'm from Calibre Island.
Who's asking?
Maple Island? Never heard of it. Is the kid from there too? You know, the girl with the umbrella and the weird thing on her head.
Oh, you must be talking about $npcName:11000735[gender:1]$.
Calibre Island? Never heard of it. Is the kid from there too? You know, the girl with the umbrella and the weird thing on her head.
Oh, you must be talking about $npcName:11000735[gender:1]$.
Whoa there buddy, no need to get steamed. I'm trying to figure out where that girl is from. You know, the one with the umbrella and the weird thing on her head.
Oh, you must be talking about $npcName:11000735[gender:1]$.
So do you know where she is now? Can you get her over here? There's something I want to ask her.
Err, I'm not sure about that...
Well then what are you good for? Fine, you don't want to help, that's up to you. I just want to know more abou that golden aura I felt on her.
Who are you, anyway?
You probably already know, but I'm not from around here. I was engulfed by a blinding stream of light, and when it cleared I found myself alone in this place.

What's frustrating is how I can't remember anything. Not even my name. This flower is the only thing that came with me... And it reminds me of a name when I look at it. $npcName:11001430[gender:0]$... Maybe that's my name. Maybe not.

Even without my memories, I want to find a way back to my home. Who knows, that might be the key to remembering everything I've forgotten. And now that you know my secret, I think it's only fair that you help me.
(You can't help but note how sarcastic he sounds.)

Don't misunderstand me. I intend to help you, too. For now, let me direct you to someone even more sarcastic than me. You should talk to the sunset fox, because he was there when I appeared in this world.

I asked him to tell me what happened on that day, but for some reason he's holding out on me. You might have more luck, I think. If he pretends to not understand human language, call him $npcName:11001431[gender:0]$.
If that funky fox pretends he can't understand you, call him $npcName:11001431[gender:0]$. That should get his attention.
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001431[gender:0]$ is watching you. Just as $npcName:11001430[gender:0]$ warned, he's pretending he doesn't understand you.)</font>
Ahem! Are you $npcName:11001431[gender:0]$?
What? What is this? Did $npcName:11001430[gender:0]$ send you?
What a strange person he is. Why didn't he come talk himself? And what do you want?
What happened the day that $npcName:11001430[gender:0]$ appeared?
First of all, it was at night. It was a perfectly normal night, too. But then, the sky started to spin and there was a bright light. The light came down, down, down, like a shooting star.

I was so surprised, I couldn't move. I just stood there and stared. But then the ground started to shake, so I ran over to where the light fell. I found $npcName:11001430[gender:0]$, surrounded by a blue light.
Interesting. Did you notice anything else unusual?

Well... To be honest, everything seemed too clean. No hole, no dirt, no bits of space rock, nothing! If something fell from the night sky, it should leave a hole or bits, right? Whatever happened must have been entirely magical.
I told him all this already, you know. He refused to believe me, I don't know why. At least now he can hear it from someone else. And tell him not to call me that name anymore.
To be fair, it's a really nice name. $npcName:11001431[gender:0]$!
He gave me that name! We sunset foxes live free here in the desert and have no need for names.
There, I said my piece. Go back to $npcName:11001430[gender:0]$ and tell him to get over it already.
I see you're back. So, what did $npcName:11001431[gender:0]$ say?
You've probably heard this before, but $npcName:11001431[gender:0]$ said...
Well, that's more detail than what he told me. I think there might be a clue there...
I didn't have a mark on me that day. And there weren't any traces of whatever brought me here, either. The only clue I have is that blue light that surrounded me.
Something that powerful couldn't have left absolutely no trace. Perhaps the creatures in this area still bear its mark.

Do you see those round things? And the long ones? The round ones are $npcNamePlural:21000645$ and the long ones are $npcNamePlural:21000424$. They hold a lot of food and water in their bodies to help them survive in the desert, and that means they should still be holding clues to my arrival.
I need those clues if I'm ever to have a chance at getting home. Please bring me whatever you can find on those creatures. Or in, I suppose.
Obviously you'll need to beat those creatures down to examine them as closely as is necessary.
Did you uncover anything?
I beat up tons of those critters, and didn't find a thing.
That's not such a big deal. One thing I didn't mention was how those monsters stung me when I first ended up here. I was hoping you'd sort them out for me.
You were just using me to get petty revenge?!
No, not really. I'm a big believer in multi-tasking. Now, I have something to show you. A payment, of sorts.

There are plenty of mysteries to unravel in $map:02010047$. More than a few historians have cataloged the clues left behind, and I've gathered as many of their discoveries as I could in my research journal.
I'd very much like to see that.

Of course. I'm bringing it up because I'd like you to review it. The problem is that I've hidden it, and I can't leave this spot while I'm making observations. You'll have to find it yourself, under the table.
Uh... What table?
If it was that obvious, it wouldn't be hidden, would it? I think you can find something like that.
Just tell me where you hid it.
I'm getting tired of these games!
I have a place where I keep the materials I collect. I call it $map:02010007$. It's some distance from here. Head south and look for the entrance.

I don't play games. I just need to know you can keep up with me. I have a place where I keep the materials I collect. I call it $map:02010007$. It's some distance from here. Head south and look for the entrance.
You can't find $map:02010007$? I suppose I hid it pretty well, then. Head south and look carefully. Don't go too far, it's definitely in $map:02010047$.
Looks like you read it. Do you understand now?
I couldn't read it, let alone understand it!
<font color="#909090">($npc:11001430[gender:0]$ gives you a gentle look of pity.)</font> $MyPCName$... You can't read? Shouldn't have paid more attention in school.
It's in a different language, you...!
Oh, right... I wrote it in my language. Guess I can't blame you for that. Hehe. I'll read it to you. Give it here.
This passage was inscribed in an ancient language on the stones here. I witnessed many strange things in the moonlight, and I've written it all down. Are you ready?
Go ahead.
"As for the relic, gift of the divine's sacrifice, a benevolent light will remain here for those who must overcome a great crisis."

"The great power is given only to those who are pure, just, and worthy. Those selected must first have inherited the golden memory. They must also recall the value and significance of the noble sacrifice."

"Second, the worthy must understand the great power if they wish to control it. If the worthy cannot nurture the seed of light to blossom in this corrupt world, then the power will be lost. When the seed blossoms, the light shall shine upon a path to another world and permit the worthy to pass on to their just reward. "
Brace yourself, if you dare to approach.
It's obviously about a relic that opens portals.
Read it again.

Spot on. That's what caught my attention when I was doing my research. And that's why I've been searching for someone with a unique wavelength. I've been on their trail, and finally narrowed it down to a certain child with a golden aura. That's $npcName:11000735[gender:1]$, the child you found.
The power surrounding her was entirely different from the others of our world. It might be that of the relic of light... which means if I can tap into it, I might be able to go back.
Since you were with $npcName:11000735[gender:1]$, I thought you would help me turn up some clues. But you turned out to be rather wary of me.
So why the story if you already knew?
I thought you could be my... friend. You have a good heart, and I thought if you heard my story, you'd care about my situation.
Oh! Well, we can be friends if you like.

Fine. Let's be friends. So, friend, can I make a request? $npcName:11001431[gender:0]$ needs a favor but I'm busy right now. If you've got the time, maybe you could help $npcName:11001431[gender:0]$ in my place?
It won't be hard. $npcName:11001431[gender:0]$'s favors are always really simple. But it's okay if you're busy. Just ask what it is. Thanks, friend.
You. Don't tell me he sent you again. What is it now?
I'm here to do you a favor, in place of $npcName:11001430[gender:0]$.
What...?
Did you have any idea what you'd be asked when you agreed to this? Did he explain anything to you, $MyPCName$?
He said it would be simple.
He's my friend, so I'm willing to help with anything.
Right. Well... It is simple. I need someone to water the starflowers that have bloomed all over $map:02010047$. But to do that, you'll have to prepare a few things first.

Start with 5 $itemPlural:30000498$. You can get it by sifting through the purple star sands scattered at the edge of $map:02010047$. Just watch your step. After that, get 10 $itemPlural:30000499$ from $npcName:21000645$ out there. You'll have to check carefully after you defeat each $npcName:21000645$... they don't all carry what we need.

Friend, huh... Yeah, I think I have a general idea of what he told you. Alright, all I need is for you to water the starflowers. Care for them just as you would your beloved friend... just with more water. Oh, and you'll need a few items to do it right.

Start with 5 $itemPlural:30000498$. You can get it by sifting through the purple star sands scattered at the edge of $map:02010047$. Just watch your step. After that, get 10 $itemPlural:30000499$ from $npcName:21000645$ out there. You'll have to check carefully after you defeat each $npcName:21000645$... they don't all carry what we need.

Get $itemPlural:30000498$ from the star sands on the edge of $map:02010047$. Just watch your step. After that, get $itemPlural:30000499$ from $npcName:21000645$ out there. Bring everything back to me once you're done.
Let's see... Yep, that's everything. Heh, is this the power of friendship? On to the next step, then.
Here, this is what I needed those items for. This $item:30000500$ is the perfect tool for brightening up those lonely starflowers.
Come back after you water five lonely starflowers. I'd like the $item:30000500$</font> back when you're done, too.
What's wrong? Is there a problem?
I lost the $item:30000500$...
Where can I find these starflowers?
Wow... not cool. I worked hard on that, y'know? Here. I'll give you this spare one. You better not lose this one!
$MyPCName$... Did you check your bag? Even I can tell you still have it. Now, you have work to do.
You really need to straighten up your bag first. I can't give you anything if it's full.
Head a little ways southwest. Remember, you're looking for lonely starflowers, meaning ones that bloom alone. Not the ones in groups of four.
Did you see the lonely starflowers bloom? Nice, isn't it?
Yeah! I never thought the one starflower would become four...
I... what? That's... not possible. Did you do something with $npcName:11001430[gender:0]$ before coming here?
We just shook hands. We're good friends now.
So that's it. He put magic in your hands. $item:30000498$ can't be dug up by anyone, and the $item:30000500$ has an enchantment on it that makes it too heavy for most folks to lift.

But he has magic and can easily use the power of the stars. I told him to water the starflower, but he found a way out of it. That flower he's always holding... It's withering. Maybe because it's from a different land, but nothing could perk it up.

Until that flower is saved, he wasn't willing to help any of the others. I think he wants to return to his home just to save that flower. I guess he can't be that bad of a guy. He must've put the magic in your hands that helped the starflowers bloom.
You really are a good friend to $npcName:11001430[gender:0]$</font>, $MyPCName$. I'd like to count you as a friend as well.
The Meerkat Patrol is always working to improve, both individually and as a team. You see our dashing bronze fur? Underneath that is all muscle.
Is that all muscle in your jowls, too?
Oh, silly human! You still don't understand the meerkat way. Our special training gives us a strong body AND adorable cheeks! It's win-win! You can't tell me you don't want some of this.
Okay, you got me. What's your secret?
The key, as it turns out, is patience. You need the tenacity to see your goals to the end! Time to prove your steady will, human.
Tsk tsk, human. Where is your patience? Surely even you can complete the most basic training! Finish what you started!
How was that? Didn't you feel your muscles awakening? Keep at it, $MyPCName$, and you'll have the lithe body of a meerkat in no time!
We meerkats spend most of our time patrolling and observing from high places. That doesn't mean we're softies, mind you. When things get serious, we have to lay down some serious hurt.
Anyone in the patrol needs to be able to fight, and I'm pretty sure you do too! If you want to train your combat skills, go out to $map:02010033$ and battle the monsters there.
Human, what's taking so long? This is one of our most basic courses. If you can't do this, you can't hope to ever measure up to a meerkat!
Very nice, human! I'm starting to see you differently. As... useful.
One of the valuable skills our meerkats have to master is the art of conversation. Gathering information from the people you talk to is key, no matter who you're dealing with.

There's been a rumor that a ghost has shown up in $map:02010033$. $MyPCName$, I want you to find that ghost and talk to it. Find out everything you can from it. If you bring me enough info from your meeting, you pass this test.
Heh heh... Are you afraid of the ghost? It's fine if you are. I wouldn't expect a human to be as brave as a meerkat. And if you think I'm wrong, maybe you should find yourself a ghost.
Hee hee hee... You've got guts, human. Aren't you scared of me?
Honestly, I think you're a meerkat in a costume.
I'm not scared, I'm angry! Let's fight!
What are you talking about? I'm no meerkat! Look at me, I'm $npcName:11001407[gender:0]$! I'm the great and terrible ghost who conquered this desert, hee hee hee!
You're definitely a meerkat.
Hey, is that a giant eagle coming this way?
Fine! I accept your challenge! What game shall we play?
No games. I want an argument.
I propose a one-legged fight!
Are you even listening? I'm not a meerkat! I'm $npcName:11001407[gender:0]$! How many times do I need to remind you? Hee hee hee!
Hey, is that a giant eagle coming this way?
My, that's a tasty insect in the water there.

E-eagle? No! I need to hide! Hide me!
<font color="#909090">(Yep, that's definitely a meerkat.)</font>
I'm pretty sure I win this round.
You're such a strange human. Not afraid of ghosts? Not even of a big, spooky ghost in these dark, spooky ruins?
You're definitely a meerkat.
One-legged fight? Hee hee hee... You messed up, human. I never skip leg day! Let's do this!
What exactly does a ghost do on leg day?
Really? Let me have it, then! Ooh, I'm so hungry.
Since when do ghosts eat?
Argh... You're pretty smart for a human. Alright, you got me. I'm a meerkat. And I owe you a reward.
啊，这不是$MyPCName$吗！请过来一下。 不久前我听到了一件<font color="#ffd200">奇怪的事</font>，觉得必须告诉你。
是有关$npc:23090005[gender:0]$的武器的事情吗？
有点不太好说……不过是件很有意思的事。 不久前，有一个自称来自<font color="#ffd200">其他大陆</font>的<font color="#ffd200">咒术师</font>来到了这里。 他自我介绍说是研究恶魔的人，问这里的铁匠们 有没有听说过一个<font color="#ffd200">围绕着灼热气息的强大恶魔</font>。
我想起了被你打败的那个名叫<font color="#ffd200">$npc:23090005[gender:0]$</font>的恶魔， 于是便把从你那里听到的故事告诉了他，结果他表现出很大的兴趣， 于是我告诉他说$npcName:23090005[gender:0]$就居住在<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000200$</font>的某个地方。
他非常高兴，之后就到$map:02000200$去了。 离开的时候，他留下了一句很有意思的话。 说<font color="#ffd200">“要进入恶魔的意识，寻找解开诅咒的方法”</font>。
问那是什么意思。
他说根据古代的记录，为了战胜拥有强大力量的恶魔， 必须趁那股力量变弱的瞬间，<font color="#ffd200">进入恶魔的意识</font>。 如果能在意识深处了解到恶魔的本质，不仅能找到恶魔的弱点， 还能知道<font color="#ffd200">解开恶魔施加的诅咒的方法</font>。
如果那个咒术师说的是真的，那你拥有的那把武器上的<font color="#ffd200">奇怪诅咒</font> 应该也有办法可以解开。怎么样？反正也没什么损失……不想试试看吗？
问怎么才能进入恶魔的意识。
最好直接去问问那个咒术师。 他刚去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000200$</font>还没多久，你快去看看吧。 他的名字叫<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001485[gender:0]$</font>。
那个名叫<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001485[gender:0]$</font>的咒术师到<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000200$</font>去了。 他紧紧地裹着斗篷，整个人感觉非常奇怪。 你到<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000200$</font>去找找看吧。
……明明发出了声音。好像有什么东西发生了变化。 真遗憾。这里如果不是这么暗的话……！ 这可怕的<font color="#ffd200">夜盲症</font>，就算变成了怪物的样子，还是……
这个恶魔……<font color="#ffd200">$npc:23090005[gender:0]$</font>…… 也许就是这个家伙<font color="#ffd200">把我变成了这个样子</font>…… 我不能就这样回去，不该是这样的……！
呼唤$npc:11001485[gender:0]$的名字。
嗯？谁在那里？ 到底是谁？怎么会知道<font color="#ffd200">我的名字</font>？
啊，这不是$MyPCName$吗！请过来一下。 不久前我听到了一件<font color="#ffd200">奇怪的事</font>，觉得必须告诉你。
是有关$npc:23090005[gender:0]$的武器的事情吗？
有点不太好说……不过是件很有意思的事。 不久前，有一个自称来自<font color="#ffd200">其他大陆</font>的<font color="#ffd200">咒术师</font>来到了这里。 他自我介绍说是研究恶魔的人，问这里的铁匠们 有没有听说过一个<font color="#ffd200">围绕着灼热气息的强大恶魔</font>。
我想起了被你打败的那个名叫<font color="#ffd200">$npc:23090005[gender:0]$</font>的恶魔， 于是便把从你那里听到的故事告诉了他，结果他表现出很大的兴趣， 于是我告诉他说$npcName:23090005[gender:0]$就居住在<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000200$</font>的某个地方。
他非常高兴，之后就到$map:02000200$去了。 离开的时候，他留下了一句很有意思的话。 说<font color="#ffd200">“要进入恶魔的意识，寻找解开诅咒的方法”</font>。
问那是什么意思。
他说根据古代的记录，为了战胜拥有强大力量的恶魔， 必须趁那股力量变弱的瞬间，<font color="#ffd200">进入恶魔的意识</font>。 如果能在意识深处了解到恶魔的本质，不仅能找到恶魔的弱点， 还能知道<font color="#ffd200">解开恶魔施加的诅咒的方法</font>。
如果那个咒术师说的是真的，那你拥有的那把武器上的<font color="#ffd200">奇怪诅咒</font> 应该也有办法可以解开。怎么样？反正也没什么损失……不想试试看吗？
问怎么才能进入恶魔的意识。
最好直接去问问那个咒术师。 他刚去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000200$</font>还没多久，你快去看看吧。 他的名字叫<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001485[gender:0]$</font>。
那个名叫<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001485[gender:0]$</font>的咒术师到<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000200$</font>去了。 他紧紧地裹着斗篷，整个人感觉非常奇怪。 你到<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000200$</font>去找找看吧。
……明明发出了声音。好像有什么东西发生了变化。 真遗憾。这里如果不是这么暗的话……！ 这可怕的<font color="#ffd200">夜盲症</font>，就算变成了怪物的样子，还是……
这个恶魔……<font color="#ffd200">$npc:23090005[gender:0]$</font>…… 也许就是这个家伙<font color="#ffd200">把我变成了这个样子</font>…… 我不能就这样回去，不该是这样的……！
呼唤$npc:11001485[gender:0]$的名字。
嗯？谁在那里？ 到底是谁？怎么会知道<font color="#ffd200">我的名字</font>？
啊，这不是$MyPCName$吗！请过来一下。 不久前我听到了一件<font color="#ffd200">奇怪的事</font>，觉得必须告诉你。
是有关$npc:23090005[gender:0]$的武器的事情吗？
有点不太好说……不过是件很有意思的事。 不久前，有一个自称来自<font color="#ffd200">其他大陆</font>的<font color="#ffd200">咒术师</font>来到了这里。 他自我介绍说是研究恶魔的人，问这里的铁匠们 有没有听说过一个<font color="#ffd200">围绕着灼热气息的强大恶魔</font>。
我想起了被你打败的那个名叫<font color="#ffd200">$npc:23090005[gender:0]$</font>的恶魔， 于是便把从你那里听到的故事告诉了他，结果他表现出很大的兴趣， 于是我告诉他说$npcName:23090005[gender:0]$就居住在<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000200$</font>的某个地方。
他非常高兴，之后就到$map:02000200$去了。 离开的时候，他留下了一句很有意思的话。 说<font color="#ffd200">“要进入恶魔的意识，寻找解开诅咒的方法”</font>。
问那是什么意思。
他说根据古代的记录，为了战胜拥有强大力量的恶魔， 必须趁那股力量变弱的瞬间，<font color="#ffd200">进入恶魔的意识</font>。 如果能在意识深处了解到恶魔的本质，不仅能找到恶魔的弱点， 还能知道<font color="#ffd200">解开恶魔施加的诅咒的方法</font>。
如果那个咒术师说的是真的，那你拥有的那把武器上的<font color="#ffd200">奇怪诅咒</font> 应该也有办法可以解开。怎么样？反正也没什么损失……不想试试看吗？

他非常高兴，之后就到$map:02000200$去了。 离开的时候，他留下了一句很有意思的话。 说<font color="#ffd200">“要进入恶魔的意识，寻找解开诅咒的方法”</font>。
问那是什么意思。
他说根据古代的记录，为了战胜拥有强大力量的恶魔， 必须趁那股力量变弱的瞬间，<font color="#ffd200">进入恶魔的意识</font>。 如果能在意识深处了解到恶魔的本质，不仅能找到恶魔的弱点， 还能知道<font color="#ffd200">解开恶魔施加的诅咒的方法</font>。
如果那个咒术师说的是真的，那你拥有的那把武器上的<font color="#ffd200">奇怪诅咒</font> 应该也有办法可以解开。怎么样？反正也没什么损失……不想试试看吗？
问怎么才能进入恶魔的意识。
最好直接去问问那个咒术师。 他刚去<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000200$</font>还没多久，你快去看看吧。 他的名字叫<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001485[gender:0]$</font>。
那个名叫<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001485[gender:0]$</font>的咒术师到<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000200$</font>去了。 他紧紧地裹着斗篷，整个人感觉非常奇怪。 你到<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000200$</font>去找找看吧。
……明明发出了声音。好像有什么东西发生了变化。 真遗憾。这里如果不是这么暗的话……！ 这可怕的<font color="#ffd200">夜盲症</font>，就算变成了怪物的样子，还是……
这个恶魔……<font color="#ffd200">$npc:23090005[gender:0]$</font>…… 也许就是这个家伙<font color="#ffd200">把我变成了这个样子</font>…… 我不能就这样回去，不该是这样的……！
呼唤$npc:11001485[gender:0]$的名字。
嗯？谁在那里？ 到底是谁？怎么会知道<font color="#ffd200">我的名字</font>？
啊，这不是$MyPCName$吗！请过来一下。 不久前我听到了一件<font color="#ffd200">奇怪的事</font>，觉得必须告诉你。

拿出$item:13200043$的同时询问解除诅咒的方法。
咦……！这可怕的诅咒又是怎么回事？ 难道和那个名叫<font color="#ffd200">$npc:23090005[gender:0]$</font>的恶魔有什么关系吗？就是住在这里的那个？
可以进入$npc:23090005[gender:0]$的意识，解开这件武器的诅咒吗？
虽然不知道你是在哪里捡到的……是的，没错。 如果能进入施加诅咒的恶魔的意识，了解他的本质的话， 就能轻松地解开<font color="#ffd200">恶魔的诅咒</font>。古代的记录中是这么说的。
怎样才能进入$npc:23090005[gender:0]$的意识呢？

对方是拥有强大力量的恶魔，不会轻易让人潜入自己的意识。 必须寻找那个<font color="#ffd200">恶魔力量变弱的时候</font>，但每个恶魔都各不相同。 有的会在月食时变弱，有的会在将力量分给继承者之后，或者在白夜持续的时候变弱。 <font color="#ffd200">最快的方法</font>是用强大的攻击<font color="#ffd200">将其打倒后</font>，再寻找机会进入意识。
如果你能打倒$npc:23090005[gender:0]$，<font color="#ffd200">就再去试试看。</font>打倒那个家伙之后，在周围仔细寻找。 其实我在这里到处翻找过了……不知道从何时开始，从深处某个地方 吹来的腥风停止了。也许<font color="#ffd200">和之前会有所不同。</font>
如果你进入了$npc:23090005[gender:0]$的意识，希望你能跟我仔细讲讲那里的风景。 事实上，我是在对古代遗迹进行调查的时候变成这副模样的。 好像是因为<font color="#ffd200">恶魔的诅咒</font>，但我却不知道是哪个恶魔干的。 为了找到他，我来到了这个大陆……虽然研究了很多东西，但还是没能找到答案。
啊，那把武器你最好带去。 解开恶魔诅咒的线索可能是任何形态。 如果没把武器带去，也许会后悔的。
如果你进入了$npc:23090005[gender:0]$的意识，一定要带好那把武器。 解开恶魔诅咒的线索可能是任何形态。 如果没把武器带去，也许会后悔的。

问是什么事。

是的，有，有！有一件非常难办的事。 不久前我去参加$map:02000036$商人协会聚会的时候，跟别人聊起了<font color="#ffd200">我弟弟的事情</font>。他叫<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000167[gender:0]$</font>～现在正在$map:02000285$做生意。 不过以前他是个非常厉害的<font color="#ffd200">猎人</font>。只要“砰”地一声，怪物就“啪叽”一声倒下了！
但是突然<font color="#ffd200">有个女人</font>问我和弟弟亲不亲密。我回答她说非常亲密，只要是我说的话，他都会听。 后来那个女人<font color="#ffd200">让我拜托弟弟去消灭$map:02000006$的怪物</font>。
说如果弟弟的打猎本事很好的话，让他去不就行了。
所以我去找他……但是却被欧珂骂了一顿。 她说我弟弟在当猎人的时候不知道受了多少伤，怎么又去揽下这种事情…… 都是我不好，我把这件事给忘了。 为了弟弟的健康和安全，欧珂禁止他再去打猎……
所以……我想去跟那个女人说，这件事就这样算了。 但是她一直紧锁着眉头……想到她那恳切的表情， 我实在没办法当面说出那样的话。
$MyPCName$，听说你人很好，口才也很好。 你能帮我去跟那个女人说说，<font color="#ffd200">这件事就这样算了</font>，可以吗？ 那个女人是<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000270[gender:1]$</font>，在$map:02000036$$map:02000286$出售园艺物品。

转述$npc:11001536[gender:1]$的情况，表示希望这件事就这样算了。
啊……是吗。那个阿姨，就会吹牛…… 这可怎么办呢？今天又睡不好了……
其实……因为<font color="#ffd200">晚上传来的怪物叫声</font>，我女儿整晚都睡不着觉。 每天晚上她都会被吓醒，害怕得直哭……我又没钱搬家，所以很为难。 我希望她能好好睡一觉，所以才找人帮忙。
$MyPCName$，有时间的话，你能帮我去教训一下<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000006$的怪物</font>吗？ 消灭掉<font color="#ffd200">20个</font>左右的话，应该就会安静一些了…… 我还特地准备了礼物，准备送给那个阿姨。 如果你能帮我消灭掉怪物，我就把它送给你。
$MyPCName$，有时间的话，你能帮我去教训一下<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000006$的怪物</font>吗？ 消灭掉<font color="#ffd200">20个</font>左右的话，应该就会安静一些了…… 我还特地准备了礼物，准备送给那个阿姨。 如果你能帮我消灭掉怪物，我就把它送给你。

$MyPCName$，有时间的话，你能帮帮我吗？ 有件对我来说非常重要的事……但我必须在这里打工，实在没有办法走开。 这次说不定可以治好<font color="#ffd200">我弟弟的病</font>……
你先说说是什么事吧。
不久前，我从客人那里听说了一件神奇的事。 据说在<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000006$</font>的某个地方，有个名叫<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000074$</font>的地方。 那里生长着<font color="#ffd200">可以治愈百病的药草</font>。
那是研究药草学的古怪魔法师经常去的小洞穴。 他好像在里面栽培了什么东西，但却不愿意告诉我。 如果那里真的有神奇的草药的话……我弟弟也许就能好起来……
我弟弟患有原因不明的罕见的<font color="#ffd200">不治之症</font>…… 只要有任何一点希望，我都想试试看。 你能到<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000074$</font>去，看看有没有<font color="#ffd200">药草</font>之类的东西吗？
你能到<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000074$</font>去，看看有没有<font color="#ffd200">药草</font>之类的东西吗？ 只要有任何一点希望能治好弟弟的病，我都想试试看……
啊，$MyPCName$！你回来啦！ 怎么样？找到什么了吗？
只……只有这个吗？ 最近一段时间没看见那个魔法师……难道他种的东西全都干死了吗……？ 不过……还是得拿去给医生看看。谢谢你。
Wait, wait, hold the phone... Where the heck did you get this? No wonder $npcName:11001212[gender:0]$ sent you to me... do you even know what you have here? What's the story? Come on, out with it!
Well, it all started after I beat $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$...

Ah. Ahhhh. So. You tried to purify your prize from defeating $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$, going so far as to use $item:30000421$, but in the end all you had to show for it was cursed junk. Do I have this right?
That's right.

Ha ha ha! Well, it's a good thing you found me. I've been applying a scientific approach to studying the darkness here, treating it as a waveform instead of a force, entity, or some spooky gooey thing like most people assume. The unsettling aura your weapon has here emits a similar frequency to the power of this place. And if that's the case... I might just be able to help you.

I'll try to explain as simply as I can, so stop me if all this goes over your head. It's very scientific. Ahem. So, when two power sources meet on the same wavelength, they, uh, get into a little fight, and the big one beats up the little one until it runs home to mommy. Does that make sense?

Now, we've established that the weapon and this place have power on the same wavelength. If we could find a way to focus the energy of this place, we could use it to drive out the curse in your weapon and break its seal. The darkness'll run home to mommy, and everyone wins. Sound good?
Yeah, let's do it!
Great! Alright, so, I'll get your weapon ready for the experiment. All I need you to do, is gather up some darkness to mash into this thing.
How am I supposed to do that? A net?

A net! Ha, that's a good one. Nope, we need to head to $map:02000350$. That's... hmm, how do I explain this... like a faucet of fountain of darkness that the handle broke off of. It's nasty... Long ago, it started to spread near $map:02000023$ and $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$ and the fairies were barely able to stop it in time. Even then there were some fairies poisoned by Havi after being in $map:02000350$ too long. Like I said, nasty.

Okay, here's where it gets gross. Every day, one $item:59200180$ grows on those poisoned fairies. Inside is something called $item:30000437$, and unfortunately that's what we need. We'll need a bunch, too, if we're going to gather enough darkness to shove the other darkness out of your thing. It's all very technical, you see.
Now, there's a way into $map:02000350$ from $map:02000048$. Pass through there, look for $item:59200180$ and get the $item:30000437$ inside. And get a bunch. A whole bunch.
The entrance to $map:02000350$ is at $map:02000048$. Pass through and find enough $itemPlural:30000437$ for us to fix your weapon.
Yes, perfect! Boy, I've always wanted an assistant like you. Right, okay, I'll get everything ready for the experiment.

Hold it. We're not done yet. Well, I am, but if you want to use that weapon you most definitely are not.
Geez, what is it now?

Look at it! That thing is completely worn down from years of battle and seething evil. You try to swing it around without reforging it and it's going to snap in half or explode or something. And for a weapon like that, you'll need to travel to $map:02000203$ to reforge it. That's the only way.
You know what you need to do, right? I did the hard part, now you need to head off to $map:02000203$ and get that weapon reforged.
Good to see you, $MyPCName$! How are you doing?
Pretty good. Hey, do you think you could help me reforge this $item:15500064$?
This...! Holey moley, did you break the curse? Are you... okay? Didn't that take some harrowing deeds and descents into madness?
Nothing too mad or harrowing. Anyway, about reforging...?
Everything's cool, it's just $npcName:11001242[gender:0]$ said I should reforge it before it explodes or something.

It's not that simple... not with a weapon like this, anyway. You gotta understand, what makes that thing so powerful is the limitless life force of $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$ within it. Once it passes to another, it'll begin to draw on their life force instead. And unless they're more powerful than $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$... well, I'm sure you can see the issue.
Wait... is this the weapon that exploded after I infused it? I think I'd like an explanation here!
Okay, but there's a lotta darkness involved...

You... actually forced out the evil using a more concentrated form of evil? That's absurdly clever. And you did end up with something you could use, just not something as useful as you were expecting.
Exactly! So... how do I make it useful again?

Lucky for you, my ancestors studied the mechanics of enchanted weapons and left exhaustive notes. They explain that the power that makes these weapons so potent is actually sourced from the wielder. That means this weapon was so incredible because $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$ was using it. And that means we'll need a different method.

$npcName:23090005[gender:0]$ is both powerful and immortal, and we still don't fully understand how either of those things came to be true. If we could uncover the secrets behind that power, we might find a way to empower this weapon again.

The day I tried to infuse it, I checked every note, journal, and record I could find to understand why. I'm getting closer to the answer, especially after what you've told me... but I'm not there yet. Bear with me, and I promise you we can make this weapon legendary!

Aren't you $MyPCName$? Could I have a moment? I heard something strange not long ago and thought I should let you know.
Is it about $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$'s weapon?

It's a little vague... But it's still interesting. A shaman from a faraway land passed through here recently. He explained he was researching demons and asked if I heard the rumors of a powerful fire demon the blacksmiths of this place had been talking about.

I remembered the demon called $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$ that you defeated and told him of that. He was very interested, so I told him about the way into $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$'s lair somewhere in $map:02000200$.
He was really happy to hear that, and left for $map:02000200$ straightaway. As he was leaving, he said something I won't soon forget. He said he would remove the curse from within the demon.
What in the world are you talking about?

Look, according to the ancient records, you can enter the consciousness of a demon in moments when their power wanes. In those moments their defenses falter, and you can learn their darkest secrets. Their desires, their weaknesses, and of course, how to break their curses.
This might be the chance you need to break that curse on your weapon! What do you have to lose?
Besides my life? Fine, how do I get into a demon's head?
Huh? How should I know? The shaman said it, I didn't! He left for $map:02000200$ not so long ago, so perhaps you can catch him if you hurry. His name's $npcName:11001485[gender:0]$.
The shaman called $npcName:11001485[gender:0]$ left for $map:02000200$ not long ago. You should be able to find him around there... he has a very peculiar aura.
I'm sure I heard a sound. It seems like something has changed. Ahh, if only it wasn't so dark here! On top of all my troubles, I still have this accursed night blindness...
This demon, $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$... If he really is responsible for my misfortunes, I can't go back until I've settled the score!
$npcName:11001485[gender:0]$!
Huh? Is someone there? Who are you, and how do you know my name?

$npcName:11001485[gender:0]$!
Huh? Is someone there? Who are you, and how do you know my name?
Why would you come to this dark place? And how did you know my name? Do you serve the demon?
No way! I just want to break the curse on this here $item:15500064$.
My goodness, that is a dreadful curse. Tell me, was it placed by the demon known as $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$? The one who resides here?
Is it possible to enter $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$'s consciousness to break the curse?

I... um... Well, yes. In theory, anyway. The ancient texts describe the process of entering the consciousness and unraveling their true nature, giving the visitor power over the demon. But wait, where did you even hear about this?
No time for that now. I need to get into $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$'s head.

You could hardly have picked a trickier target. A demon that powerful isn't going to be easy to subdue, which is the first step to opening the path. You may find an advantage if you battle it during a lunar eclipse, during a ritual, or on a white night. Or you can just pound on it super hard and force open the path to its consciousness.
If you can lay $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$ low, search the area for a portal. A lot has changed about this place since I first came here, so don't assume it will be easy to find.

Now, if you do manage to enter $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$'s consciousness, I want to hear all the details. During my studies I was also cursed, leaving me in this sorry state you see before you. It's possible my nemesis is the same demon you seek to battle, and if so... well, that would be terribly convenient.

You might also want to take the cursed weapon with you. I don't know what exactly you'll need to break the curse but having the actual cursed item certainly can't hirt. Oh, and I recommend you take that weapon. You don't know what form the clues to break the demon's curse will take on. You may regret it if you don't take it.
If you enter $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$'s consciousness, keep that weapon close. You don't know what form the clues to break the demon's curse will take on.
You're back! And you're alive! Tell me, what did you see in $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$'s consciousness?
Hoo boy, where do I start...
The eternal flame... So, you broke the curse with intense heat? That's ingenius, $MyPCName$! You look like you've been through a lot, but at least it was worth it!
Speaking of which, do you think your curse is connected to $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$?

No, I'm afraid not. My curse chills me to my very bones, and it's clear that $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$'s power is rooted in fire. But I'm happy to have learned more about demonkind from your exploits.
Thank you, $MyPCName$! Be sure to fill me in on any other demons you get up close and personal with.

Well, now I do!
Just as I expected! When I saw the $item:30000419$, I felt indescribable dread in the very pit of my stomach. But there's something more to it. Something beneath the evil...
Can you be a little more precise?
I wish I could. All I can tell you is that this $item:30000419$ isn't normal.
This is all beyond my area of expertise, you see. I can speculate, if you really want me to, but if you want answers, then... I'm going to have to refer you to someone else.
Who should I ask for advice?
I haven't met him personally, but there's one of the fairfolk who's made a name for himself in the field of life magic. I believe he may be able to solve the mysteries of this $item:30000419$.
Where can I find that fairfolk?
$map:2000023$ is a place of wise men and sages. I'm certain you will be able to find $npcName:11001210[gender:0]$ there.
I thought you'd be in more of a hurry to see $npcName:11001210[gender:0]$. I wouldn't hold onto that blood any longer than you have to.
I sense a vile presence. What have you brought me?
(Show him the $item:30000419$.)
$item:30000419$...? Is this the evil presence I detected?
This is the blood of $npcName:23190005[gender:0]$.
Incredible... All life must return to nature. That is the law of mortality that binds us all. But somehow this blood exists in defiance of that law...
Eternal life that rejects the laws of mortality...? No. No, there's something very wrong with this...
You don't say.
I am beginning to understand. The $item:30000419$ is infused with the life force of many different creatures. Somehow, that's allowing it to resist the laws of nature and mortality.
But that's not all. There is also an intense malice in the very core of the blood. Enough malice to shatter a normal human mind.
But there's... there's something else, buried even deeper. It's barely perceptible, but it's powerful. Frighteningly powerful...

May I hold onto this for a moment? The power at the very core of the blood is powerful, but I sense no evil in it. If I can purify this blood of its malice, we may be able to learn the nature of this power.

May I hold onto this for a moment? The power at the very core of the blood is powerful, but I sense no evil in it. If I can purify this blood of its malice, we may be able to learn the nature of this power.
May I attempt to purify the $item:30000420$?
(Hand the $item:30000420$ to him.)
It is said that $npcName:23190005[gender:0]$ never stops beating. I can certainly see why. The $item:30000420$ within this blood is what powers it...
So the source of his power... isn't evil?
That's right. Even in this small particle of $item:30000420$, I see a wonder I've never before encountered.
If one were to gather enough of these fragments, to merge them into a complete form... Well, anything could happen. You may have the $item:30000420$ now.

One concern I should warn you about. This $item:30000420$ is but a fragment. But were you to perfect it, it would become a whirling source of endless magic. It would be powerful, yes, but it would break the laws of nature. Would that make it good... or evil?
What matters is how it's used.

Hmm... When a new life is born, an old life returns to the earth. This is the balance of nature. Something like $item:30000420$, which only creates power and never consumes it... That would be like a world of birth without death. Such a thing cannot be sustained.
Excess leads to imbalance. An ever-expanding power may be useful at first, but it could well go out of control and consume us all.
So there's no way to safely use it?
I don't think... Wait. Yes, perhaps Harcha could do it...
Harcha who?

He is a blacksmith at $map:2000203$. A friend of mine. I met him while I was researching the possibility of life regeneration through mineral... That is neither here nor there. His family has a special smithing technique that is of particular interest to us.
I'm listening.

He said he was studying to use this technique to imbue a weapon with potent magic. Magic more powerful than anything the enchanters of the day had. The secret was balance... His ancestors had a method of balancing powerful magic so that it wouldn't run rampant.
We could use that balance to control this power!
Presumably we could, but he hadn't yet perfected the technique when I last spoke to him. It seems there was a certain mineral that he couldn't find anywhere.

That was some time ago. Maybe he's figured it out by now. Either way, I believe Harcha is your best bet at turning the $item:30000420$ to a useful purpose. Why don't you seek him out at $map:2000203$?
I believe Harcha is your best bet at turning the $item:30000420$ to a useful purpose. Why don't you seek him out at $map:2000203$?
Sorry. I don't do custom orders.
Do you know where I can find Harcha?
Do I? Harcha was my great-granddad!
I wonder why someone'd send you to find Harcha. It's been decades since he quit smithing...
Did he ever figure out how to balance magic in a weapon?
Not many people knew about his research. He had theories, but the old man never did manage to make such a weapon. I've got some ideas of my own, and I even have some leads...
Such as...?
There's a mineral called $item:30000421$ that's supposedly sops up unstable magic like a sponge. I hear they use it to clean curses off the land and such.
If I had some of that, I bet I could finish my great-grandad's work.

Problem is, you can't get it anywhere in Victoria Island. There just aren't any deposits here. And even if I did have it, $item:30000421$ is just the stabilizing agent. Without a source of power to stabilize, it's not much good.
(Show him the infinite essence.)
Wh-what is that...?
It's the purified blood of $npcName:23190005[gender:0]$.
$npcName:23190005[gender:0]$?! W-wow! Yes, this'll... this'll do the trick!
Wherever you got that, we need more. And the $item:30000421$, too. I need enough of both to refine and recombine into a stable form... No... No, it couldn't work, could it?
What's the problem?
Huh? Oh, right. So, I have good news... and twice as much bad news. What do you want first?
Good news first.
Let's get the bad news out of the way.
The good news is that the power of the $item:30000420$ should be compatible with $item:30000421$. Together, they'll make a weapon unlike anything Maple World has ever seen.
And the bad news?
What's our next step?
First, the $item:30000420$ you brought me is impressive... but it's just one fragment. We'll need more if we want to show its true power.

Second, remember how I said you can't get $item:30000421$ anywhere in Victoria Island? Without that ore, we're dead in the water. Unless the Allicari brought some with them from across the sea, but what are the odds of that?
Is it possible they did bring some? No, no, I'm just getting my hopes up at this point. There's no way we'll get our hands on any $item:30000421$...
What's the good news?
What's our next step?
I'm glad your eager, but don't get your hopes up! First, I need more $itemPlural:30000420$. There's no point in doing this in half-steps. We want a weapon that will go down in legend.
Then, we need to get our hands on $item:30000421$ somehow. The Allicari merchants in $map:2000064$ might have some, but that's a long shot.
If, against all odds, you can get the materials I need, I'll take care of the rest.
Once again, I need two materials. First, I need more $itemPlural:30000420$. There's no point in doing this in half-steps. We want a weapon that will go down in legend.
Then, we need to get our hands on $item:30000421$ somehow. The Allicari merchants in $map:2000064$ might have some, but that's a long shot.
If, against all odds, you can get the materials I need, I'll take care of the rest.
You actually did it! Well... Luckily for you, I already prepared a weapon mold. Give me some time to synthesize the materials you brought me...
(Wait several moments.)
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001211[gender:0]$ is deep in concentration.)</font>
(Wait several more moments.)
<font color="#909090">(He's concentrating harder than you've ever seen anyone concentrate before. It's making you a little uncomfortable.)</font>
(Wait a whole heap of moments.)
N-no... I infused the weapon with the $itemPlural:30000420$ and $item:30000421$, but something went wrong. Some sort of dark magic flared up from within the essences. I'm sorry...
The weapon's a bust, then?
It's as powerful as they come, but it's basically cursed. It's not safe to use in this state.
I've shamed my great-granddad. No matter what it takes, I swear I'll find a way to make this weapon usable!
等下！探测器……反应和以前不同啊？ ……？！胖胖的最新<font color="#ffd200">飞行测试结果</font>就要出来了，你能等下吗？
说会等着的。
……风向控制器损失率11%…… 方向追踪诱导装置启动率88%……主探测器精确度……<font color="#ffd200">99</font>%？！
终于！玛坎老师付出了那么多心血…… 测试结果终于出现了<font color="#ffd200">成功</font>啊。 但是……博马尔最后坐上胖胖是<font color="#ffd200">#812号数据</font>…… 现在出来的结果是<font color="#ffd200">#815号数据</font>……

$npcName:11001403[gender:0]$……虽然是个我行我素的家伙…… 但他也是$npcName:11001276[gender:0]$老师的助手，应该在为从$map:02000183$回来的胖胖的设置工作做准备吧。
如果你要去见他，请将<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000486$</font>交给他。 这是记录了最新数据的日志……可以有助于对胖胖的细节操控。
